Karnakagomin's
Commentary on the
Pramāavārttikavṛtti of Dharmakīrti
namobuddhāya 
 namaskāraśloka
pramāṇavārttikam
vidhūṃtakalpanājālagambhīrodāramūrttaye
namaḥ samantabhadrāya samantasphararaṇatviṣe   
yo vidhvastasamastabandhanagatissamyag vaśitve sthita 
sarvvajñeyavisārinirmmalatamajñānaprabandhodayaḥ 
sattvārthodyatamānasaśca suciraṃ śrīmañjunātho vibhu 
tannatvā bahuśodya vāttikagataṃ kiñcidvivakṣāmyahaṃ 
ṭīkākṛtaḥ sakala eva guṇaḥ sa eṣa brūtetra vastugahanepi yadasmadādiḥ 
dignāgadantamusa  śa laiviṣame'panīte labdheṣu vartmasu sukhaṃ kalabhāḥ prayānti 
yo māmavajñāyati kopi guṇābhimānī jānātyasau kimapi taṃ prati naiṣa yatnaḥ 
kaścid bhaviṣyati kadācidanena cārthī nānādhiyāñjagati janmavatāṃ hi nāntaḥ 
yadyapi hi śāstrārambhe namaskāraślokopanyāsamantareṇa kāyavātmanobhiriṣṭa
devatānamaskārakaraṇena puṇyopacayādavighnena śāstrasya
parisamāptirbhavati 
tathāpi vyākhyātṛśrotṝṇāṃ stutipurassarayā pravṛttyā puṇyā tiśayotpādāt pārāyaṃ
sadācārānupālanaṃ cālocya viśiṣṭadevatāpūjāślokamupanyastavānācāryaḥ 
vidhūtakalpanetyādi 
yadā samantabhadraśabdo rūḍhayā bodhisattvavṛtto na gṛhyate tadeyaṃ buddhasya
bhagavataḥ pūjā  sā ca dvidhā stotrataḥ praṇāmataśca  namaḥśabdena praṇāmataḥ
pariśiṣṭaiḥ stotrataḥ  stotramapi svārthasampattitaḥ parārthasampattitaḥ parārtha
saṃpadupāyataśca tridhā  svārthasampannaśca parārthaprati samartho bhavatīvi

prathamaṃ pūrvārddhana svārthasampaduktā  svārthasampanca kāyatrayalakṣaṇā tribhinviśe

viśeṣeṇa ca 
tatrātmātmīyādyākārapravṛttā grāhyagrāhakākārapravṛttāśca traidhātukāścitta
caṃttā kalpanā  saiva jālambandhanātmakatvāt  tadvidhūtaṃ vidhvastaṃ savāsanaṃ

samantasphuraṇatviṣa   ityanena siddhayupāya ukta   tviṣo raśmaya iha tu yathā

iti

prāyaḥ prākṛtasaktirapratibalaprajño janaḥ kevalaṃ
nānarthyeva subhāṣitaiḥ parigato vidveṣṭayapīrṣyāmalaiḥ 
tenāyaṃ na paropakāra iti naścintāpi ceta ściraṃ  
sūkkābhyāsavivarddhitavyasanamityatrānubaddhaspṛham 
prāyaḥ prākṛtetyādi  atra catuvvidhaḥ śrotṛdoṣa udbhāvitaḥ  kuprajñatvamajñatvaṃ
anarthatvaṃ amādhyasthyañca  prāyaḥ śabda okārānto bāhulyavacanaḥ  prāyo jano
bhūyān janaḥ  prākṛtasaktiḥ prākṛtāni bahiḥ śāstrāṇi tatra saktiryasyeti 
gamakatvād vyadhikaraṇo bahuvrīhiḥ  prākṛtā vā saktiryasyeti  samānādhikaraṇa eva 
prākṛtaviṣayatvācca saktiḥ prākṛtā  anena kuprajñatvaṃ śrotṛdoṣa uktaḥ 
apratibalā śāstragrahaṇampratyasa śa  ktā prajñā yasya sopratibalaprajñaḥ prāyo jana
iti sambandhaḥ  anenājñatvamuktaṃ  subhāṣitarnānava kintu subhāṣitābhidhāyina
mvidveṣṭyapīrṣyāmalaiḥ parigataḥ san  anarthī ca vidveṣṭi cetyarthaḥ  etena yathā
kramamanathitvamamādhyasthyaṃ coktaṃ  atrāpi prāyo jana iti sambandhanīyaṃ 
anye tu prāyaśśabdasyā  sa  kārāntopyasti nipāta  sa ca bāhulye
netyasmistṛtīyārthī svabhāvādvarttata iti vyācakṣate  īrṣyā parasampattau cetaso

kriyateneneti karaṇe ghañ  parān vopakarotīti paropakāra karmaṇyaṇ
pāṇini    paropakāra iti naḥ asmākaṃ cintāpi nāsti  kathantarhi

vivaddhitaṃ vyasanaṃ saktistatparatā sūktābhyāsavivaddhitaṃ vyasanaṃ yasya cetasasta
ttathoktaṃ  iti hetoratra vāttika racanāyāmanubaddhaspṛhaṃ jātābhilāṣaṃ ceta iti 
evameke vyācakṣate 
anye tvanyathā  kasmādayamācārya dharma kī tti vartikanyāyena pramāṇasamuccaya
vyākhyāṃ karoti na punaḥ svatantrameva śāstramityasmin praśnāvasare prāha  prāya
ityādi  asya ślokasyāyaṃ samāsārtha  cintayā karuṇayā ca  me pramāṇa samu
cca ya vyākhyāyāṃ ceto jātābhilāṣamiti  cintā karuṇā ca ācārya dinā ga
racitaśāstrasyālpopakāritvena  alpopakāritvañca śrātṛjanāparādhena  padārtha

athaikasmin kṣaṇe pratyakṣaṃ pravṛttamapi niścayavaśāt kṣaṇasāmānyaviṣayatve
naikasantativiṣayantadayuktaṃ  pratibhāsamānenaiva hi viṣayeṇa niścayavaśāt pratyakṣaṃ
sāmānyaviṣayaṃ vyavasthāpyate na paramārthataḥ  svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt  yathā liṃga
viṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ  tathā hi pratibhāsamānamidaṃ dhūmasvalakṣaṇantārṇamvā pārṣṇasvā
nyadvā sambhavati  tatra ca viśeṣānavadhāraṇena kṣaṇamātraniścayena ca svalakṣaṇa
viṣayamapi sāmānya viṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate  pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino niścayasya
pratyakṣaviṣayānusāritvāt  na punarekakṣaṇaviṣayampratyakṣamevaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ
śakyate yato yaḥ pratyakṣe pratibhāsate kṣaṇo nāsau niścito nāpi pūrvakṣaṇarūpo parakṣaṇa
rūpo vā sambhavati bhinnakālatvāt  tat kathantatra viśeṣānavadhāraṇena kṣaṇa
mātraniścayena ca kṣaṇasāmānyaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyeta  pratyakṣa
pṛṣṭhabhāvinaḥ sa
evāyamiti niścayasya sāmānyaviṣayatvepi na santānaviṣayatvaṃ  pratipannapratīya
mānayoviṣayīkaraṇenānāgatakṣaṇāniścayād vijātīyavyāvṛttarūpaviṣayatvāccāta
eva kṣaṇasya pratibhāsepyayaṃ ghaṭa iti jñāpananiścayaḥ 
nanu yadyarthakriyāsamartho vastusantāno na pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ paricchidyate 
kathantarhi tayoḥ pravarttakatvam  vastusvarūpamātraparicchedāditi brūmaḥ  tathā
hyagnyādikamvastvekatra prabandhavṛttyā dāhādyarthakriyāsamarthaṃ pratyakṣeṇa niścinvannanya
trāpi deśādāvetadupalabhyamānaṃ prabandhavṛttyaivedṛgvidhārthakārīti niścāyayati 
sa eva punaḥ kālāntare phalārthī tatsvarūpamparyeṣamāṇognyādikaṃ pratyakṣānumānā

kathantarhyarthānarthavivecanasyānumānāśra yatvamuktam 
 ta naivātrārthā tma  nā bhipretamapi tu caturāryasatyaṃ  yato
mukyathano vayaṃ muktiśca caturāryasatyadarśanād bhavatīti bhagavatoktaṃ  taddarśanañca
bhāvanābhyāsato niṣpadyate  bhāvanāyāṃ pravṛttiśca caturāryasatyaniścayena  
tanniścayaśca parokṣatvādanumānādeva bhavatītyarthānarthavivecanāśrayatvamanumānasyaiva 
artho nirodhamārgāvupādeyatvādanartho duḥkhasamudayau tyājyatvāt  yadvārtha
paramārthasatyamanartha saṃvṛttisatyaṃ tayoryad vivecanaṃ svarūpeṇa vyavasthāpanantasyānu

hetvasiddhayaiva kāraṇānupalabdhyaiva prāgeva nirdiṣṭā  yasmādanayorapi prayogayoḥ
kāraṇānupabdhereva kāryābhāvagatistasmādiyaṃ kāraṇānupalabdhyaivoktā  
itīyamityādi  maulena prabhedena caturvidhāpi satī avāntaraprayogabhedād
aṣṭavidhā bhavati  tathā hi svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhervyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ prabheda
uktaḥ  svabhāvānupalabdhervyāpikānupalabdhi  kāraṇānupalabdheḥ kāraṇaviruddho

tatretyādi  tatra viruddhakāryepoṣṭaṃ deśakālādyapekṣaṇaṃ  nātra śītaḥ kasmiṃścit
kāle yadā'gnirvartamānībhūta iti kālāpekṣaṇaṃ vyomni dhūmāt kutraciddeśe nāsti
śīto yatra sannihito vahnitoyaṃ dhūma utthita iti deśāpekṣaṇaṃ  ādiśabdād
avasthāviśeṣāpekṣaṇaṃ  yovasthāviśeṣo dhūmasya sannihitāgne dṛṣṭastamapekṣya
varttamānepi kāle śītābhāvonumīyate  agniratra dhūmāditi kāryahetāvapi deśakā
lādyapekṣaṇamiṣṭaṃ  asyaivārthasya samuccayārtho'piśabdaḥ 
nanu deśakālādyapekṣitvasya kāryahetuviśeṣaṇatve'siddho hetuḥ syād dharmiṇo
'bhāvāditi cet    na  pradeśa eva dharmiṇi deśakālādyapekṣitvena gamakatvādi

hetāvantarbhavati 
hetunā yaḥ samagraṇa kāryotpādo'numīyate 
 arthāntarā napekṣatvāt sa svabhāvo'nuvariṇataḥ

tatra kāraṇakalāpāt kāryotpattisambhavo'numīyate kevalam  samagrāṇāṃ kāryo
anyatheti yadi na deśādyapekṣaṇantadā vyabhicāri viruddhakāryaṃ syāt  yathā bhasmā
napekṣitadeśakālaṃ aśītasādhane śītābhāve sādhye vyabhicāri  tadvat evantāvad
viruddhādyupalabdhiranupalabdhiriti pratipāditaṃ

svabhāvahetau 
antarbhāvamāha 
hetunetyādi  samagreṇeti yāvataḥ kāraṇakalāpāt kāryamutpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭantāvatā
nāntyāvasthāprāptena tatra liṅgigrahaṇāt prāgeva kāryasya pratyakṣatvāt  apratyakṣatve
vā'ntyāvasthāniścayāyogādanumānaṃ  na ca yastān niścetuṃ śakṣyati tasyānumāna
mantyakṣaṇānāmarvāgdarśanenāniścayāt  yaḥ kāryotpādonumīyate sa hetoḥ svabhāvo
varṇitaḥ kutorthāntarānapekṣatvāt  tenāyamarthaḥ kāryotpādanayogyatāmātrānubandhitvāt
svabhāvabhūtā 
nanu yadā'ntyāvasthāpekṣaḥ kāryotpādastadā kathamanyānapekṣa ityāha  asāvapīti
kāryotpādaḥ yathāsannihito yādṛśaḥ sannihitaḥ  kāraṇakalāpaḥ  tādṛśāt
sannihitānnānyamarthamapekṣata iti tādṛgmātrānubandhī svabhāvaḥ  kasya bhāvaḥ 
samagrasya kāraṇakalāpasya    santānāpekṣayaitad ucyate na kṣaṇāpekṣayā  janakaḥ 
kāraṇakalāpasantānonapekṣa ityarthaḥ

sāmagrīphalaśaktayaḥ  tathā hi pūrvasmāt samagrāduttarasya samarthasya kṣaṇasyotpattistasya

pratibandhasambhavāt

na cāpramāṇamiyantato liṅgāntaraprasaṃga ityāha  sāpītyādi  sāpi gati

hetuḥ syāt  nāpi hetudharmānumānaṃ yujyate rūpādikāryatvena rasāderapratipannatvāt

evammanyate  na sarvatrarasāde rūpādyanumānamapi tvāmrādau dharmiṇi  tatra ca
rūpādīnāṃ parasparāvinirbhāgarbhāga    niyama pratīyata eva    sa ca pratibandha 
ko'nyathā ghaṭapaṭādīnāmapi parasparāvinirbhāganiyama syāt  pratibandhaśca
teṣāṃ na tādātmyaṃ bhedena pratīter  nāpi tadutpattiḥ samānakālatvāt  na caikārtha
samavāyasteṣāṃ yato na tāvadasamavetānāṃ samavāyabalādekārthasamavāyaḥ samavāyasyaivā
bhāvāt  atiprasaṅgācca  samavetānāmapi ki samavāyena svahetubhya eva tathā
niṣpatteḥ  tathā niṣpattyaiva vācyābhiṣānād gamakatvam  tasmādekasāmagryadhīnatvaṃ
pratibandhaḥ  niścitapratibandhasya cānyasmin kālenumānaṃ  yadyapi cātrāvayavī

tasmādiyamapi kāryaliṅgajā  tena nānyo heturgamakaḥ  apratibaddhasvabhāvasyāvinā
bhāvaniyamābhāvāt

na punaranumitāt kāraṇāt paścāt kāryānumānaṃ  yataśca kāryajanakatvenaiva
hetuṣarmaniścayo nānyathā tenaivāha  iti tatrāpītyādi  iti anena dvāreṇa  tatrāpi

ttādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ liṅginya pratibaddhasvabhāvasyāvinābhāvaniyamābhāvāt 
etaduktambhavati  na tāvadaśliṣṭānāṃ saṃyogosti  śliṣṭānāmapi ki saṃyogena
svahetubhyaḥ eva śliṣṭānāmutpatte  tasmānna saṃyogavaśād gamakatvamapratibaddha
tvāt  ghaṭaghaṭayoriva  tathā pṛthaksiddhānānna samavāyaḥ  apṛthasiddhānāmapi
ki samavāyena svahetubhya evoparyuparibhāvena niṣpattestena na samavāyenāpi gamakatvaṃ
 sādhyāyattatvābhāvānna ca samavāyostīti vakṣyati  ata evaikārthasamavāyi
norabhāva iti pūrvamevoktaṃ rasāyanumāne  virodhī cānupalabdhāvantarbhāvitaḥ 
yacca nai yā yi koktaṃ pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ cānumānaṃ  nyāya
sūtraṃ    tatra pūrvavat kāraṇāt kāryānumānaṃ  tacca vyabhicārīti prati
pāditaṃ  śeṣavadanumānaṃ ca kāryāt kāraṇānumānaṃ tadiṣṭameva śāstrakṛtā  sāmā
nyato dṛṣṭantvanumānaṃ yadanyatra dharmiṇi sādhyasādhanayorvyāptindṛṣṭvānyatrānumānaṃ 
yathā devadattasya deśāntaraprāptiṃ gatipūrvikāṃ dṛṣṭvā'dityasyāpi deśāntaraprāptyā

b tasmāddhetutrayavyatirekeṇa nānyo heturgamakostīti sthitaṃ 
eteneti rasāde rūpādyanumānasya kāryaliṅgajatvakathanena  pipīlikotsaraṇa
ntāsāṃ gṛhītāṇḍānāmanyatra sañcaraṇaṃ  matsyānāmudvarttanammatsyavikāraḥ  ādi
śabdād vidyudvikāsamaṇḍūkarutādiparigrahaḥ  varṣādyanumānamityatrāpi ādiśabdād
vātādyanumānamuktaṃ  yathā tadapi kārya liṅgajahetudharmānumānāt 
etadevāha  tatrāpītyādi  tatrāpi pipīlikotsaraṇādau  bhūtapariṇā
ma eva varṣaheturiti  evakāro bhinnakramaḥ  varṣahetureva bhūtapariṇāmaḥ  pipīli
kāsaṃkṣobhāderutsaraṇādilakṣaṇasya hetuḥ  tasmād yathābhūtād bhūtapariṇāmād
varṣahetuḥ pipīlikābīnāmvikāro jātaḥ  tathābhūtasya hetoranumānāt samāna
kālavarṣādyanumānaṃ  anyatra tu yogyatānumīyate na tu varṣa eva pratibandhasambhavena

tānumānameva 
ye tu mī māṃsa kā dayo'samagrādapi kāraṇāt kāryamanumimate  te'tyanta
nyāyabahiṣkṛtā ityetad darśayannāha   
hetunā tvasamaṇetyādi  asamagreṇeti vikalena  śeṣavadanumānamanaikāntika
mityarthaḥ  kuto sāmarthyāt  asya vyākhyānaṃ samagrāṇyeva hītyādi  kāryasya tāvat
sarvathā nānumānaṃ  yogyatāmapyanumāpayanti samagrāṇyevānumāpayantītyetadapiśabdenāha
asamagrasyaikāntenā sāmarthyādityu tta rottarapariṇāmenāpyasāmarthyānna pākṣikamapi
kāryānumānaṃ  dehāv rāgānumānaṣad ityasyodāharaṇasya vyākhyānaṃ  yathetyādi 
'dehaścendriyāṇi ca buddhaya śceti dvandvaḥ  rāgādimānayaṃ puruṣo dehavattvādindriyavattvāt
buddhimattvāt  evandehādibhyo rāgādyanumānaṃ  ādiśabdād dveṣamohādiparigrahaḥ 
sūtre tu deharāgagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ  na hīndriyādyeva kāraṇaṃ rāgādeḥ  yasmādātmātmīyā
bhiniveśapūrvakā rāgāvayaḥ  ātmanyātmīye cāhammameti yobhiniveśaḥ sa pūrvaḥ kāraṇaṃ
yeṣāṃ rāgā dīnāntena tathoktāḥ  ayoniśa ityādyasyaiva samarthanaṃ  yoniḥ padārthā
nāmanityaduḥkhānātmādi  samyagdarśanaprasatihetutvāt  taṃ śaṃsatyālambata iti anupalabdhicintā
samagrāṇyeva hi hetavo yogyatāmanumāpayanti asamagrasyaikāntyenāsāmarthyād 
yathā dehendriyabuddhimattvād rāgādyanu mānam  ātmātmīyābhiniveśapūrvakā
rāgādayaḥ ayoniśomanaskārapūrvakatvāt sarvadoṣotpatteḥ 
dehādīnāṃ hetutve'pi asāmarthyāt kebalānāṃ vipakṣe vṛttyadṛṣṭāvapi śeṣavadanu
mānāt saṃśayo bhavati  tathā 
vipakṣe'dṛṣṭimātreṇa kāryasāmānyadarśanāt 
hetujñānaṃ pramāṇābhaṃ vacanād rāgitādivat  
na hi calanavacanādyeva rāgādikārya vaktukāmatāhetukatvāt  saiva rāga
iti cet   iṣṭatvānna kiñcid bādhitam  rāgaṃ hi nityasukhātmātmīyadarśanā
yoniśa  yoniṃ yoni manaskarotīti saṃkhyaikavacanācca vīpsāyā miti
śas pratyayo vā  tathābhūtaścāsau manaskāraśceti yoniśomanaskāro nairātmya
jñānaṃ  tadviruddhamātmādijñānamayoni' śomanaskārastatpūrvakatvāt sarvarāgādi
doṣotpatteḥ 
nanu dehendriyabuddhayopi rāgādinā hetavastadrahiteṣu rāgādyadarśanādityāha 
dehādīnāṃ hetutvepīti kevalānāmityayoniśomanaskārarahitānāṃ  rāgādau sādhye 
rāgādirahitā upalakhaṇḍādayo vipakṣastatra heturdehādimattvasya yā vṛttistasyā
adṛṣṭāvapi  viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvāccheṣavadanumānamasmācca saṃśayo bhavati a
na niścayaḥ  yathā caitadanantaroktaṃ na pramāṇantathā vipakṣe hetoradṛṣṭimātreṇa
kāryasāmānyasya kāryamātrasya darśanāt  hetujñānamviśiṣṭakāraṇānumānaṃ
pramāṇābhaṃ pramāṇābhāsamanaikāntikamiti yāvat  kimiva  vacanādrā
gitādivat 
nanu sarvameva vacanaṃ rāgādikāryamiti kathantatkāryasāmānyamityata āha 
na hotyādi  oṣṭhayoścalanaṃ spando vacanakāle ca tasyāvaśyaṃbhāvāt  ādi
śabdād anyasyāpi vacanakālabhāvino mukhavikārādergrahaṇaṃ  aviśiṣṭavivakṣāmātraṃ
vaktukāmatā sāmānyantadeva heturyeṣāṃ spandādīnānte tathoktāstadbhāvastasmāt

aniṣṭaṃ  na ca vaktukāmatā rāga  a  pitu nityasukhātmātmīyākāraṃ yaddarśana
b
bhineveśākṣiptaṃ sāsravadharmaviṣayamāhuḥ 
naivaṃ karuṇādayaḥ  anyathā'pi sambhavāt iti nivedayiṣyāmaḥ  yathā rakto
bravīti tathā virakto'pi  evaṃ na vacanamātrāt nāpi viśeṣād pratipattiḥ 
abhiprāyasya durbodhatvāt  vyavahārasaṃkareṇa sarveṣāṃ vyabhicārāt  prayojanābhā
ve'vacanamiti cet  na  parārthatvāt 
na yukto vītarāgatvāditi cet  na  karuṇayā'pi pravṛtteḥ   saiva karuṇā
rāga iti cet  iṣṭam  aviparyāsodbhavatvāt adoṣaḥ  karuṇā asatyapyātma
mabhiniveśastenākṣiptaṃ janitaṃ  sāsravadharmaviṣayamiti pañcopādānaskandhālambanaṃ
cetasobhiṣvaṅgaṃ rāgamāhuvidvāṃsaḥ 
syānmataṃ    vītarāgābhimatānāṃ maitrīkaruṇādaya iṣyante  te ca satvā 
lambanatvād ātmādidarśanapravṛttāḥ sattvānunayapravṛttyā cābhiṣvaṅgasvabhāvāstato
vītarāgā api rāgiṇaḥ prasaktā ityata āha  naivaṃ karuṇādaya iti  na sattvā
lambanā vītarāgāṇāṃ karuṇādayaḥ  anyathāpi sambhavāt   dharmālambanānāmapi
sambhavāt  etaccānantarameva nivedayiṣyāmaḥ  atra vacanād rāgānumāne kriyamāṇe
vacanamātrādapratipattirityanena sambandhaḥ  yasmād yathā rakto bravīti tathā
viraktopoti prakṣīṇarāgopi  na vacanamātrād rāgānumānaṃ kintarhi vacanaviśeṣāt 
yo rāgeṇaiva janyata ityāha  nāpi viśeṣāditi  kiraṇam  abhiprāyasya
durbodhatvāt  virakto hi raktavacceṣṭate  raktopi viraktavadityabhiprāyo durbodhaḥ 
tataśca vyavahārasaṃ kareṇa sarveṣāmiti vacanānāṃ  vacanamātrasya vacanaviśeṣasya ca
rāgādeliṃṅgatvenopanītasya vyabhicārāt  na viśeṣādapi rāgādyanumānaṃ  yadukta
ntathā virakto bravītīti tatrottaramāśaṃkate  prayojanetyādi  vacanoccāraṇaṃ vyava
hāraḥ  na hi vītarāgasya vacanoccāraṇe phalamasti tathā cāvyabhicāro rāgavacana
yoriti bhāvaḥ  netyā cā ryaḥ  na prayojanābhāvaḥ parārthatvād vyāhārasya 
na yukta ityādiparaḥ  vītarāgo hi pareṣṭavyāsakto na ca saktimantareṇa
parārthapravṛttirastīti bhāvaḥ  naitadevaṃ  karuṇayāpi pravṛtteḥ  saṃva karuṇā rāga
iti cet  tadetadiṣṭaṃ karuṇā rāga iti nāmakaraṇaṃ  sattvadarśana viparyāsāyātatvāt
karuṇāpi rāgātmako doṣa iti cedāha  aviparyāsetyādi  aviparyāsodbhavatva
b mevāha  asatyapyātmagrahaṇa ityādi  duḥkha viśeṣadarśanamātreṇeti saṃskāraduḥkhatā
grahaṇe duḥkha
viśeṣadarśanamātreṇa abhyāsabalotpāditā  tathā hi maitryādayaḥ sattva
dharmālambanā iṣyante  etāśca sajātīyābhyāsavṛttayo na rāgāpekṣiṇyaḥ  naivaṃ
rāgādayaḥ  viparyāsābhāve'bhāvāt  kāruṇikasya niṣphala ārambho'viparyā
sāditi cet  na  parārthasyaiva phalatveneṣṭatvāt  icchayā hi phalalakṣaṇatvam 
sarvathā'bhūtāsamāropād nirdoṣaḥ  tadanyena vītarāgasya doṣavattvasādhane
na kiñcidaniṣṭam 
nirūpaṇamātreṇa  abhyāsabalotpāviteti pūrvapūrvasajātīyakṣaṇotpannā bhavatyeva
karuṇā  āgamenāpi saṃsyandayannāha  tathā hotyādi  ādiśabdād anālambanā
gṛhyante  sattvālambanā pṛthagjanānāṃ  dharmālambanā āryāṇāṃ  anālambanā grāhya
grāhakābhiniveśavigatānāṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ  maitryādayo maitrīkaruṇāmudito pekṣā
iṣyante siddhānte 
nanu ca sattvālambanā eva pṛthagjanenābhyastāstāstatkathaṃ dharmādyālambanā
ucyanta ityata āha 
etāśca maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāḥ  sajātīyābhyāsavṛttayaḥ pūrvapūrvasadṛśakṣaṇabale
notpatteḥ  etāvāṃstu viśeṣo yāvat sattvampaśyati tāvatsattvālambanāḥ  yāvaddharma
ntāvad dharmālambanāḥ na rāgāpekṣiṣya iti nānuśayena sattveṣu pravarttanta' ityarthaḥ 
nanu duḥkhaviśeṣadarśanamātreṇābhyāsabalotpādinītyanantaramevāyamartha uktaḥ 
satyaṃ  karuṇāmevāśrityādhunā sarvāṇyeveti viśeṣaḥ  ātmadarśananivṛttāvapi
tarhi karuṇāvadabhyāsād rāgādayaḥ pravarttanta ityāha  naivaṃ rāgādayassajātīyābhyāsa
vṛttayo yenātmadṛṣṭinivṛttāvapi pravartteran  ātmādiviparyāsābhāve'bhāvāt 
kāruṇikasya niṣphalaḥ parārtha ārambho'viparyāsādātmādyabhiniveśābhāvena
svārthasyaivābhāvāt  nāyandoṣaḥ parārthasyaiva phalatveneṣṭatvāt  iṣṭo nāma parārtha
stathāpi kathaṃ phalatvamiti cet  āha  icchetyādi  icchayā lakṣyata itīcchā
lakṣaṇamicchāviṣayatvādityarthaḥ  yadiṣṭantatphalamiti yāvat 
nanvahamiti buddhirahitasya kathaṃ parārthāpi pravṛttiriti cet    na 
akliṣṭā jñānasadbhāvāt pravṛttirityeke  yogabalena śuddhalaukikacittasammukhī
karaṇādityapare  vineyānāṃ tathā pratibhāsanādityanye 
sarvaśretyupasaṃhāraḥ  yadi vacanād vītarāgasya vaktukāmatā sādhyate atha karuṇā
tena sarāga ityucyate sarvathā'bhūtāsamāropād vītarāgādinirdoṣaḥ  doṣasvabhāva
sya rāgāderavaśyabhāvāt  tadanyena rāgādibhyonyena vaktu kāmatādinā vītarāgasya
vaktaryātmani rāgādidarśanād anyatra tadanumāne hi atiprasaṅgaḥ  vyabhicārāt
ananyanuhāvyabhicāra iti ko niścayaḥ  karaṇaguṇavaktukāmate vacanama
numāpayet  rāgotpādanayogyatārahite vacanādarśanāt  tavanu māne'pyatiprasaṅga
ityuktam  rāgasyānupayoge hi kathaṃ tacchaktirupayujyate  śaktyupayoge hi sa
evopayuktaḥ syāditi tannāstītyuktam 
doṣavaśvasādhane na kiṃcid aniṣṭaṃ 
syānmatiḥ  vaktaryātmani rāgādidṛṣṭastataḥ sapakṣe sattvadarśanamātreṇa vīta
rāgābhimateṣvapyanumānambhaviṣyatītyāha  vaktaryātmanītyādi  anyatra tadanumāna
iti vītarāgābhimate rāgādyanumāne'tiprasaṃgaḥ  vaktaryātmani yāvān kaścid viśeṣo
dṛṣṭastasya sarvasyānyatrānumānaprasaṅgaḥ  ātmani dṛṣṭasya śyāmagauratādilakṣaṇasya
viśeṣasya vyabhicārāt  ananyānumāna iti rāgādanyasyātmagatasya viśeṣasyānumāne 
iheti sādhyābhimate rāgādāvapyavyabhicāra iti ko niścayaḥ  naiva kaścit 
pratibandhābhāvād rāgavacanayoḥ  yasmādātmanidarśanānnānumānantasmāt karaṇa
vaktukāmatā ceti dvandva  dvitīyādvivacanamevaitat  rāgotpādanayogyatārahite
pāṣāṇādau vacanāvarśanāt  saṃva vacanādavasīyata ityāha  rāgetyādi  tadanumāna
iti yogyatānumāne'tiprasaṃgaḥ  tathā hi yathā pāṣāṇādau rāgotpādanayogyatāvira
hastathā sarvapuruṣadharmerapi tatastathābhūte vacanādarśa  nād yadi rāgotpādanayogyatā
numānamevaṃ sarvapuruṣadharmasya 
atha mataṃ    rāgotpādanayogyatā hi rāgavacanayorekaṅkāraṇantadanumāne ca
rāgopyarthatonumito bhavati tena yogyatā evānumānaṃ na sarveṣāṃ puruṣadharmāṇāmi
tyatrāha  rāgasyetyādi  rāgasyānupayoge vacanaṃ prati tālvādivyāpārādeva
śabdaniṣpate  kathantacchaktiḥ rāgaśakti  r  vacanaṃ pratyupayujyate  atha tālvā
divyāpārakāle rāgaśakterapi vacanampratyupayoga iṣyate  tataścādyavarṇaniṣpa
sikāle rāgasyāpi niṣpattirekasāmagryadhīnatvāt    tasya ca rāgasya santāna
vāhitvantathā ca dvitīyādivarṇaniṣpatau rāga evopayuktassyāt  tadāha   
śaktyupayoge hi sa evopayuktaḥ syāditi  na ca rāgasyopayogostītyuktaṃ
prāk 
athavātmātmīyābhiniveśarahitānāṃ rāgasyānupayoge vacanaṃprati  kathaṃ taccha
ktī rāgaśaktirvāsanākhyātmātmīyābhiniveśalakṣaṇā vacanampratyupayujyate  vīta anupalabdhicintā
tasmādavinābhāvyeva kāryaṃ kāraṇamanumāpayati  tatrāyattatvāt  nānyad vipa
kṣe'darśane'pi  sarvadaśinastu darśananivṛtyā'bhāva niścayaḥ  kvacit tathā dṛṣṭānāṃ 
punar deśa kālasaṃskārabhedena anyathādarśanāt  yathā''malakyaḥ kṣorāvaseke
madhuraphalā na caivambahulaṃ dṛśyante  tena etad yuktaṃ vaktuṃ mādṛśo vaktā rāgādi
rāgāṇāmātmādyabhiniveśasyābhāvāt  śaktyupayoge hi vacanaṃ prati  sa eva rāga
upayuktaḥ syādātmādyabhiniveśavatāṃ sarveṣāmeva rāgitvāt  tacca rāgasya vacanaṃ

upalambho dadhyādīnāṃ kṣīrādiṣu anumānameva  aśaktādanutpatteḥ 
atha ki sa eva bhāvaḥ śaktirutānyadeva kiñcid  tadeveti cet tathaivopalabhyeta
viśeṣābhāvāt  anyaccet kathananyābhāve tad asti  upacāramātraṃ syāt 
ayaṃ parasparavyāghāta eṣām 
tasmāt tanmātrasambandhaḥ svabhāvo bhāvameva vā 
nivarttayeta
apara iti sāṃ rūyaḥ punaḥ sa eva  parārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saghātatvādityabhidhā
yāparārtheṣu śaśaviṣāṇādiṣu saṅaghātatvasyādarśanād vyatirekamāha  evantāvadasya
parasparavyāghātaḥ  na cādarśanamātreṇāsya hetorvyāptiḥ sidhyati   ko hyatra
niyamaḥ saṅghātairavaśyaṃ parārthairbhavitavyaṃ yataḥ saṃghātatvāccakṣurādīnāṃ pārārthyasiddhyā
tmārthatvaṃ sāṃ khya sya sidhyet  yaduktaṃ dadhyādikaṃ kṣīrādiṣvapyanupalabhyamānamapīti 
yasmādastyevopalambho dadhyādīnāṃ kṣīrādiṣu    kosāvityāhānumā
namiti  anumānaṃ cāhāśaktādanutpatteriti  yadi hi kṣīrādau dadhyādiśaktirna
syāttato śaktāt kṣīrāderdadhyādi notpadyeta  prayogastu yadyajjanane na śaktaṃ
na tasya tata utpattiryathā śālivījād yavāṅakurasya    utpadyate ca dadhyādiḥ
kṣīrādibhyastasmādasti dadhyādiśaktiḥ kṣīrādāviti kārya hetupratirūpako vaidharmya
prayogaḥ  śaktereva ca dadhyādiḥ kāryakāraṇayorabhedāditi manyate 
tanna 
athetyādi siddhāntavādī  yosau dadhyādiko bhāvaḥ paścādupalabhyate kiṃ sa eva
bhāvaḥ śaktirutānyadeva kiñcid dadhyāderarthāntaraṃ  tathaiveti niṣpannarūpadadhyādivat
kṣīrāvasthāyāmupalabhyeta viśeṣābhāvāt  anyaccediti  dadhyādibhyorthāntaraṃ
cecchakti  tadā kathamanyabhāvenyasya śaktyākhyasya bhāve  taddadhyādikamasti 
naivetyabhiprāyaḥ dadhyādijananasāmarthyāt kṣīrādau dadhyādītyupacāramātraṃ syāt 
anupalambhamapramāṇīkṛtya punastasyaiva pramāṇīkaraṇamayamparasparavyāghāta eṣāmātmā
divādināmityupasaṃhāraḥ 
yataścādarśanamātrānnāsti vyatirekastasmāttanmātra sambandhaḥ  hetusattāmātra
sambaddhasvabhāvaḥ sādhyatvenābhimataḥ svayantivarttamāno bhāvamevaṃ svabhāvabhūtameva
hetutvenopanītaṃ nivarttayet  vā śabdo vakṣyamāṇavikalpāpekṣī  yathā vṛkṣo nivarttamānaḥ
yathā vṛkṣaḥ śiśapāṃ śākhādimadviśeṣasyaiva tathā tacchabdaprasiddheḥ sa hi
tasya svabhāvaḥ  svañca svabhāvaṃ parityajya kathaṃ bhāvo bhavet  svabhāvasyaiva rūpa
tvāditi tasya pratibandhādeva avyabhicāraḥ 
kāraṇaṃ vā kāryamavyabhicārataḥ 
kāraṇaṃ nivartamānaṃ kāryaṃ nivarttayati 
anyathā taddhi tasya kāryameva na syāt  siddhastu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svabhāvaṃ
niyamayati  ubhayathā svabhāvapratibandhādeva nivṛttiḥ 
anyathaikanivṛttyānyavinivṛttiḥ kathaṃ bhavet 
 nāśvavāniti mayena na bhāvyaṃ gomatāpi kima 
sannidhānāt tathaikasya kathamanyasya sannidhiḥ 
gomānityeva mayena bhāvyamaśvavatāpi kim 
vṛkṣastasya śiśapākhyasya svabhāvaḥ  svañca svabhāvaṃ vṛkṣaṃ parityajya kathaṃ śiśapākhyo
bhāvo bhavet  kiṅkāraṇaṃ    svabhāvasyaiva vṛkṣasvātmana eva bhāvatvācchiṃśapārūpa
tvāt  iti hetostasyātmabhūtasya sādhanasya śiśapādeḥ svabhāvapratibandhādeva svabhāve
sādhyābhimate vṛkṣādau yathoktena prakāreṇa pratibandhādevāvyabhicāraḥ  kāraṇaṃ vā
nivarttamānamityadhyāhāraḥ  kāryannivarttayediti prakṛtaṃ  kasmād  avyabhicārataḥ
kāryasya kāraṇāvyabhicārādityarthaḥ  kāraṇamityādinā vyācaṣṭe 
anyatheti  yadi kāraṇe nivarttamāne kāryaṃ na nivartteta  tadā tatkāryābhimataṃ
tasya kāraṇasya kāryameva na syāt  tasmāt kāraṇaṃ nivarttamānaṃ kāryamavaśyaṃ
nivarttayati  yadyapi vāsagṛhādāvagnikāraṇa nivṛttāvapi na dhūmasya nivṛttistathāpi
dṛṣṭakāraṇavyatirekeṇa nānyasmādasyotpattirabhipretetyartha  ata evāha  siddhastvi
tyādi  siṃddhastu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kāryasya svabhāvaṃ kāraṇe niyamayati  sati
tasminbhavatyasati na bhavatītyevantadavyabhicāriṇaṃ karoti  ubhayatheti tādātmyena
tadutpattyā vā yaḥ svabhāvapratibandhastasmādeva  sādhyanivṛttyā hetonivṛttiḥ 
anyatheti yadi pratibandho neṣyate  ekasyāpratibandhakasya sādhyasya nivṛttyā
nyanivṛttiḥ  apratibaddhasya sādhanadharmasya nivṛtiḥ kathambhavet    naiva  yasmā
nnāśvavānityaśvarahita iti kṛtvā matyena manuṣyeṇa na bhāvyaṃ gomatāpi kiṃ 
sannidhānāttathaikasyeti svabhāvenāsambaddhasya hetoḥ sannidhānāt kathamanyasya sādhyasya
sannidhinaiva sannidhānaṃ  yasmād   
gomānityeva martyena bhāvyamaśvavatāpi ki 
tasmāt svabhāvapratibandhādeva hetuḥ sādhyaṃ gamayati  sa ca tadbhāvalakṣaṇasta
dutpattilakṣaṇo vā avinābhāvākhyaḥ tābhyāṃ pradaryate  
tasmād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte neṭovaśyamihāśrayaḥ 
tadbhāve  ca tannati vacanādapi tadgateḥ 
yataḥ 
tadbhā va hetubhāvau hi dṛṣṭānte tadavedinaḥ 
khyāpyete
dṛṣṭānte hi sādhyadharmasya tadbhāvaḥ tanmātrānubandhena tatsvabhāvatvena khyāpyate 
yata evantasmāt svabhāvapratibandhādeva sādhyābhimate vastuni pratibaddhatvādeva
hetuḥ svasādhyaṅgamayati  na tu sambandhāt  kāryakāraṇayorasahabhāvena vyāpya 
vyāpakayoścaikatvena dviṣṭhasambandhābhāvāt  sa ceti svabhāvapratibandhaḥ  tadbhā
valakṣaṇa iti sādhyasvabhāvalakṣaṇastadutpattilakṣaṇo vā  sa eva svabhāvapratibandho
svinābhāvākhyaḥ sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ pradaśyate 
etaduktambhavati  sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhagrāhakameva pramāṇaṃ vyāptigrāhaka
ntenaiva sādhanasya sādhyāyattatāgrahaṇāt sādhyābhāve'bhāvo gṛhīta eva kevalantada
vinābhāvagrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vismṛtatvād dṛṣṭāntābhyāmupadarśyate  yataśca pramāṇa
khyāpanādevāvinābhāvasmṛtyā sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāvo niścito bhavati   
tasmād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte  tadviṣaye'vaśyaṃ niyamena iha hetau kāryasvabhāvalakṣaṇa
āśrayo vastubhūto dharmī neṣṭaḥ svabhāvānupalambhe tviṣṭa eva 
tatra hi viparyayeṇopalambhaḥ khyāpanīyaḥ  kiṅkāraṇam  āśrayo neṣṭa ityāha 
tadabhāve cetyādi  tadabhāve vyāpakakāraṇayorabhāve taddyāpyakāryākhyaṃ liṅgaṃ neti
na bhavatītyevaṃ vaidharmyavacanād ayyāśrayarahitāttadgatervyatirekagate   
b
kiṅkāraṇaṃ  yata ityādi  svabhāvahetau sādhyasya tadbhāvaḥ sādhanavyā
pakatvaṃ  kāryahetau sādhyasya hetubhāvaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ syāpyate  tadavedina iti tad
bhāvahetubhāvāvedinaḥ puṃsaḥ 
taddyācaṣṭe  dṛṣṭānte hotyādi  sādhyadharmasya tadbhāvaḥ sādhanasvabhāvatvaṃ
khyāpyate tanmātrānubandhena  sādhanamātrānubandhena  kṛtaka tva niṣpattāveva
niṣpannasyānityatvasya kṛtakamātrānubandhena yā tatsvabhāvatā sādhanasvabhāvatā
tayā  evaṃbhūtayā tadbhāva syāpyate  na tu nimittāntarāt paścād utpadya vyāpticintā
yaḥ kṛtakaṃ svabhāve janayati so'nityarūpameva santaṃ janayatīti pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena khyā
pyate 
anyathā ekadharmasadbhāvāt tadanyenā'pi bhavitavyamiti niyamābhāvāt
vyabhicārāśaṃkā syāt  tena ca pramāṇena sādhyadharmasya tanmātrānubandhaḥ khyāpyate
svakāraṇādeva tathā jāto naśvaraḥ kṣaṇasthitidharmā  anyataḥ tadbhāvaniṣedhāt 
hetubhāvo vā satyeva bhāvāditi pradarśyate'rthāntarasya 
tathā tadbhāvahetubhāve prasiddhe sati anitya tvābhāve kṛtakatvābhāvaḥ  b
dahanābhāve'pi dhūmaḥ  evaṃ svabhāvo hetuśca cet kathaṃ svaṃ svabhāvaṃ hetuṃ cāntareṇa
mānenānityatvena  yathaike vipratipannā iti  tanmātravatvameva darśayannāha  ya
ityādi  yo hetuḥ kṛtakaṃ svabhāve janayati so'nityarūpameva santaṃ janayatītyarthaḥ 
iti anena dvāreṇāvinābhāvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena syāpyate  na tu darśanā
rśanamātraṃ  anyatheti yadyevaṃ pramāṇaṃ nopa darśyate  tadaikadharmasadbhāvāt sādhana
dharmasadbhāvāt  tadanyenāpi sādhyadharmeṇāpi bhavitavyamiti niyamābhāvāt sādhanasya
sādhyavyabhicārāśaṃkā syāt 
yadi nāma dṛṣṭāntena pramāṇamupadarśanīyantathāpi kiṃ siddhamityāha  tena ca
pramāṇena tanmātrānubandha iti sādhanamātrānubandhaḥ  kathaṃ khyāpyata ityāha  kṛtaka
sya yatkāraṇantasmādeva kṛtakastathā jāto jāto yo naśvaraḥ kṣaṇasthitidharmā 
kṣaṇikatvenaiva naśvaro na tu kālāntaraṃ sthitvetyarthaḥ 
kathaṃ punaḥ svahetoreva tathotpanna ityāha  anyata iti svahetoranyasmādvināśa
hetoḥ  tasya kṛtakasya tadbhāvaniṣedhād anityatāsvabhāvaniṣedhād vakṣyamāṇa
kāt  hetubhāvo vā  tena ca pramāṇena khyāpyata iti sambandhaḥ  sādhyadharmasya
sādhanaṃprati hetubhāvo vā kāraṇa tvamvā khyāpyate tasmin satyeva sādhanasya bhāvā
dityanena prakāreṇa pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena pradarśyate  kasya punaḥ sādhyasya hetubhāva prada
ryata ityāha  arthāntarasya sādhanād vyatiriktasya  tathā dṛṣṭāntopadarśitena
pramāṇena prasiddhe tadbhāvahetubhāve  svabhāvasya sādhyasya tadbhāve  sādhanasvabhāvatve 
kāraṇasya hetubhāve prasiddhe sati  dahanābhāve dhūmo na bhavatīti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ 
sa ityanityasvabhāvo vahniśca  tasyeti kṛtakatvasya dhūmasya ca yathākramaṃ svabhāvo
heturvā  vā śabdaḥ samuccaye  yata evaṃ kathamasau kṛtako dhūmo vā svaṃ svabhāvamanityaṃ
hetuṃ cāgnimantareṇa bhavet    naiva bhavedityevamanuddiṣṭarūpe viṣaye vyatireke

Slokas
bhavet  evaṃ āśrayamantareṇā'pi vaidhayaṃdṛṣṭānte vyatirekaḥ prasidhyati 
yeṣāṃ tadbhāvahetubhāvī prasiddhau teṣāṃ 
viduṣāṃ vācyo hetureva hi kevalaḥ 
yadartha dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ sortha siddha eveti tadā ki tadvacanena  tatpradarśane'pi
ki vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāśrayeṇeti manyamāna ācārya āśrayaṃ pratikṣipati 
tenaiva jñātasambandhe dvayoranyataroktitaḥ 
arthāt dvitīyepi smṛtiḥ samupajāyate 
yadāha 'arthāpattyā'nyatareṇa vā ubhayapradarśanāt' iti  tatrāpi dṛṣṭāntena
kathyamāne āśrayamaṃntareṇāpi vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte prasidhyati vyatirekaḥ 
tena yaducyate' bhaṭṭo dyotakarā bhyāṃ 
vyatirekopi liṃgasya vipakṣānnaiva labhyate 
abhāve sa na gamyeta kṛtayatnairabodhanādi ti 
tannirastaṃ 
evantāvat    tadbhāvahetubhāvakhyāpanāya tadavedinaḥ dṛṣṭānto vaktavyaḥ 
yeṣāṃ puna pūrva prasiddhāveva tadbhāva hetubhāvau yathā svaṃ pramāṇena pakṣadharmamātratvaṃ
a niścitanteṣāntadbhāvahetubhāvaṃprati viduṣāṃ hetureva  yadarthamityanvayavyatireka
niścayārthaṃ  pratipādyasya svayameva sorthaḥ siddha iti kintadvacanena  tadeti niści
tānvayavyatirekakāle 
yadapi mūḍhaṃ prati dṛṣṭāntapradarśanaṃ kriyate tadā tatpradarśanepi dṛṣṭāntapradarśanepi
vaidharmyaṃ  vināpyāśrayeṇa yathoktavidhinā sidhyatyeva vyatirekaḥ  tataḥ kimvaidhayaṃ
dṛṣṭāntāśrayeṇeti manyamāna ācārya āśrayaṃ pratikṣipati nyāyamu khā dau 
tathā hi tatraivaṃ coditaṃ yadā tarhyākāśādikaṃ nityantā  vada  bhyupaiti prativādī
 tadā kathannityāt kṛtakatvasya vyatireka iti  tatrā cā rya āśrayaṃ
pratikṣipannāha  tadā sandeha eva nāsti tadabhāvāttatrāvṛtteriti 
etaduktambhavati  gṛhītapratibandhasya tatrākāśādau vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyā
bhāvasiddheḥ  anityābhāvaśca nityasyāsa tvāt siddha iti yāvat  yasmāda
dṛṣṭāntābhyāṃ pratibandhaḥ kathyate  tena kāraṇena jñātasambandhe hetau sati dvayoḥ sādha
mayaṃvaidharmya dṛṣṭāntayoranyataroktitaḥ  dvitīyepi tābhyāmevānyatarasminnanuktepi
smṛtiḥ samupajāyate'rthāpattyā  vyāpticintā
tadbhāvahetubhāvapradarśanaṃ manyamāno'rthāpattyā ekasya vacanena dvitīyasya siddhimāha 
tathā hi  yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityamevetyukte anarthāntare vyaktamayamasya svabhāvaḥ
tanmātrānubandhī pramāṇadṛṣṭa iti niścitaṃḥ tadbhāvaniyamāt 
etadapyācāryavacanena saṃsyandayannāha  yadāhetyādi  nyāya mu khe cāyaṃ
granthaḥ vāśabdastatraiva pūrvavikalpāpekṣī anyatareṇeti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena vaidharmya
dṛṣṭāntena vā  ubhayapradarśanād anvayavyatirekapradarśanāt  tatrāpi granthe  vṛṣṭāntena
svabhāvahetau kāryaṃhetau ca yathā kramantadbhāvahetubhāvapradarśanaṃ kriyata iti manyamāna
ācāryorthāpattyā ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā vacanena dvitīyasya yathākramaṃ
vyatirekasyānvayasya vā siddhimāha  etadevā hai  tathā hīti  yatkiñcit kṛtaka
ntadanityamevetyukte vyaktamavaśyamayamanityatvākhyo dharmosya kṛtakasya svabhāvasta
nmātrānubandhī kṛtakamātrānubandhī pramāṇadṛṣṭa iti pramāṇena niścitaḥ 
nanu kāryepi kāraṇamavaśyambhavati  na ca tattasya svabhāva ityata āha 
anarthāntara iti  kathantanmātrānubandhītyāha  tadbhāvaniyamāditi  kṛtakabhāve 
'vaśyamanityatābhāvādityarthaḥ 
nanu na kṛtakamātrānubandhī svabhāvo nityatvasya pratyakṣaniścitaḥ kṣaṇikoya
mityaniścayāttatkathaṃmucyate pramāṇadṛṣṭa iti  atha kṛtako vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvā
ttadbhāvaniyata ityanumānadṛṣṭa   
tadayuktaṃ  yato nirhetukepi vināśe yadaiva ghaṭādernāśa pratīyeta tadaivāhetukaḥ
sthānnānyadā tatkathaṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ  athaikakṣaṇasthāyitvena ghaṭasyotpatteḥ pūrvamapi
nāśa   
nanu yathaikakṣaṇasthāyitvenotpattiḥ svahetubhyastathānekakṣaṇasthāyitvenāpyutpattiḥ
syāt  vicitraśaktayo hi sāmagryo dṛśyante  na ca yadi vināśaḥ kvacit kadācid
bhavet  tatkāladravyāpekṣatvād asyānapekṣatvahāni  vināśakahetvanapekṣatvād
anyathā dvitīyepi kṣaṇe vināśo na syāt tatkālādyapekṣatvāt  atha kramayogapadyābhyāṃ b
sāmarthyalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ vyāptaṃ nityeṣu ca kramākramanivṛttau sattvaṃ nivarttamāna
kṣaṇikeṣvevāvatiṣṭhata iti sattvayuktasya kṛtakasya gamakatvaṃ 
tadapyayuktaṃ  kṣaṇikatve sati kramāpratipattena hi jñānakṣaṇena pūrvakambastu
pratipannaṃ na tenottaraṃ yenottaraṃ na tena pūrvakamiti kathaṃ kramapratītiḥ  yo hi pūrva

i
vastupratipatyanantaramaparasya grāhakaḥ sa kramagrāhī syāt tathā vā kṣaṇikatvamasya
syāt  yasya ca bauddha sya kāla eva nāsti tasya kathaṃ kramagrahaḥ  bhinnakālavastva
grahāt kālābhāve cānekavasturūpa eva kramaḥ  tathā ca nityasyāpi kramakartṛtvaṃ
na virudhyate  yathā ca nityasya kramakartṛtvādanekarūpatvantathā kṣaṇasyāpi syāt 
atha kṣaṇavad dvitīye kṣaṇe nityasyāpyabhāvaḥ syāt  kāryābhāvāt 
tadayuktaṃ kālābhāvāt  bhavatu vā kramagrahastathāpi kathaṃ kramākramābhyāṃ sattvasya
vyāptiḥ kramayaugapadyavyatirekeṇānyena prakāreṇārthakriyāsambhavāt  na ca prakā
rāntarasya dṛśyānupalambhādabhāvaniścayaḥ  evaṃ hi viśiṣṭadeśādāvevābhāvaniścayaḥ
syānna sarvadā  nāpyadṛśyānupalambhād abhāvaniścaya  sandehāt  tasmānnityeṣu
kramākramāyogepi sattvānivṛtteḥ kathaṃ sattvasya kṣaṇikasvabhāvatvamiti śaṃ ka ra prabhṛtayaḥ 
bhavatu vā prakārāntarābhāvāt kramayogapadyābhyāṃ sattvasya vyāptistathāpi ni
tyeṣu na pratyakṣādinā kramākramāyogaḥ siddho nittyānāmatīndriyatvāt  tadasiddhau
ca na teṣu sattvanivṛttisiddhistadasiddhau ca na satvasya kṣaṇikasvabhāvatvasiddhiḥ 
kiñca sattvāt kramayaugapadyānumānaṃ syāt tenaiva vyāptatvānna tu kṣaṇikatvā
numānantatra kramakartta tvāsambhavāditi

m
kṣaṇāpratibhāsanācca na santānarūpasya nīlasya pratibhāsaḥ  atha nīlamātraprati
bhāse sati kṣaṇikatvapratibhāsaḥ  tadayuktaṃ  pratibhāsāpratibhāsābhyāṃ hi pratya
kṣasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe nānyathā  tadāha  tad yadapi gṛhṇāti tatpratibhāseneti 
na ca kṣaṇānāṃ pratibhāsa ityuktaṃ 
yadi ca nīlādyavyatiriktaṃ kṣaṇikatvantadā nīlaniścaye kṣaṇikatvasya niścita
tvādanumānasya vaiyarthyaṃ syāt  yastvāha  ekajñānaviṣayatvameva kṣaṇikatvaṃ
pūrvottarajñānaviṣaya tvavyāvṛttasyaiva cedānīntanajñānaviṣayatvasya pratibhāsanāt   
pūrvāparakṣaṇavilakṣaṇa eva kṣaṇa pratyakṣeṇānubhūtaniścitonumānena tu pratyakṣavṛttameva
parāmṛśyata iti nānumānasya vaiyarthyamiti 
tadayuktaṃ  yato yadyekajñānasyākṣaṇikatvantadārthasyāpyakṣaṇikatvaṃ syāt  atha
tasya kṣaṇikatvantatkuto'vagataṃ  tasyāpyekajñānaviṣayatvāditi ce danavasthayaiva
pratipattiḥ kṣaṇikatvasya  atha jñānakṣaṇasya pratibhāso'bhyupagamyatesāvarthakṣaṇasya
kinnābhyupagamyate  anyathaikasyāpi kṣaṇasyānekajñānaviṣatvādanekatvaṃ syāt 
bhaṭṭa vā su de va stvā ha   pūrvottaraṃkṣaṇānāṃ vināśenāpratibhāsanamevākṣaṇi

hetutvabhedāt parasparabhinnā 
na cāyambhedaḥ sādhanīya ityāha  sphuṭamityādi  vivecayati bhede vā bhāvasyeti 
suvivecitākāraṃ bhrāntirhetubhyaḥ sadṛśākārebhyo vibhāgena niścitākāraṃ 
tadbhāva eva bhāvo'nvayaḥ  tadabhāve cābhāva eva vyatirekaḥ  anvayo vya

 svabhāvaniyamaḥ  ataḥ kāraṇād bhinnād vijātīyānna sambhavaḥ 
tasmāt sakṛdapi darśanādarśanābhyāmiti yathoktābhyāṃ  pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ

tiranvayaṃ vyatirekapratipattirnānyatheti kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayantyaktvā kevalābhyānda sāmānyacintā
nityatvasya darśane'pi anyatra anyathā dṛṣṭaḥ kvacit nityatvābhāvepyadṛṣṭasya dṛṣṭeḥ 
 sāmānyacintā
kāryasya hi tasmādutpatteḥ hetvavinābhāvo bhavatu nāma' svabhāve kathamavinābhāvaḥ 
svabhāveṣyavinābhāvo bhāvamātrānurodhini 
tadabhāve svayambhāvasyābhāvaḥ syādabhedataḥ 
rśanādarśanābhyāṃ nānvayavyatirekayoḥ pratipattiḥ  kiṅkāraṇaṃ    niḥśeṣidarśanādarśa

yadi niḥśeṣe sādhyavyatireke hetoradarśanaṃ syāt  yathaikatra dhūmavyaktau sakṛdapi
kāryatvasiddhyā sarvatra tathābhāvaḥ    evaṃ kvacit sapakṣāsapakṣayordarśanādarśanāt

anyathetyanityatve hetoramūrttatvasya dṛṣṭeḥ kāraṇādekatra darśanaṃ na sarvatra tathābhāva

nanu svabhāve bhāvopi bhāvamātrānurodhini heturityādinā prāgeva svabhāva a
hetāvavinābhāvaḥ sādhitaḥ 
satyaṃ  evantu manyate  yathābhūte svabhāve tanmātrabhāvinyavinābhāvo

nurodhisādhyadharmābhāve āvasya hetutvenopāttasyābhāvaḥ syāt  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ

syāt 
naiṣa doṣaḥ 
sarve bhāvā svabhāvena svasvabhāvavyavasthiteḥ 
svabhāvaparabhāvābhyāṃ yasmād vyāvṛttibhāginaḥ 
sādhyasādhanayorabhedataḥ  abhedameva ya evetyādinā vyācaṣṭe  ya evānityādiko
bhāvaḥ kṛtakabhāvamātrānu rodhī svabhāva ityucyate sa eva svayamanyanimittānapekṣa

mparityajya kathambhavet 
ya evaṃ tahīti paraḥ  pakṣanirdeśa pratijñā   tasyā artho dharmadharmasamudāya
stasyaikaveśaḥ sādhyadharmātmako hetuḥ syāt  tathā hi yāvaduktamanityaḥ śabdo'nitya
tvāditi tāvad anityaḥ kṛtakatvāditi tathā cāsiddho heturiti bhāvaḥ 
naiṣa doṣa iti siddhānta vā dī  yasmāt sarve bhāvā ityādi  atra prathamayā
kārikayā dharmakalpanābījaṃ  dvitīyayā dharmakalpanā  tṛtīyayā pratijñārthaṃkadeśatā
parihāraśca kathyate iti samudāyārthaḥ  sarve bhāvāḥ svabhāvaparabhāvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtti
mbhajanta iti ghinuṇ  sarvabhāvāḥ svabhāvena svarūpeṇa na pararūpeṇa sajātī yād
vijātīyācca vyāvṛttāḥ  svasvabhāvavyavasthiteḥ  svasmin svabhāve'vasthānāt 
nanvaśvādibhyo gaurjātyā bhinnaḥ  viṣāṇī gaurdravyeṇa govyaktyantarād bhinnaḥ 
śuklo gaurguṇena viṣāṇino govyaktyantarād bhinna iti  evamādiparamāṇvanto
bhedo jātyādiviśeṣaṇakṛtaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ na svabhāveneti 
atrocyate  na jātyādinā tāvad bhāvānāmabhinnānāmbhedaḥ kriyate  bhinnā
bhinnabhedakaraṇe tatra tasyākiñcitkaratvāt  nāpi bhinnānāmvaiyarthyāt  nāpye
ṣāmbhedavyavahāraḥ kriyate svarūpabhinnānāmpratyakṣe'vabhāsādeva bhedavyavahārasiddheḥ 
kiñca  jātyādīnāmanyonyantadvataśca sakāśād bhedo nānyato jātyāde
ranavasthāprasaṅgāt  svarūpeṇa ca bhede bhāvānāmevāsī kinnābhyupagamyate kiṃ
jātyādikalpanayā 
yopi digamba ro manyate  sarvātmakamekaṃ syādanyāpohavyatikrame 
tasmād bheda evānyathā na syād anyonyābhāvo bhāvānāṃ yadi na bhavediti 
sopyanena nirastaḥ  abhāvena bhāvabhedasya kartumaśakyatvāt  nāpyabhinnānāṃ
hetuto niṣpannānāmanyonyābhāvaḥ sambhavati  bhinnāścet niṣpannāḥ kathamanyonyā
nanu sarve bhāvā bhinnā iti yadyetadanumānavṛttantadāśrayāsiddho hetuḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ
pratyakṣāviṣayatvād  ata eva naitat pratyakṣavṛttaṃ parāmṛśyate 
anyastvāha  yadyapi bhāvāḥ svabhāvena bhinnāsteṣāntu jātyādayo dharmāssa
ntyeva pratīyamānatvāt  tathāpi nirvikalpakantu vijñānaṅgavādiṣu sattāmātraṃ
gṛhṇāti na bhedaṃ  anyasmād viśeṣagrahaṇameva hi bhedagrahaṇamviśeṣaśca nāvikalpya
gṛhyata iti savikalpakasya viṣayo na nirvikalpasya  taduktaṃ 
viśeṣāstu pratīyante savikalpakabuddhibhiḥ 
te ca kecit pratidravyaṃ kecid vahuṣu saṃsthitāḥ 
tānakalpayadutpannaṃ vyāvṛttānugamātmanā 
gavāśve copajātantu pratyakṣanna viśiṣyata iti 
tasmānna nirvikalpake pratyakṣabhedāvabhāsa iti 
yopyāha  savikalpakenāpi bhedo na gṛhyate'nyonyābhāvagrahaṇanimittako
hi bhāvānāṃ bhedagrahonyonyābhāvaśca bhedo na cābhāva  pratyakṣagrāhyo  na hi gavya
śvostīti pratyakṣaṃ paricchinattyataḥ sattāmātrasyaiva grāhakaṃ pratyakṣamiti 
taduktaṃ ma ṇḍa ne na 
āhuvidhātṛ pratyakṣaṃ na niṣedya vipaścitaḥ 
naikatva āgamastena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyata iti 
tadetadubhayamapyayuktaṃ  sattāmātrasyāpratibhāsanāt  gavāravādīnāṃ svasva
rūpeṇaiva pratibhāsanāt  taduktaṃ 
tattvayuktampratidravyaṃ bhinnarūpopalambhanāt 
na hyākhyātumaśakyatvād bhedo nāstīti gamyata iti 
yopyāha  bhāvānāmbheda eva nāsti  tathā hi goraśvānutpāde yādṛśaṃ
svarūpamaśvotpādepi tādṛśameva nāparamadhikaṃ kiñcijjātamiti kathamato bhedaḥ

PANEN ST TOATENGA SE
bhavatu vā bhedo nāsau pratyakṣagrāhyo'smādayambhinna iti  evaṃrūpasya vyāpārasya
pratyakṣe'bhāvāt  yadāha  na hīdamiyato vyāpārān kartuṃ samarthamiti 
sopi nirastaḥ  gavāravādīnāṃ svasvarūpeṇotpattireva bhedaḥ  te ca svasvarūpeṇa
pratyakṣevabhāsante  tathāvabhāsaśca loke bhedāvabhāsa iti yatkiñcidetat  tasmāt
purovasthiteṣu svasvabhāvavyavasthitarityasya hetoḥ  pratyakṣeṇa bhedaṃ pratipadya
mānaḥ sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratipadyate'taḥ sarvabhāvā vyāvṛttibhāgina iti vyāptigrahaṇa
pramāṇaphalamiti  yataśca jātyādayorthāntarabhūtā na santīti pratipādayiṣyate
 ataḥ pāramāthiko dharmadharmabhāvo nāstītyuktambhavati 
nanu sāmānyayogāt sajātīyā ucyante  yadi ca sāmānyannāsti kathaṃ sajā
tīyād vyāvṛttirityucyate 
naitadasti  na samānānāmutpannānāmbhāvānāṃ sāmānyayogāt samānarūpatā
svahetubhya eva tathāniṣpannatvāt 
tena yadu dyo ta ka re ṇo cyate  na gavi gotvaṃ yena gotvayogāt prāg gaurevāsā
viti vyarthaṃ gotvaṃ syād  api tu yadaiva vastu tadaiva gotvenābhisambadhyate 
gotvayogāttu prāg vastu na vidyate  na cāvidyamāna gauriti vā'gauriti vā śakyaṃ
a vyapadeṣṭumiti 
tannirastaṃ  yadaiva vastu tadaiva tasya gorūpatayā niṣpannatvāt kiṃ gotvayogena 
nāpyasamānānāṃ sāmānyayogāt samānarūpatā  teṣāṃ sāmānyasyaivābhāvāt  samā
nānāṃ ca bhāvaḥ sāmānyamityabhyupagamyate  sāmānyācca samānarūpatve bhāvānāma
bhyupagamyamāne yāvanna sāmānyayogastāvanna samānā bhāvāḥ  yāvacca na samānā
stāvanna sāmānya yoga ityanyonyāśrayatvaṃ syāt  tasmāt svahetubhya eva samānā
utpannā  tena 
śāvaleyācca bhinnatvaṃ bāhuleyāśvayossamaṃ 
sāmānyaṃ nānyadiṣṭaṃ cet kvāgopohaḥ prakalpyatāmiti

prakalpanāt 
yadapyuccate  samānā iti pratibhāsādeva nirvikalpake jñāne sāmānyaprati
bhāsonyathā bāhuleyāśvavat  śāvaleyabāhuleyayorapi vailakṣaṇyapratītiḥ syāt
sarvātmanā bhedād  bhavati ca samānā iti pratītistasmādasyaiva sāmānyamiti 
taduktaṃ  nirvikalpakabodhena dvayātmakasya vastuno grahaṇamiti  yadvā
savikalpake na cet sāmānyaṃ gṛhyate  nirvikalpakenāpi gṛhītameva  savikalpā sāmānyacintā
bhinnapratibhāsatvāt  tathā hi    ya eva śāvaleyādayo gauriti jñānena gṛhyante 
ta eva nirvikalpake jñāne pratibhāsante kevalamekantānavikalpya gṛhṇātyanyad vikalpyeti

iti 
tadapi nirastaṃ  svahetubhya eva keṣāñcit samānānāṃ pratibhāsanāt  sāmā
nyasya ca vyaktiparatantraṃ svarūpaṃ na ca nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ pāratantrya mvastuno gṛhṇāti 
svātantryeṇa vastugrāhitvāt tatkathaṃ sāmānyagrāhakamucyate  anugatasya ca

buddhīnāmbhedaḥ śabdaikasvarūpaviṣayatvāt 
 atha niviṣayā etā vāsanāvījamātrataḥ

nityākṛtakādeḥ śabdādīnāmarthānāṃ vyāvṛttistannibandhanāḥ  vyāvṛttyāvadhivyā
tasmād yato yato'rthānāṃ vyāvṛttistannibandhanāḥ 
jātibhedāḥ prakalpyante tadviśeṣāvagāhinaḥ 
vṛttinibandhanā dharmabhedā anityakṛtakādayaḥ kalpyante vikalpairā ropyante  kimvi
śiṣṭāstadviśeṣāvagāhinaḥ  tasya svalakṣaṇasya ye viśeṣā akṛtakādivyāvṛtti
rūpalakṣaṇāstadavagāhinaḥ  tadavagāhanaśīlā stadabhedāvabhāsanaśīlā ityarthaḥ 
etaduktambhavati  akṛtako na bhavatītyanena dvāreṇa prabodhitāyā eva kṛtaka
vikalpavāsanāyā eṣā prakṛtiryatastato vikalpa utpadyamānaḥ kṛtaka iti svākārā
bhinnaḥ sa kṛtakavyāvṛttameva śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratipadyate na tvanitya iti  tathā nityo
na bhavatītyanenāpi dvāreṇa prabodhitāyā evānityavāsanāyāḥ sāmarthyaṃ yattato vikalpa
utpadyamāno'nitya iti svākārābhinnaṃ nityavyāvṛttameva śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratipadyate
na tu kṛtaka iti    tena buddhibhedo bhavati  yataśca bādhyamānatvād vikalpaprati
bhāsyarthī bāhyo na bhavatyato vāsanāvaśādeva bāhyāvabhāso vikalpastena vikalpasya
bāhyarūpa eva pratibhāsamānortha svākāra ucyate  na tu svākāre bāhyāropa  
sādṛśyāt yadāha nāmanimittaprakaraṇe'   
sārūpyād bhrāntito vṛttirarthe cet syānna sarvadā 
deśabhrāntiśca na jñāne tulyamutpattito dhiyaḥ 
tathāvidhāyā bāhyārthapratibhāsāyā iti 
etena yaducyate  yadvāhyātyanta visadṛśasya svākārasya tādrūpyagrahaṇantada
nyanivṛttikṛtasādṛśyaparaṃ  yathā ghaṭavisadṛśopi paṭo vṛkṣābhāvaviśiṣṭo'vadhāryamāṇo
yamapyavṛkṣa iti ghaṭasadṛśovadhāryate  vṛkṣavyāvṛtterghaṭapaṭayostulyatvāt 
vikalpaviṣayo'tyantaṃ vāme visadṛśopi vāme'vadhāryate'nyanivṛttikṛtasārūpya
grahaṇāditi   
tathā
tadapāstaṃ  svahetuta eva bāhyābhāsāyā vikalpabuddherutpatteḥ  na cāsadṛśānāma
nyanivṛttyā sādṛśyaṃ kriyate  tatra tasyā bhedābhedasādṛśyakaraṇe'kiñcitkaratvāt 
na cānyanivṛttiḥ sadṛśī vidyate  sadṛśānāmapi kathamanyanivṛttyā sādṛśyaṃ kriyate
svarūpeṇaiva sādṛśyāt  nāpi pūrvaṃ svākārapratibhāsaḥ paścāt tatrānyanivṛttikṛta
sādṛśyagrahaṇaparo bāhyāropaḥ pratibhāsate  na hi marīcikāyāṃ pūrva svarūpāpratibhāse
sati sādṛśyagrahaṇahetuko jalāropaḥ sambhavati  bāhyāropācca pūrvaṃ na svākā ro a
grāhyāroposti  vikalpasyaivābhāvāt  bhāve bodhaikarūpa evāsāviti na bāhyasadṛśaḥ
tataścānyanivṛttikṛtasādṛśyābhāvāt kathambāhyarūpa pratīyate  anumānasya tu
nānyanivṛttigrahaṇapūrvikā pravṛttirliṅgasya tayā saha sambandhāt siddheḥ  yadā ca
tadviśeṣāvagāhitvamvikalpānāṃ pratīyate tadā vidhirūpeṇaiva pravṛttirvastusvarūpasya
vidhīyamānatvenādhyavasāyādarthādanyanivṛttiḥ pratīyate  tena vidhireva śabdārthosmā
kamapi  bāhyatayā'ropitasya ca vidhipratiṣedhābhyāṃ sambandhaḥ 
nanu niyatarūpagrāhī vikalpa  pratibhāsate  tenetararūpaśūnyameva vikalpayanni
yatamarthaṃ vikalpayati  tasmādyanniyatarūpāvadhāraṇantadanyanivṛttiviṣayantatkathamucyate
vidhireva śabdārtha iti 
tadayuktaṃ  anyanivṛttimahaṃ vikalpa yāmītyapratīteḥ  na ca sa vikalpaviṣayo yo
na vikalpya pratibhāsate yadi cetararūpanivṛttimeva vikalpayanniyatamarthamvikalpayati
tadetaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ syāt  itararūpasyāpi niyatarūpatvenānyanivṛttidvāreṇa
pratipattiprasaṅgāt  atha vidhirūpeṇetararūpaṃ vikalpayati na tarhi tadanyanivṛttya
vadhāraṇapūrvakanniyatarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ 
na ca yathā sāmānyavantamarthampaśyāmīti nāsti jātitadvatoviśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāve
pratibhāsa    atha ca viśiṣṭapratyayānurodhāt sāmānyaviśiṣṭavyaktidarśanannai
yā yi kā dayaḥ kalpitavantastathā'nye  nyair  nivṛttimahambikalpayāmītyapratītāvapi
bāhyasadṛśāropānyathānupapattyānyanivṛttiparaṃ vikalpākāre bāhyarūpamāropyata iti
yuktaṃ  sādṛśyamantareṇa vāsanābalādevādhyavasitabāhyarūpasya vikalpasyotpatteḥ 
yadāha  tadanubhavāhitavāsanāprabhavaprakṛteradhyavasitatadbhāvasvarūpaṃ  tathā vikalpa
vāsanāyāśca tādṛśī prakṛtiryadevameṣā pratibhātīti 
nāpi bāhyarūpāropakasya jñānasyānyavittikṛtasārūpyanimittatvepyanyanivṛtti
viṣayatvaṃ  na hi marīcikāyāṃ jalajñānasya sādṛśyaviṣayatvamāropitajalaviṣaya
tvāt  na ca niyataṃ rūpaṃ bhāvānāmanyanivṛttyā kriyate  tasyā avastutvenākāra
katvāt  svahetubhya eva ca tato   tata u tpatte
nāpi niyatarūpāvadhāraṇantadanyanivṛttiviṣayaṃ niyatarūpaviṣayatvādasya 
ata eva na tadanyanivṛttipurassarameva dhāryate pratyakṣeṇaiva 
na ca tadanyanivṛttirarthāntarabhūtā yujyata iti vakṣyati  nāpi sa    tattvā
nyatvābhyāmavācyā yujyate    evaṃ hyabhāva evāsyā syācchaśaviṣāṇavat  na ca
syāta pratyakṣagamyā nīrūpatvāt  nāpyanumānagamyā  sambandhābhāvena liṅgasyāsiddheḥ 
pramāṇavāttikasva vṛttiṭīkā 
tasmād viśeṣo yo yena dharaṇa saṃpratīyate 
nasa śakyastatonyena tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ 
nāpi niyatarūpānyathānupapattyā tatkalpanā  aniyatarūpāṇāmanyanivṛtterabhāvāt 
b niyatarūpāṇāṃ ca kathamanyanivṛttyā niyatarūpatvaṃ svahetubhya eva niyatarū' pāṇāmutpatteḥ 
tasmānniyatarūpāvadhāraṇapurassaraivānyanivṛttiḥ pratīyate  tathā hi ghaṭa ityukte'ghaṭo
na bhavatīti sāmarthyāt pratīyate'to vikalpakalpitaiveṣā na paramārthatosti 
tasmāt sthitametacchadvaliṅgābhyāmvidhirūpeṇa vastu pratipādyaterthādanyaniṣedhaḥ 
tathā ca vakṣyati tadgatāveda śabdebhyo gamyate'nyanivarttanamityādi  
tena yaducyate kumārilena 
na tvanyāpohakṛcchabdo yuṣmatpakṣenuvaṇṇitaḥ 
niṣedhamānnaiveha pratibhāseva gamyate 
kintu gaurgavayo hastī vṛkṣa ityādi śabdataḥ 
vidhirūpāvasāyana matiḥ śābdī pravarttate 
tasmādyeṣveva śabdeṣu najña yogasteṣu kevalaṃ 
bhavedanyanivṛttyaṅgaḥ svātmevānyatra gamyata iti 
etatsiddhaṃ sādhyate  vidhirūpasyāpi śabdārthasyeṣṭatvāt  kathantahi paramatād
bauddha matasya bhedaḥ  kathaṃ vā śabdaliṃgayo rapoho viṣaya ucyate 
nanvastyeva mahān bhedaḥ paraiḥ pāramārthikārthaviṣayatveneṣṭasya vikalpasya bau ddhaiḥ
kalpitaviṣayatveneṣṭatvāt  kalpitaścākāro'pohāśritatvādapoha ucyate apo
hyate'neneti vā  anyanivṛttimātraṃ tvarthādākṣiptamapohanamapoha ityucyate   
svalakṣaṇaṃ tvapohyatesminnityapoha ucyate 
tasmādanyānyavyāvarttyavastuvyapekṣayā dharmāḥ kalpitabhedā vikalpaiviṣayī
te  ato bhinnaviṣayā vikalpāstatsamānaviṣayāśca śabdā apyaparyāyā
iti darśayitumāha  tasmādityādi  yataścaivaṃ dharmabhedāḥ kalpyante tasmādyaḥ svalakṣa
ṇaviśeṣo vyāvarttanīyanityavyapekṣayā vyavasthāpito'nityalakṣaṇaḥ  yena dharmeṇa
yena śabdena  yathā'nityaśabdena  śabdopi dharmavācakatvād dharma ucyate  na
sa śakyastatonyena  ani tyaśabdādanyena kṛtakādiśabdena  vyāvarttanīyāntara
vastvadhikena pratyetuṃ  tena bhinnā vyavasthitiḥ  tena kāraṇena vikalpānāṃ naika
Slokavārtika sāmānyacintā
sarva eva hi bhāvāḥ svarūpasthitayo nātmānaṃ pareṇa miśrayanti tasyāparatvaprasa b
ṅgāt  teṣāmabhinnaṃ svātmabhūtaṃ yad rūpaṃ na tat teṣām  tadānīṃ teṣāmabhāvāt 
tadeva hi syāt abhinnasya bhāvāt 
abhinnasya bhāvāt  tasmādapratipannasya bhinnasyābhāvāt 
tasyaiva ca punarbhedavirodhāt  tacca svātmani vyavasthitamamiśrameva 
viṣayatvaṃ  śabdānāṃ ca na paryāyatvaṃ 
tena yaducyate  yayostādātmyanna tayorgamyagamakabhāvo yayośca vikalpita
rūpayorgamyagamakabhāvo na tayoḥ sambandha iti 
tadapāstaṃ  akṛtakavyāvṛttasyaiva svalakṣaṇasya jñāpakahetvadhikārāt  kṛtaka
iti jñātasya gamakatvāt tasya ca nityavyāvṛttavasturūpatvāt tādātmyaṃ 
sarva eva hotyādinādvai ta vā daṃ nirākurvan kārikāryamāha  svarūpe svātmani
sthitiryeṣānte tathā  sarva eva hi bhāvāḥ svarūpasthitayo nātmānaṃ pareṇa miśrayanti 
ekīkurvanti  kiṅkāraṇaṃ    tasya miśrīkriyamāṇasya parasyāparatva prasaṅgāt 
ātmatāpatteḥ 
syānmataṃ   
sarvavastuṣu buddhiśca vyāvṛttāṃnugamā tmikā 
jāyate dvayātmakatvena vinā sā ca na yujyate   
ataḥ sāmānyātmakā viśeṣā viśeṣātmakañca sāmānyamityubhayarūpamvastvi
tyatrāpyekasya vā rūpasya bhinnebhyo'bhedo bhinnasya caikasmādabhedaḥ    tatra prathamaṃ pakṣaṃ
nirākartumāha  teṣāmiti bhāvānāmabhinnamityekātmabhūtamityavyatiriktaṃ yadrūpaṃ
svabhāvo na tatteṣāmbhāvānāmiti śakyamvaktuṃ  kasmāttadānīntasyetyapekṣyate  a
tasyābhinnasya rūpasya teṣāmabhāvādabhedādeva I
atha punarekasmād bhinnasyābhedastatrāpyāha  tadeva hi syādabhinnasya bhāvāt 
ekaṃ cedrūpaṃ pratipannābhāvastadevābhinnaṃ rūpanteṣāṃ syānna bhinnaṃ  kuta etat  tasyai
vābhinnasya rūpasya bhāvāt 
atha syāt  teṣāmbhedopīṣyata evetyatrāha  tasmādabhinnātmanorthāntarasya
bhinnasya nānārūpasyābhāvāt 
atha syād  viśeṣasya yo bheda ssa eva sāmānyasyābhedād  yadāha   
sāmānyasya tu yo bhedaṃ brūte tasya viśeṣato darśayitvābhyupetavya ityatrāpyāha  tasyaiva
ca punarbhedavirodhāt  tasyaivaikasyānekatvāyogāt
atha syād  viśeṣadvāreṇa sāmānyasya bhedo na svarūpastadānugatavyāvṛtta 
arthāntaramapi tad anekasamavetatvāt na teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃm atadrūpatvāt 
dvitvādikāryadravyeṣvapi prasaṅgāt  sambandhinā'nyenā'nye'samānāḥ tadvanta eva
rūpayoḥ parasparāsaṃśleṣādekāntena bheda syāt  tadāha  taccaikarūpaṃ svātmani
svasvabhāve vyavasthitamamiśrameva vyaktirūpeṇa  amiśre ca miśrarūpatayāpratīte
mithyātvameva 
atha kathaṃcit sāmānyasya vyaktyabhinnatvānnaitanmithyātvaṃ  tadāha 
naitadaśvādibuddhīnāmadhyāropādyasambhavāt 
sthitaṃ naiva hi jātyādebhinnatvaṃ vyaktito hi na iti 
tadayuktam    ekatvena yenaiva rūpeṇa bhinnantenaivāsyābhedo virodhānna caika
smin pramāṇe bhedābhedaṃ pratibhāsate  ekena ca bhedagrahaṇe sati yadyanyenābhedo gṛhyate
kathantadgrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhrāntaṃ na syād  anyathā grahaṇāttasya caikarūpatvāt 
yadvā'miśraṇādevaikasya rūpasya sāmānyarūpatā na syādarthāntaratvād ghaṭavat 
u dyotaka  ra  stvāha  gavādiṣvanuvṛttipratyayaḥ piṇḍādivyatiriktani
mittabhāvī  viśeṣattvānnīlādipratyayavat  tacca nimittaṃ samānavyaktikaraṇāta
sāmānyamityucyate 
atrāpi na tāvatsamānānā marthāntareṇa samānarūpatā kriyate tathaiva niṣpannatvā
da  vyasamānānāmiti darśayannāha  arthāntaramiti sattā gotvādikaṃ na teṣāṃ
vyaktibhedānāṃ sāmānyama
tadrūpatvāt  teṣāṃ bhedānāmasamānarūpatvāt  samānānāṃ ca
bhāvaḥ sāmānyamiṣyate 
athavā'tadrūpatvād vyaktibhyorthāntaratvādekatvavat  athārthāntaramapi bahuṣu
samavetamiti yadi tatteṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ  tadā dvitvādikāryadravyeṣvapi prasaṃgo dvitva
mapi hyanekadravyasamavetam  ādigrahaṇād bahutvādiḥ  tathā saṃyogonekadravyasamavetaḥ 
kāryadravyaṃ cāvayavisaṃjñitamārambhakadravyeṣu samavetamato dvitvādiṣu sāmānyarūpatā
prasaṃgaḥ  yasmin nārthāntare sati samānā bhedā bhavanti tadeva sāmānyaṃ na
sarvamityatrāha  na hi  yasmāt sambandhinānyenārthānta'reṇaikatvalakṣaṇenānye'
samānā bhinnā na samānā naikotriyante bhinnābhinnasamānabhāvakaraṇe taṃdanu 
payogāt  bhinnadeśādīnāṃ pratibhāsanācca kathaṃ samānā eva bhavanti  kevalaṃ
tadvanta eka dharmavantaḥ syurbhedāḥ  bhūtāni grahanakṣatrāṇi teṣāṃ kaṇṭhe dīrghā guṇo
syuḥ  bhūtānāṃ kaṇṭhaguṇavat  nābhinnapratyayaviṣayāḥ  bhūtavat  tadātmāna
meva saṃsṛjantī buddhi sāmānyaviṣayā pratibhāsate  naikasambandhināviti bhūtavat 
rcanārthaṃ nibadhyate  tenaikena kaṇṭhe guṇena yathā bhūtāni tadvanti na tvekībhavanti
tadvadvayaktayopi 
nanu guṇasya mūrttatvād tadvattā pratītiryuktā  na vyaktiṣu sāmānyasyāmūrtta b
tvāditi cet  na  tatsamavetatvasyeṣṭatvādarthāntarabhāvasya ca  yataścai
kasambandhepi na samānā vyaktayastata eva nābhinnapratyayaviṣayāḥ ekākārajñāna
syābhrāntasya na viṣayāḥ  bhūtavat  yathā bhūtānyaguṇasvabhāvāni naikaguṇākāra
pratyayaviṣayaḥ  tadvat  evantāvadanekasambandhepyarthāntaraṃ na teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ
dvitvādiṣa prasaṅgaditi sthitaṃ    pratīyante ca samānā iti  tasmāt tadātmāna
meva hi tayorbhedayorātmānameva  ekarūpamidaṃ dvayamityekāṃśena svagatena saṃsṛjantī
buddhi sāmānyaviṣayā pratibhāsate  naikasambandhināvityekena sāmānyena samba
ndhināvetāviti naivambuddhi pratibhāsate yena sāmānyamarthāntarampramāṇasiddhaṃ syāt 
bhūtavaditi vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ  yathā buddhirbhūtānyekena guṇena sambaddhāni gṛhṇāti
naivamityarthaḥ 
yadvā yathā bhūtānyekasambandhīni tathā bhinnāvekasambandhināviti sāmānya
viṣayā buddhiḥ pratibhāsata iti naivaṃ 
atha syāt  sāmānyaṃ hi vyaktīnāmviśeṣaṇaṃ  viśeṣaṇaṃ ca viśeṣe svānu
raktāṃ buddhi janayatyato nāsya vyaktibhyorthāntarabhāvena pratibhāsaḥ 
nanu viśeṣaṇatvepi tasya na viśeṣyeṇa sa haikyaṃ daṇḍasyeva daṇḍinā tatkathamabheda
pratibhāsaḥ  abhedāṃśenāpyekatvānna viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ 
tasmāt sāmānyasya
vyaktyabhedapratītirbhrāntireva 
atha sarvadaivaṃ pratīterabhrāntiḥ  tadāha 
yo hyanyarūpasaṃvedyaḥ samvedyetānyathā punaḥ 
sa mithyā na tu tenaiva yo nityamavagamyata iti 
tadayuktaṃ  tasya vyaktyabhinnatvameva syāt  gorgotvamiti pratītibhedā
bhyupagamācca  na ca lākṣāsphaṭikyoriva jātitadvatoḥ saṃsargāvagatirabhrāntiḥ 
alākṣārūpasya sphaṭikasya lākṣārūpeṇa gaterbhrāntatvāt  evaṃ jātitadvatorekatva

A
taddaśinyāḥ sā bhrāntiriti cet  tarśinīti kutaḥ  nirbījabhrānte
rayogāditi cet  ta eva tadekakāryā bījaṃ bhrānteḥ  saṃkhyāsaṃyogakāryadravyādi
vastubhūtadiṣvapyabhāvāt  tat tathā sāmānye niveśābhāvāt na sāmānyamanyat 
sati vā tasyāpi svātmani avasthānād amiśramaṇamanyena  tasmād ime bhāvāḥ sajātī
graho bhrāntiḥ sāmānyaṃ kevalaṃ paśyatyeva buddhiḥ  tasyāstu taddeśinyāḥ samavāyasya
sūkṣmatvāt sā bhrāntiryadetad vyaktīnāṃ sāmānyābhedena grahaṇamiti cet  taddarśinī
ti kutaḥ  pāramārthika sāmānyadarśinī sā buddhiriti kuto niścaya sarvadāsyā
vyaktyabhedaviṣayatvāt  nāsyā bojamastīti nirbījā tathā cāsau bhrāntiśca
tasyā ayogāt  na hi bhrāntirutpadyamānā ninimittā ghaṭate  jalādibhrānti
vat bhrāntiśceyamasaṃsṛṣṭānapi bhāvān saṃsṛjantī buddhiratosyā nimittena bhavitavyaṃ
 yattannimittantat sāmānyamityatrāha  ta eva bhedāstatsāmānyajñānādyekaṅkāryaṃ
yeṣānte tadekakāryā bījaṃ bhrānteḥ  etacca pratipādayiṣyate 
na ca sāmānyaṃ dṛṣṭātadāropeṇa vyaktiṣvekākārā bhrāntiryujyate  tathā hi
   sādṛśyaṃ bhrāntikāraṇamatyantavilakṣaṇaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ vyaktibhyastasyāvarṇasaṃsthā
nākāratvād vyaktīnāṃ ca varṇasaṃsthānākāratvāt 
atha syāt    na sāmānyasya sādṛśyanimitto bhedeṣvāropopi tvekāntena
a bhinteṣu sa evāyamityekatvāvasāyavibhramo naikarūpamantareṇeti brūmaḥ  yadyevamekena
sambandhina ityeva kṛtvā vināpi bhrāntinimittena yadyekākārabhrāntiviṣayā
bhavanti  tadā saṃkhyā ca saṃyogaśca kāryadravyaṃ cādiśabdād vibhāgādi caikambastu
vidyate yeṣānte tadvantasteṣu bhūteṣu caikaguṇena yukteṣu syādekākārā bhrāntiḥ  na
ca bhavati  ato vyaktīnāmapi naikatvanimittā bhrāntiriti  taditi tasmād
yathā vyaktibhyo bhedeneṣṭaṃ sāmānyaṃ tathā sāmānyabuddhau niveśābhāvāt pratibhāsābhā
vānna sāmānyamanyat  sati vā sāmānye tasyāpi sāmānyasya svātmani
svasmin svabhāve'vasthānādamiśraṇamanyena vyaktirūpeṇa  vyaktiṣvanavasthānānna
dharmarūpatvantasyetyarthaḥ  tasmāditi svasvabhāvavyavasthānād ime bhāvā ghaṭādaya
sajātīyābhimatāt tulyākāratvenā bhimatād anyasmācceti vijātīyādi
vyatiriktāḥ pṛthagbhūtāḥ svabhāvena prakṛtyaikarūpatvāt  svasvabhāvavyavasthiteriti
yāvat 
dvitīyakārikārthamāha  yato yato bhinnāste bhāvāstasmād bhedastadbhedaḥ 
tasmād bhinnāḥ svabhāvāstasya pratyāyanāya pratibhinnasvabhāvaṃ kṛtasanniveśaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyacintā
yābhimatāt anyasmācca vyatiriktāḥ svabhāvenaikarūpatvāt 
yato yato bhinnāḥ tadbhedapratyāyanāya kṛtasaniveśa śabda tatastato bheda
mupādāya anekadharmāṇaḥ abhede'pyarthāḥ pratīyante  te'pi śabdāḥ sarvabhedānākṣe 
pe'pi ekabhedacodanāt svalakṣaṇaniṣṭhā eva bhavanti  tadekasmādapi tasya bhedo
istoti 
tasmāt ekasya bhāvasya yāvanti pararūpāṇi tāvatyaḥ vyāvṛttayaḥ tadapekṣayā 
tadasambhavikāryakāraṇastasya tadbhedāt  yāvatyaśca vyāvṛttayastāvatyaḥ śrutayo'tatkārya
kṛtasaṃketaiḥ śabda karaṇabhūtairanekadharmāṇaḥ kṛtakatvādidhammavantaḥ pratīyante svabhāvā
bhedepi  na hyekasya svalakṣaṇasya svabhāvanānātvamasti  kathantarhyanekadharmatvamityāha 
tatastato bhedamupādāyeti    yato yato vyāvṛttāstatastato bhedamupādāyāśritya
tepi śabdā ye tasya tasya bhedasya bhinnaskbhāvasya khyāpanāya kṛtasaṃketāsteṣvasmin
bhinne svabhāve vācakatvena niyatāḥ  tato naikaḥ śabdaḥ sarvān bhinnasva bhāvānākṣi
patyatastepi śabdāḥ pratyekantaiḥ sarvabhedānākṣepepi  ekabhedacodanā dekaikasya bhinnasya
svabhāvasya codanāttatsvalakṣaṇaniṣṭhā eva bhavanti  yasya svalakṣaṇasya sa svabhāvo
nyasmād bhinno yaḥ śabdenādhyavasīyate  tacca tatsvalakṣaṇaṃ ca  taniṣṭhā eva
tadviṣayā eva bhavanti 
nanu bāhyatayādhyavasitortha  śabdapratibhāsī sādhāraṇonya evānyacca sādhāraṇaṃ
svalakṣaṇantatkathantanniṣṭhā ityatrāha  tadekasmādapi yato yato vyāvṛttortha  śabda
viṣayīkriyate tasmāttasmādatatkāraṇādatatkāryāccaikasmādapi tasya svalakṣaṇasyā
nakavyāvṛttasya bhedostīti kṛtvā tadviṣayā ucyante na tu tadviṣayā eva  yadvā tasya
vyāvṛttyāśrayasya dharmasya yat svalakṣaṇantanniṣṭhā eva tatprāptiparyavasānā eva
bhavanti  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ    tadekasmādapi tasya bhedostīti vyākhyātameva 
upasaṃharannāha tasmāditi  yasmāt sajātīyavijātīyād vyāvṛttista
smādekasya bhāvasya yāvanti pararūpāṇi tāvatyastadapekṣayā  pararūpāpekṣayā  pararū
pebhyo vyāvṛttayaḥ kalpitā dharmabhedāḥ  vyāvarttate vijātīyamebhiriti kṛtvā    b
ki kāraṇaṃ    tasmin vyāvatyeṃ'vadhibhūte dharmiṇyasambhavi kārya kāraṇaṃ ca yasya
vivakṣitasya dharmiṇaḥ sa tadasambhavikāryakāraṇastasya tadbhavāt  tasmādatatkāryā
datatkāraṇācca bhedād vyāvṛttatvāt  yāvatyaśca vyāvṛttayastāvatyaḥ śrutayo nive
kāraṇaparihāreṇa vyavahārārthāḥ  yathā śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śrāvaṇo'tatkā
ryakāraṇaparihārthaḥ 
tasmāt svabhāvā'bhede'pi yo viśeṣo bhedo dharmiṇā nāmnā pratīyate na sa

tayorātmani sambandhādekajñāne dvayagrahaḥ

vasthitiḥ

prayojanaṃ 
etaduktambhavati  yadānyavyāvattarūpanirākāṅkṣa pratipattāśvādevaikasmād

ṇo'prādhānyādanyavyāvṛttarūpānākṣepaḥ kṛto bhavatyaśvādevaikasmād vyāvṛttiśca

na caivampareṇa jijñāsitamajijñāsitaṃ ca kathayan kathannonmattaḥ syāt

yan kathannonmattaḥ  sarvaśca śābdo vyavahāraḥ saṃketapūrvaka saṃketaśca vikalpakalpi

nirākāṃkṣatvācca 
dvitīye tu bhavati  tathā saṃketānusāreṇa saṃhṛtasakalavyavacchedadharmeṃ vibhāga
vata ekasyeva saṃdarśanena pratibhāsanāt vyavacchedāntarāpekṣatvācca 
bhedoyasmeva sarvvatra dravyabhāvābhidhāyinoḥ 
śabdayorna tayorvācye viśeṣastena kaścana 
tasmāt sarvatra dharmadharmābhidhāyi śabde vācye'yeṃ niścayapratyayaviṣayatvena na
buddhirutpadyate tato na sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti  dharmāntarapratikṣepādeva tadanyeṣu

vā śuklo gauriti  sāmānādhikaraṇye kāraṇamāha  tathetyādi  tathā saṃketānusā
reṇetyapratikṣiptabhedāntare vastuni dharmiśabdasya ke tānusāreṇa hetunā  ekasmin

vantandharmiṇamekamiva sandarśayantī buddhi pratibhāsata iti yāvat  na tu buddhi
pratibhāsasandarśito dharmī vastuta ekaḥ    vikalpanirmitasya dharmadharmavibhāga 
syālīkatvāt  ekasyaivetyapi paṭhanti  tatrāpi pratipattradhyavasāyavaśādeva yukta

 sāmānyacintā
jñāpayati pratikṣiptabhedāntaraḥ anyo'pratikṣepeṇa
jijñāpayiṣurarthantaṃ taddhitena kṛtāpi vā 
anyena vā yadi brūyādbhedo nāsti tato'paraḥ 
etāvantaṃ darśayet tathābhūtajñāpa nāya  pāka iti taddhitenāpi darśayituṃ yogyaṃ
pacedapa iti kṛdvatā 'pi svakṛtasamayāntareṇāpi  tathābhidhā namātreṇa

dharmaśabdastamityagovyavacchinnaṃ  pratikṣiptaṃ bhedāntaraṃ yena dharmaśabdena sa tathoktaḥ 
anya iti dharmiśabdo'pratikṣepeṇa tameva piṇḍaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena gamayatīti nāsti

gacchati devadatta iti na kaścana bheda ityanyatrāpyevaṃ yojyaṃ 
yāpi jātiguṇakriyāsambandhabhedena catuṣṭhayī śabdānāṃ vṛttiḥ sāpyanenaiva
vastugatadharmabhedena saṃgṛhītetyāha jijñāpayiṣurityādi  jñāpayitumicchurarthantambhe
dāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇaṃ  taddhitena taddhitapratyayāntena  kṛtāpi vā  kṛtsaṃ
jñakapratyayāntena vā anyena vā kṛttaddhitavyatiriktena tiṅantenā'vyutpanna vā
śabdena śuklādinā yadi brūyāt  tato bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepalakṣaṇād viśeṣā
daparo bhedo nāsti 
tadvayācaṣṭe  etāvantamityādinā  etāvantamiti pratikṣiptabhedāntaralakṣaṇaṃ 
kṛtāpi vā  darśayediti sambandhaḥ 
yadā vādhiśrayaṇādikriyāyāṃ kartṛsthāyāmpacirvarttate  tatraiva ca ghañpratyaya
stadā pācakatvaśabdena kriyākārakayoḥ sambandhaḥ samavāyobhidhīyata iti pāca
katvaśabdena samānārtha pākaśabdaḥ  dvāvapyetau pratikṣiptabhedāntaramapācakavyava
cchinnamarthaṃ pratipādayataḥ  yadā tu karmasthaiva kriyā viklṛttiḥ pacerarthastadā
pācakatvaśabdasya kathaṃ sambandhābhidhāyitvaṃ  pācakatvapākayobhinnārthatvāt 
anyena vā kṛttaddhitavyatiriktena tiṅādinā  tathābhūtajñāpanāya  pratikṣipta
arthāntarameva syāt  tathābhūtajñāpanāya śabdasya kṛtasaṃketatvāt 
nanu ca pācakasya pākakriyāyā na saṃbaṃdhaḥ  yathoktam   na vai pākenānya eva
pācakaḥ kaścid abhighīyate  yat punarasyābhiṣeyaṃ tabevābhidheyam  tadeva
pācaka tve nāpyabhidhīyate apratiṣṭhitai mithyāvikalpā dharmāḥ 
bhedāntarajñāpanāya svayaṃ kṛtena samayena darśayediti sambandhaḥ  yathā devadattena śayyate
paṭasya śuklatvamiti  atrāpi śāyakaśabdasya ya evārthaḥ sa eva pratikṣiptabhedāntaraḥ 
śayyata ityasyāpi  tathā śukla paṭa iti ya evāśuklavyavacchinno pratikṣiptabhe

rbhavatīti sambandha  kiṅkāraṇaṃ    tathābhūtasyaiva pratikṣiptāpratikṣiptabhedāntara

nanu cetyādi paraḥ  sambandha ucyata iti pākakriyāyāḥ pācakasya ca kartuḥ
sambandhaḥ samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ  tathā hi kṛdantād bhāvapratyayaḥ sambandhasyābhidhāyako

yathā jñāyate kriyā vyatiriktā na tatsamavāyo veti 
tenā'nyāpohaviṣaye tadvatpakṣopavarṇanam 
pratyākhyātaṃ pṛthaktve hi syādoṣo jātitadvatoḥ 
viśiṣṭasyārthasya śabdarabhidhānādanyāpohe'pi tadvatpakṣovitaḥ savaḥ
prasaṃga 'tulya syāt iti yaduktaṃ tadapi anena prativyūḍham  tatra hi
śabdābhidheyaṃ pācakatvenāpyabhidhīyata ityadhyāhāryaḥ  tasyaiva pratikṣiptabhedāntara
syābhidhānāt  na tu sambandhobhidhīyate  tasyāsattvāt  tadeva yathoktaṃ pācaka
śabdābhidheyaṃ pākaśabdenāpītyapiśabdāt 
aparaṃ vyākhyānaṃ  na vai pākeneti pākaśabdenānyāpohavādipakṣe anya eva
vyatirikta kriyāśrayabhūtaḥ pācakobhidhīyate  yādṛśo varṇyate pareṇa    yaḥ kriyā
kārakasambandhasyāśrayaḥ syāt  tasyāsiddhatvāt  kintvapācakavyāvṛttirbhedāntara
pratikṣepeṇābhidhīyate  tadevāha  yatpunarityādi  yadityapācakavyāvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ
pratikṣiptabhedāntaramabhidheyaṃ  asyeti pākaśabdasyānantarameva darśitaṃ tadeva pāka
śabdābhidheyampācakatvaśabdenāpyabhidhīyate  na sambandhaḥ  tasyāsiddhatvāt 
apratiṣṭhitairavastubalāyātaṃrata eva mithyāvikalpāḥ 
kathampunargamyate kriyā vyatiriktā nāsti tatsamavāyo vetyata āha  yathe
tyādi  tatsamavāyo veti kriyākārakasamavāyaḥ  yataśca vyāvṛttivyāvṛttimato
rabhedastena kāraṇenānyāpohaviṣayo jātimān śabdarabhidhīyata iti  tadva a
tapakṣastatra yo doṣaḥ sonyāpohepi syāditi tadvatpakṣopavarṇanaṃ pratyākhyātaṃ 
yasmāt pṛthakatve hi jātitadvatorabhyupagamyamāne syāt tadvatpakṣodito doṣaḥ 
tadviśiṣṭasyetyanyāpohaviśiṣṭasyārthasya śabdarabhidhānāt tadvatpakṣodita iti
tadvatpakṣe ya uktaḥ  yathā kila sāmānyamabhidhāya tadvati varttamānaḥ śabdo'svatantraḥ
syātta taśca śabdapravṛttinimittabhūtena sāmānyena vaśīkṛtasya śabdasya vyaktigata
parasparabhedānākṣepāttaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt  upacaritā ca tadvati śabdapra
vṛttirityādiko doṣa ityevaṃ vyāvṛttimabhidhāya tadvati varttamānosvatantro dhvani
riti sarva prasaṃga syāt  tadapi tadvatpakṣopavarṇanaṃ  aneneti vyāvṛttivyāvṛtti
matorananyatvena prativyūḍhaṃ pratyākhyātaṃ  yasmāt tatra hi tadvatpakṣe  arthāntaramu
pābāyeti vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyamupādāyānyatrārthāntare tadvati  sākṣāt sāmānyavato
'nabhidhānādasvātantryaṃ  ādiśabdādasamānādhikaraṇyopacāradoṣaparigrahaḥ

kathamidānīṃ ekasya vyāvṛttasya anyānanugamāt anyavyāvṛttiḥ sāmānyam

ihāmi dārādāvekavacana mekasyāḥ striyā vastvabhedāt  yata evaṃ na vastvaśaktyā
śrayo vā śabdapravṛttibhedaḥ  tasmādayaṃ śabdapravṛttiniyamo nirvastuko bāhyavastva
nāśrayaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ puruṣecchāyāḥ svātantryaṃ śabdaprayoge syāpayati 
ṣaṇṇāṃ nagarāṇāṃ samāhāraḥ kriyātmako guṇātmako vā  ekosti tata eka
vacanamiti cedāha  nahi nagarāṇyeva kiciditi nagarāvayavidravyasyānabhyupagamāt
ob kutasteṣānnagarāṇāṃ samāhāraḥ kriyātmako guṇātmako vā yata evamabhidhīyeta kriyā
guṇayordravyāśritatvāt  kiṃ punadravyamityāha  prāsādetyādi  gṛhādisamudāyo
nagaraṃ  vijātīyānāṃ ca prāsādīdānāṃ dravyārambhānabhyupagamāt kutastatsamudāya
prāsādādisamudāyo nagaraṃ dravyaṃ syāt  yāvatā prāsādatoraṇapuruṣādīnāṃ samudāyo
nagaramiṣyate  teṣāṃ prāsādādīnāṃ samastānāmasaṃyogācca kāraṇānna garandravyaṃ 
saṃyogasahāyānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ dravyārambhakatvamiṣyate  na prāsādapuruṣakuḍyādīnāṃ
viśliṣṭānāṃ saṃyogosti  yena prāsādādijanyaṃ nagarandravyaṃ syāt 
syānmataṃ    yadyapi sākalyena prāsādādīnāṃ nāsti saṃyogastathāpi yeṣāṃ
tāvat prāsādapuruṣādīnāṃ parasparaṃ saṃyogastatsaṃyogātmakaṃ nagarambhaviṣyatyevamapi

na saṃyogaḥ  prāsādaḥ svayameva saṃyogasvabhāvaḥ pareṇāsaṃyogācca  tata eva saṃkhyā
bhāvaḥ tatsaṃyogena puruṣaiśca viśiṣṭā sattā hi nagaramiti cet kimasyā
niratiśayāyā' viśeṣaṇam  sattāyāścaikatvāt  nagarabahutve'pi nagarāṇīti
bahuvacanaṃ na syāt  dvayasya parasparasahitateti cet  anupakāryopakārayoḥ ka
vastutvaṃ nagarasyāsiddhaṃ saṃyogasya guṇapadārthatvādityata āha  na saṃyoga ityādi 
na saṃyogasvabhāvantagaraṃ  tathā kāṣṭheṣṭakādīnāmvijātīyānāṃ kāryadravyānārambhāt
prāsādopi na dravyātmakaḥ kintu saṃyogasvabhāva iṣyate  saṃyogaśca guṇo nirguṇāśca
guṇā iti kutaḥ prāsādasya saṃyogo yena tatsaṃyogātmakaṃ nagaraṃ syāt 
etadevāha  prāsādasyetyādi  patyarthāntareṇāsaṃyogācca na saṃyogo
nagaraṃ  cakāreṇānantaranirdiṣṭāt prāsādādīnāṃ viśliṣṭānāmasaṃyogācca na
saṃyogo nagarabhityetat samuccīyate  tadevaṃ prāsādādīnāmubhayathā saṃyogābhāvena 
nagarasya saṃyogasvabhāvatā nirastā 
prāsādādīnāṃ yā saṃkhyā tadātmakaṃ nagarambhaviṣyatīti cedāha  tata eva
saṃkhyābhāva iti  yasmāt saṃyogātmakaprāsādastata eva kāraṇāt prāsādasya
saṃkhyāyā abhāvo nirguṇatvād guṇānāṃ  saṃkhyāpi hi guṇasvabhāvā  sa cāsau
saṃyogaśca tatsaṃyogaḥ  prāsādātmakaḥ saṃyoga ityarthaḥ  tatsaṃyogena puruṣaiśca viśiṣṭā
yā sattā sā nagaramiti cet  kimasyāḥ sattāyā ekatvānnityatvācca nirati
śayāyā viśeṣaṇaṃ  na hi prāsādapuruṣādaya sattāṃ viśiṣanti  anādheyātiśaya
tvāt  tasmāt sattā nirviśeṣaṇā  tasyā nagaratve sarvatra nagaratvaṃ syādityabhi
prāyaḥ  sattāyāścaikatvāditi  dravyaguṇakarmasvekeṃva sattā vyāpinī  nagarabahutvepi
nagaravyavasthāśrayāṇāṃ prāsādādisamudāyānāṃ bahutvepītyartha  anyathā sattātmake
nagare prakṛte nagarabahutvaṃ kathaṃ syāt  dvayasyeti prāsādapuruṣāde sattāyāśca
yā parasparasahitatā sā nagaramiti cet  evaṃ hi sati na sarvatra nagarabuddhiḥ 
prāsādādīnāṃ sarvatrābhāvāt  prāsādādibahutvād bahuvacanaṃ ca siddhamiti
paro manyate 
uttaramāha  anupakāryetyādi  anupakāryopakārakayoḥ sattāprāsādayoḥ
kassahāyībhāvaḥ  tathā hi dvividhaḥ sahakārārthaḥ parasparātiśayādhānena santāne a
viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādanalakṣaṇa pūrvasvahetoreva samarthānāmutpannānāmekakāryakriyā
byedpapo mayinpadagla upakāryānupakārakayoḥ
kathaṃ nagaramiti ekavacanaṃ
syāt  tathābhūtānāṃ kvacidarthe 'bhinnā śaktiḥ sā nimittamiti cet  na  śakte
vastusvarūpāvyatirekāt 
artha vyatiriktāyā api anupakāro'pārataṃtryāt  śakterupakāre vā śaktyu
pakāriṇyāḥ śakterapi vyatireke'navasthānāt apratipattiḥ  tadavyatireke vā
ādyāyāṃ prasaṃga iti yatkiñcidetat  khasya svabhāvaḥ khatvamiti vyatirekāśrayā
lakṣaṇaśca  na tāvatpūrvaḥ sattāyā anādheyātiśayatvāt  nāpi dvitīyo yasmād yathā
sattā kevalā nagarabuddhijananaṃ pratyasamarthā tathā prāsādādisahitāpi sāmarthya vā
kevalāpi janayet  yadi ca dvayasya paraspara sahitatā nagaraṃ  tadaikamapi nagaramanekā
tmakaṃ prāsādādyātmakatvāt  tataḥ puruṣasaṃyogasattānāmbahutvāt  nagaramityekavacanaṃ
syāt  saṃyogaśabdena prāsādātmakaḥ saṃyoga uktaḥ tathābhūtānāmiti parasparasahitānāṃ
puruṣasaṃyogasattānāṃ kvacidartha iti nagaramiti vijñāne  śabde ca niṣpādye 
abhinekā śaktirasti   setyabhinnā śaktinimittamekavacanasyeti cet  na  kiṃ
kāraṇaṃ  śaktervastu svarūpāvyatirekāt  puruṣādibhyo vasturūpebhyo'vyatirekāt 
tadvadevānekatvamiti kutastadāśrayamekavacanaṃ  vastusvarūpād vyatireke vā śakte
rabhyupamyamagāne puruṣasaṃyogasattābhiranupakāryasya śaktirūpasya puruṣādipāratantryanna
syāt  tataśca puruṣādīnāṃ śaktiriti sambandho na syāditi bhāvaḥ 
atha vyatiriktāyā api śakteḥ puruṣādipāratantryasiddhayarthaṃ puruṣādikṛta upakāra
iṣyate  tadā śakterupakāre vā puruṣādikṛte iṣyamāṇe  yayā śaktyā puruṣādayaḥ
prathamaṃ śaktimupakurvate  tasyāḥ prathamaśaktyupakāriṇyā api śakte śaktervyatireke
navasthā syādavyatireke vā ādyāyāmadhye kavacananibandhanatveneṣṭāyāṃ śaktāva
vyatirekaprasaṃgaḥ avyatireke ca vastuvadeva bāhulyamiti tadavastho bahuṣu bahuvacana
prasaṃga iti yatkiñcidetat    śaktiparikalpane khasya svabhāva iti vyatirekāśrayā
ṣaṣṭhī na syāt  ṣaṣṭhīkāraṇatvād bhāvapratyayopyupacārāt ṣaṣṭhīśabdenoktaḥ 
tenāyamaparorthaḥ khatvamiti vyatirekācayā taddhitotpattirna syāditi khasya svabhāvaḥ
khatvamityanayā vyutpattyā bhāvapratyayasyotpattervyatirekāśrayatvaṃ 
athavā yathāyogaṃ sambandho granthacchedaśca kārya  khatvamiti vyatirekāśrayā
ṣaṣṭhī ca na syāt na tatra sāmānyam  nāpi vibhutvādayo guṇāḥ
tathocyate  arthāntarasya tatsvabhāva tvāyogāt  teṣāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatva
prasaṃgāt  tasyāpi arthāntarasvabhāvatvatimi cet atiprasaṃga syāt  tathāpi
apratipattiḥ 
evaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ padārthānāṃ ṣaṭpadārthavargādiṣvapi vācyāḥ  na hi tatra sāmānyaṃ
na syāt taddhitotpattirityadhyāhāraḥ  khasya svabhāva iti ṣaṣṭhī na syāditi  na
hi khaśabdavācyād arthādanyaḥ svabhāvosti bhāvo vā  yo yathākramaṃ vyatireka
ṣaṣṭhyāstaddhitasya vā nibandhanaṃ syāt  khatvaṃ nāma sāmānyamasti tadvyatireka
nibandhanamiti cedāha  na tatretyādi  ekātmakatvāt khasya nāsmin khatvasāmānyaṃ
   yadyapi sattvaṃ dravyatvaṃ cākāśesti  tathāpi na tat khasya svabhāvaḥ  ghaṭādi
sādhāraṇatvāt  nāpi sattvadravyatve khatvamityatra bhāvapratyayasya nibandhanaṃ  tayoḥ

kāraṇamiṣṭaṃ  nāpi vibhutvādayo guṇā iti  ādiśabdādekatvaparatvādiparigrahaḥ 
tathocyata iti khasya svabhāva iti  dravyādarthāntarasya vibhutvāderguṇasya tatsvabhāva
tvāyogād ākāśasvabhāvatvāyogāt  na hyarthāntaramarthāntarasya svabhāvo yuktaḥ 
yadi ca vibhutvādaya ākāśa svabhāvāḥ  tadā teṣāṃ ca vibhutvādīnāmākāśasvabhāvatve
niḥsvabhāvatvaprasaṃgāt  tathā hi yasteṣāṃ guṇasvabhāva satyākāśameva jātaṃ na
cāparasvabhāvostīti niḥsvabhāvatā syāt  teṣāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatve ākāśasya

naiva  tavevedamityevamākāraṃ mithyāpratyayaṃ janayantīti sambandha  kimviśiṣṭa
mityāha  tadityādi  tebhyo'tatkāryebhyo yā vyāvṛttirekārthakriyākāriṇāma
rthānāṃ sā viṣayo yasya dhvanestena saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsaktaṃ sābhilāpamiti yāvat 
yadi vastudharmmatayā janayanti kinna sarvadetyāha  svānubhavetyādi  teṣā
mbhāvānāṃ yaḥ svonubhava pūrvamutpannastena yā pratyabhijñānotpattaye vāsanā śakti
lakṣaṇāditā  tasyāḥ prabodha kāryotpādanaṃpratyābhimukhyantasyāśca prabodha punasta
jjātīyapadārthānubhavāt  evaṃlakṣaṇaśca prabodho na sarvakālamato na sadā pratyabhi
jñānasambhava iti  saṃsṛṣṭabhedamiti pūrvapaścādṛṣṭayorvyaktyorbhedaḥ saṃsṛṣṭa ekīkṛto
yena sa tathā  anyatheti yadyekakāryatvena sādṛśyenaikatvamāropya bhinneṣvapi bhrāntaṃ
pratyabhijñānaṃ neṣyate  api tvekasāmānyayogāt tadā na bhedasaṃsargavatī  bhedānāṃ
a saṃsarga ekarūpatāpādanantadvatī buddhirna syāt  bahuṣvekarūpā buddhirna syādityartha 
na hyekena vaṇḍena yuktā api daṇḍina ekatvena gṛhyante  tadevāha    yathā
daṇḍiṇviti  na hītyetadeva vyanakti  tatreti daṇḍiṣu  anyatreti ekasmād
daṇḍinonyasmin daṇḍini  taddaṇḍadravyaṃ yadekadaṇḍini dṛṣṭantadiha dvitīye daṇḍinītyevaṃ
syāt  na tu taddvāreṇa sa evāyandaṇḍīti  yadvā yathā bahuṣvekadaṇḍayogāt 
pratyekamayamapi daṇḍastathā sa evāyanda ṇḍa iti na bhavati pratotistadvat  vyaktī sāmānyacintā
jñānam  tadevedamityatha katham  anyadasti  tataḥ ekaṃ anekatra paśyato'pi
bhedasaṃsargavat na yuktam  vibhramavaśāt tathā pratibhāsane hi avirodhaḥ 
nimittābhāvāt vibhramo na yukta iti cet  ta eva tadekārthakāriṇo
bhāvā anubhavadvāreṇa prakṛtyā vibhramaphalāyā vikalpavāsanāhetutvāt nimittam 
marīcikādiṣu jalādibhrānter bhinnāvapi abhinnākārasya parāmarśapratyayasya
nāmapyekasāmānyayogānna sa evāyamiti pratītiḥ syādapi tu tadiheti 
bhavatvevamiti cedāha  naivamityādi  tadityādinopasaṃhāraḥ  ekamiti
samānamanekatra vyaktiṣu paśyato'pi puṃso bhedasaṃsargavat  bhedānāṃ saṃsarga ekākāratā
tadvajjñānaṃ na yuktaṃ  anyāpohavādinastvayamadoṣa ityāha  vibhrametyādi 
bhrāntisāmarthyādityarthaḥ  tathetyekarūpatayā vastubhūtamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratyabhijñānasya
nimittantasyābhāvād vibhramo na yuktamiti cet  ta eveti vyāvṛttā bhāvāstasya
jñānāderekasyārthasya kāriṇa karaṇaśīlāḥ  anubhava eva dvāraṃ hetustena prakṛtyā
svabhāvena vibhramaphalāyā bhrāntiphalāyā hetutvānnimittaṃ 
nanu marīcikādiṣu jalādibhrāṃteḥ sādṛśyamantareṇotpattāvatiprasaṃgaḥ 
sādṛśyaṃ cediṣyate sāmānyamapi kasmānneṣyata ityāha  marīcikādiṣvityādi 
prathamenādiśabdena rajvādiparigrahaḥ  dvitīyena sarpādibhrānteḥ  tāveveti jala
marīcikārūpa bhāvo abhinnākārasya tadevedaṃ jalamityevaṃ rūpamparāmarśapratyayasya
nimittabhūto yo nubhavastasya janakau kāraṇaṃ bhinnāvapi 
etaduktambhavatyasadṛśānāntāvanna sādṛśyamasti  sadṛśānāmapi sadṛśameva
svarūpaṃ bhrāntinimittaṃ  na tu sādṛśyaṃ  tathā hi jalānubhavajñānantāva t  jalākāra
parāmarśavāsanāmādhatte sā ca vāsanā yathā punarjalasvalakṣaṇānubhavena prabodhyate 
tathā marīcikākhya padārthānubhavenāpi prakṛtyā  tasya tatsvabhāvatvāt  tato yathā
jalānubhavājjalākāraparāmarśapratyaya ucyate  tathā marīcikānubhavādapi  ataśca
tau jalamarīcikākhyau bhāvānubhavadvāreṇa jalabhrāntenimittaṃ bhavataḥ  na cātiprasaṅgaḥ 
tulyepyajalarūpatve marīcikāsvarūpasya svahetubhya eva sādṛśyotpannatvānna tu
sādṛśyayogāt sadṛśo bhavatīti sāmānyaprastāve nyāyasyoktatvāt 
evantāvad udyotaka rā dimataṃ nirākṛtya mī māṃ sa ka mataṃ nirākarttumāha 
na hotyādi  tathā hi jalajñāne dvayaṃ pratibhāsate jalasāmānyantasya ca deśādisa

b
nimittānubhavajanako kāraṇam  na tatrānyadeva kiṃcit sāmānyaṃ tathā pratyaya
bhūtam  sattve vā sadarthagrāhiṇī buddhiḥ bhrāntinaṃ syāt 
abhūtākārasamāropāv āntiriti cet  na  tatsāmānyaprāhiṇī sā
bhavati  yameva cākāramiyaṃ āropayati sa eva tasya viṣayaḥ  aviṣayīkṛtasya
samāropo 'sāmarthyāt  ākārāntaravat  sa ca tatra nāstyata sāmānyaṃ na vidyate 
mbandhitvantato neti bādhake pratyaye na deśādisambandhitvaṃ bādhyate na jalasāmānyamato
b jalajñānaṃ sāmānyālambanamevetyata ucyate  na tatra marīcikāsu anyadeveti bhinnaṃ
kiṃcit sāmānyaṃ jalasāmānyantatheti jalarūpeṇa  sattve vā jalasāmānyasyābhyu
pagamyamāne vastubhūtasāmānyagrāhitvena sadarthagrāhiṇī buddhiḥ 
atha syād  anyadeśādyavasthitajalasāmānyālambikaiva jalabuddhirna bhrāntista
duktaṃ   
sarvatrālambanaṃ bāhya deśakālānyathātmakamiti  '
kathantarhi marīcikāyāṃ jalapratītirbhrāntiranyadeśādyavasthitasya jalasāmānyasya
tatra samāropāditi cet  etadevāha  abhūtetyādi  marīcikāsvavidyamānasya
jalākārasya samāropād bhrāntiḥ 
netyādi siddhānta vā dī  tatsāmānyagrāhiṇī anyadeśāvasthitajalasāmānya
grāhiṇī sā jalabuddhirna bhavati  kasmādityāha  yameva cetyādi  yamevākāra
mityabhūtaṃ ' jalākāramiyaṃ jalabuddhistatra marīcikāsvāropayati  āropyamāṇa
syāpi kasmād viṣayatvamityata āha  aviṣayīkṛtasyetyādi  etadāha 
vikalpotpattikāle yatsāmānyaṃ na viṣayīkṛtantena na tasya samāropaḥ  ākārā
ntaravat  na hyākārāntaramagnyādi tatra samāropyate tasya tadānīmaviṣayatvāt 
yaścākāro bāhyābhedenāropya te tasyaiva viṣayatvena pratibhāsanaṃ  sa cetyāropyamāṇo
jalākārastatra marīcikāsu nāsti bādhyamānatvādato sāmānyaṃ jalajñānanna vidyate
sāmānyamasyeti kṛtvā  tathā marīcikāvat sattyajaleṣvapi jalākārādhyāropakaṃ
jalajñānamasāmānyaṃ 
satītyādi paraḥ  anyadeva jalasāmānyaṃ sati tasya grahe tadāropo jalāropaḥ
nānyathā  yadi jalasāmānyamantareṇa satyajale jalāropa syāt tadā'tiprasaṃgaḥ 
agnyādāvapi jalāropa syāt 
sati sāmānyagrahe tadāropo nānyathā atiprasaṃgaḥsyāditi  sati ekakāryakāriṇāṃ
grahe kinneṣyate  dṛṣṭe sāmānye'vaśyaṃ ca vyaktīnāṃ svārtha jananaśaktirabhyupeyā
tatasta evānyebhyo bhinnā tāvṛśaṃ jñānaṃ janayantīti cet tatra sāmānyena kiṃ kara
ṇīyam  yathābhāvaṃ asaṃsṛṣṭabheda eva kisa pratyeti avidyāprabhavāt vikalpānāṃ
na ca vāhyārthamanapekṣya vibhramo bhavati api tu āntaraṃ viplavam'  yathā keśādi
satīti siddhānta vā dī ekaṃ kārya pānāvagāhanādi tatkaraṇaśīlānāṃ sattya
jalānāṃ grahe sati kinneṣyate jalāropaḥ  sāmānyamantareṇa bhinnānāmekakāryakaraṇa
śaktireva nāstīti cedāha  avaśyaṃ cetyādi  pratipāditaṃ caitad 
ekapratyavamarśārthajñānādyekārthasādhana 
ityatrāntare 
anye tu na hi tatrānyadeva kiṃcit sāmānyamastītyādikaṃ granthaṃ sāmānyaśabdaṃ
sādṛśyārthaṃ kṛtvā vyācakṣate  tatteṣāṃ vyākhyānannātiśliṣṭaṃ yattathā pratīyata ityā
deravācakatvāt  na hi sādṛśyaṃ jalarūpatayā pratīyata iti 
yati 
tata ityekakāraṇaśakteḥ  ta eveti yathokta śaktiṣu yuktā vyaktaya eva
na tu sāmānyaṃ  anyebhya ityatatkāryebhyaḥ  tādṛśamityekākāraṃ  yathābhāvamiti
padārthānativṛttāvanvayībhāvaḥ  yathā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyavirahi sthitaṃ 
tadativṛttyā kinna pratyeti vikalpapratyaya  kasmāttatrābhūtaṃ sāmānyamāropa
yathābhāvamityasyaivārtho saṃsṛṣṭetyādi  asaṃsṛṣṭa ekarūpatāmanā  a
pannaḥ  bhedaḥ parasparaṃ viśeṣo yasya bhāvasya sa tathā  aśakti
reṣā  yathāvasthitagrahaṇūṃprati vikalpānāṃ  kasmāt avidyāprabhavāt  bhūtā
rthagrahaṇaṃ vidyā  tadvirodhād vikalpa evāvidyā  prabhāva evaṃ prabhavaśabdenoktaḥ 
vikalpasāmarthyādityarthaḥ  yathāsthitavastvagrahaṇaṃ hi vikalpasya svabhāvaḥ prakṛtyā
bhrāntatvāt tasya vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ vināśa eva vikalpasya vibhramona
yukta iti
cedāha  na cetyādi  vikalpasvarūpamevātrāntaro viplava ukta  vikalpasyaiva
tatsvarūpaṃ yenāsau bāhyasādharmyamanapekṣya vibhramo bhavatītyarthaḥ  keśādyākārā
bhrāntiḥ keśādivibhramaḥ  sa yathā bāhyārthānapekṣaḥ sannabhūtākāropagrahaṇamāntara 
viplavamāśritya bhrānto bhavati  tadvad vikalpopyabhūtasāmānyākāragraha

J
vibhramaḥ  avidyodbhavād viplava tve cakṣurādiṣvapi prasaṃga iti cet  na  tasyā
vikalpalakṣaṇatvāt  vikalpa eva hi sā avidyā  svabhāvenaiva tāni viparya
stāni'  naivamindriyajñānāni vikalpakāni  na vā teṣvapi eṣa doṣaḥ advayānāṃ
ntāvadarthotra nābhipretaḥ  etaccottaratra vyaktīkariṣyate 
codakastvavidyāprabhavādityatrāvidyāśabdenāprahīṇāvaraṇasantatau dvayanirbhāsa
bījamevoktaṃ  tataścodbhava utpattistathā āntaropi viplavastadaiva bījame vaṃ
bhūtaṃ cāvidyodbhavatvaṃ sarvavijñānānāmastītyata āha  avidyodbhavād viplavatva
ityādi  avidyāyā udbhavādutpādād viplavatve bhrāntatve cakṣurvijñānādiṣvapi
viplavaprasaṃgaḥ  netyādinā svābhiprāyamāha  tasyā ityavidyāyāḥ sāmānyākārāro
pakaṃ jñānambikalpastallakṣaṇatvāt  tadāha  vikalpa eva hotyādi  setyavidyā 
svabhāveneti prakṛtyā  naivamityādinā prasaṃga pariharati  teṣāṃ svalakṣaṇākāra
tvenāvikalpakatvāt tasmānna tāni vikalpavat svabhāvena viparyastāni indri
yādivikāreṇa tu keṣāṃcid bhavati bhrāntatā 
bāhyārthanayenoktā'dhunāntarjñeyanayenāha  na cetyādi  etadāha  bhavatu
nāma yādṛśaścodyākāreṇāvidyāśabdasyārthaḥ kalpitastathāpyati prasaṅgadoṣo nāstī
ṣṭatvāditi  na vā teṣvapi cakṣurādijñāneṣveṣa bhrāntatvadoṣasteṣāmapi viplu
tatvāt  tadevāha advayānāmityādi  cakṣurādivijñānānāmātmasamvedanamevā
dvayannātra dvayamastīti kṛtvā  tathā hi vijñānasamānakālamvicchinnapratibhāsi 
grāhyatvenābhimataṃ nīlādi  ekānekavicārākṣamatayā na paramārthaṃsat  tadape
kṣayā ca yadvijñānasya grāhakatvaṃ kartṛ rūpantadapyasat  na tu samvedanantasya
pratyakṣatvāt  bhrāntagrāhakākārāvyatiriktatvātsvasamvitterapi bhrāntatvamiti
cenna tasyāḥ svarūpeṇāsattve pratibhāsa eva na syācchaśaviṣāṇavat  bhrānterapi ca
svarūpeṇa sattyatvamanyathā bhrāntitvāyogāt  svarūpavijñānakarūpaṃ jñānañca svasa
b mvidrūpa meveti kathanna  saṃvitteḥ sattyatvaṃ  yadvā dvaṃyapratibhāso bhrāntirbhrāntiśca
tattvādhiṣṭhānā  dvicandrādibhrāntivat  tattvaṃ ca dvayaviparītamadvayantacca svasamvi
drūpameva    na tu dvayābhāvatāsyāsatvāditi kathaṃ na sā samvitteḥ
