syād
grāhyagrāhakarūpeṇa pratibhāsanāt tānyapi bhrāntānīti  vakṣyāmaḥ tṛtīye paricchede
dvayapratibhāsāt iti vācyam  sarveṣāṃ viplavatve ca pramāṇatavābhāsayorvyavasthā
hi āśraya parāvṛtteḥ arthakriyāyogyābhimatasaṃvādanāt  mithyātve'pi praśa
mānukūlatvāt  mātṛsaṃjñādiyat  marīcikāsu jalasaṃjñā anyasya ca bhinna
bhāvotpatteḥ  vibhramasya cāviśeṣe'pi abhipretārthakriyāyogyāyogyotpatteḥ yathā a
kramaṃ saṃvādetarau  ayogyāt utpatteriti cet  vikalpānāṃ arthaprati
   ata eva dvayanirbhāsavatāṃ svasaṃvitteḥ pratyakṣatvepi na tattvadarśitvaṃ vyavasthāpyate
pramāṇāpramāṇavibhāga  kathamiti cedāha  sarveṣāmityādi  viplavo bhrānta
tvaṃ  tadābhāsaḥ  pramāṇābhāsaḥ  tayorvyavasthāvibhāgaḥ  āśrayo bhrāntibīja
mālayavijñānantasya parāvṛttirāvaraṇavigamaḥ  āṅ maryādāyām    āśraya
parāvṛtteḥ sarva dārthakriyāyogyā'bhimatasamvādanāt prāmāṇyavyavastheti sambandhaḥ 
arthakriyā dāhapākādinirbhāsavijñaptilakṣaṇā  tasyāṃ yogyaṃ ca tadabhimataṃ puru
ṣasyeṣṭatvāt tasya samvādanāditi vigrahaḥ  abhimatasyeva samvādanādityava
dhāraṇaṃ na punassamvādanādeveti pramāṇādapi kadācit pratyayavaikalyena samvādāsa
mbhavāt  arthakriyāyogyābhimatasamvāda'nādityupalakṣaṇaṃ    tathābhimatāsamvā
danādityapi draṣṭavyaṃ 
evaṃ hi pramāṇābhāsavyavasthāyāḥ kāraṇamuktambhavet  vijñānavāde bāhyā
bhāvāt
kathamarthakriyāyogyābhimatasamvādanaṃ  nāyandoṣognirjalanirbhrāsasyaiva
jñānasya dāhapākādinirbhāsajñānotpādanasamarthasya yogyaśabdenābhidhānāt  eva
ntāvaccakṣurādivijñānasya dhūmādiliṅgajanyasya cāgnyādi nirbhāsinaḥ pramāṇa
vyavasthoktā  kṛtakādiliṅgajanyasya tvanātmādijñānasyāha  mithyetyādi 
sāmānyākārāropapravṛttatvādanātmādijñānasya mithyātvaṃ  tathāpi praśamānukūla
tvāt prāmāṇyaṃ praśamo rāgādiprahāṇaṃ  anātmādisāmānyākāreṇa vastu gṛhītvā
bhāvayatāmbhāvanāniṣpattāvanātmādisvalakṣaṇapratyakṣīkāreṇa rāgādiprahāṇāt  kasya
punamithyātvepi praśamānukūlatvaṃ dṛṣṭamityata āha  mātṛsaṃjñetyādi  amā
tari mātṛsaṃjñā mithyāpi satī  rāgānutpattikāraṇaṃ  iyatā ca sādharmyeṇāyaṃ
dṛṣṭāntaḥ  na tu mātṛsaṃjñādikaṃ pramāṇaṃ  ādiśabdād bhaginyādisaṃjñāparigrahaḥ 
ṣaṣṭhyarthe cāyasvatiḥ 
bāhyārthadarśanepi vastubhūtasāmānyābhāvād yadi sarvo vikalpo bhrāntastatra
yathā jalasāmānyarahitagat  ma  rocisvalakṣaṇādutpanno jalavikalpo bhrānta
bandhā niyamāt na hi vikalpā utpadyante  sati marīcikādarśane tadudbhavā jala
bhrāntiriti ajalavivekinārthena svabhāvānukārārpaṇena jananāt na yathā
svabhāvam  tu sā viśeṣalakṣaṇāpāṭavāt pratyayāpekṣiṇā vā svavāsanāprabodhena
janyate  tasmād bhinnabhāvajanmā vikalpavibhramo bhrāntyā sa evāyamiti
pratyabhijñānam na vyatiriktasya sāmānyasya darśanāt na vyatiriktosya vyakti
vadananvayāt 
api ca 
stathā sattyajalādapi jalatvaśūnyājñāto jalavikalpastasyāpyatasmiṃstadgraha
pravṛttatvād bhrāntatvaṃ  tatkuta etadekasyārthasamvādo parasya netyāha  marīci
ketyādi  anyasya ceti sattyajale jalajñānasya jalatvasāmānyasyābhāvānmarīcayo
jalaṃ ca bhinno bhāvastata utpattistasyā aviśeṣepīti sambandha  vismaya
cāviśeṣepīti jalarahite marīcidravye yathā jalasāmānyādhyāropājjalavikalpo
vibhramastathā sattyajalepi
tasyāpyatasmistadgraharūpatvādanabhipretārthakriyā
pānādiḥ  tasyāṃ yogyaṃ jalasya svalakṣaṇamayogyaṃ marīcikānāṃ  tata utpatterhetoḥ
a sattyajale marīcikāsu ca jalavikalpasya  yathākramaṃ samvādetarau itara ityasamvādaḥ 
ayogyamarīcikāsvalakṣaṇāt  na hyajalarūpaṃ jalākārasya yogyamiti manyeta 
vikalpetyādinā parihāraḥ  arthapratibaddhorthākārānuvidhānenotpattiḥ 
tadeva vyācaṣṭe  na hotyādi  yathārthamiti padārthānativṛttāvavyayībhāvaḥ  eva
kāraśca bhinnakramaḥ  naiva hi padārthānurūpaṃ grāhakamutpadyata ityarthaḥ 
kathantarhi jalajñānasya marīcikābhya utpattirukteti cedāha  satotyādi 
marīcikāsu cakṣurvijñānādau bhrāntamupajāyate tasmin satyanubhūtākārarādhyāropiṇī
jalabhrāntiriti pāramparyeṇa tadudbhavā marīcikodbhavetyucyate  yathāsvabhāvamiti
pūrvavadavyayībhāvaḥ  jalabhrāntijananāsamartha ghaṭādyajalamityuktaṃ  tato vivekinā
jalabhrāntijananasamartheneti yāvat  evaṃbhūtena marīcikākhyenārthena  na yathā
svabhāvaṃ jananāt tadudbhavetyucyate iti sambandhaḥ  yathā svabhāvamityasyaivārtha    
svabhāvānukāretyādi  svabhāvamanukarotīti svabhāvānukāraḥ  svalakṣaṇānurūpaṃ

rbhrāntireva  tāṃ

sā ca śrutiḥ

cchedaḥ pratīyeta  etadevāha  na hotyādi  viveka iti viviktaḥ svabhāvaḥ

pramāṇavārttikasvavṛttiṭīkā 
śravijñātavṛkṣeṇa tadvyavacchedarūpasya pravṛkṣa sya api
buddhāvanārūḍhe'rthe saṃketo na samartha iti ye  codayanti

praparijñānācca
atha 
vyavacchinnāḥ kathaṃ jñātāḥ prāg vṛkṣagrahaṇādṛte 
na hi tadā pratipattā vṛkṣamapi na vetti pravṛkṣa mapi na vetti taj
jñānāyaiva tadarthitayā upagamāt  sa ca tadajānānaḥ kathaṃ saṃkete'vṛkṣavya
yadītyādinā vyācaṣṭe  tasyetyavṛkṣabhedalakṣaṇasya vṛkṣasya  evantāvanna vṛkṣasya
grahaṇaṃ nāpyavṛkṣasyetyāha'  avijñātetyādi  avijñāto vṛkṣo yasya puṃsastena
tadvaghavacchevarūpasyeti vṛkṣavyavacchedarūpasya buddhāvanārūḍhartha iti  yadi vṛkṣāvṛkṣau
buddhāvārūḍhau syātāṃ tadā'vṛkṣaparihāreṇa vṛkṣe saṃketaḥ syāt  anārūḍhe ca vṛkṣe'vṛkṣe
cārthe kathaṃ saṃketaḥ 
teṣāmityādinā parasyāpyayandoṣastulya ityāha  tataśca yastasya parihāro
mamāpi sa eveti bhāvaḥ     
ya ekamityādinā vyācaṣṭe  anyavyavacchedena saṃkete kriyamāṇe ye vādina
ekamvastu sāmānyamabhyugamyetaretarāśraya doṣaṃ codayanti  teṣāntatrāpi vastu
bhūte sāmānye vṛkṣatvalakṣaṇe saṃkete kriyamāṇe dvayī kalpanā avṛkṣā vyavacchinnā
na veti  
yadi vyavacchinnāstadā te jñātā aṅgīkartavyā  ajñātānāṃ vyavacchedābhāvāt 
tacca jñānanteṣu na yujyate  tadāha  kathamityādi  kathaṃ jñātā vṛkṣārthagrahaṇād ṛte 
b ityetāvān kārikābhāgaḥ  prākchabdastu miśrakavyākhyānenopāttaḥ  vṛkṣārthagraha
gamvinā prāg vṛkṣārthagrahaṇādavṛkṣāḥ  kathaṃ jñātā ityarthaḥ  ye tu prākśabdaṃ
kā rikāyāṃ paṭhanti tairarthaśabdo na paṭhitavyaḥ  na hyavṛkṣaniścayakāle vṛkṣārtha
grahaṇamastyavṛkṣagrahaṇapūrvakatvāt vṛkṣagrahaṇasya    na ca vṛkṣaniścayamantareṇa vṛkṣā
thaṃgraho yuktastasyāpi vṛkṣagrahaṇapūrvakṛtvāt  etadevāha  na hotyādi  tadeti saṃke
takāle pratipattā  yasmai saṃketaḥ kriyate  kasmānna vettītyāha  tadityādi 
tasya vṛkṣāvṛkṣasya jñānāyaiva tadarthitayā saṃketārthitayopagamādupasthitatvāt  kathaṃ
nāma saṃketottarakālaṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣau jñāsyāmīti  yadvā tadathitayopagamāditi saṃketā
thitayā pravṛteḥ  ato nāsti saṃketakāle vṛkṣāvṛkṣajñānaṃ pratipattuḥ  sa ca vṛkṣāvṛkṣa
 sāmānyacintā
vacchedaṃ pratipadyeta  prapratipattau ca parihṛtatadanya niveśaśabdāt 
anirākaraṇe teṣāṃ saṅkete vyavahāriṇām   
na syāt tatparihāreṇa pravṛttivṛkṣabhedavat 
na hi saṃketakālaḥ parārthavyavacchedena niveśitācchandāt vyavahārakāle
śravṛkṣaparihāreṇa pravṛttirna yuktā śiśapādibhedavat  śratha 
avidhāya niṣidhyānyat pradaśyaikaṃ puraḥ sthitam   
majānānaḥ kathamavṛkṣavyavacchedaṃ pratipadyeta saṃkete  naiva pratipadyeta  avṛkṣavyavacche
dāpratipattau ca satyāmaparihṛto na vyavacchinnastadanyastasmād vṛkṣādanyo yasmin
vṛkṣārthe so parihṛtatadanyastasminniveśassaṃketaḥ  saptamīti yogavibhāgāt
samāsaḥ  sa yasmin śabdestīti matvarthīya iti  aparihṛtatadanyannirdeṣṭuṃ
śīlamasyeti ṇinirvā avṛkṣādavyavacchinnerthe saṃpramugdharūpe saṃketitāditi
yāśvat 
aparaḥ prakāraḥ  vṛkṣādanyastadanyastasminniveśaḥ saṃketaḥ  aparihṛtaścāsau
tadanyaniveśaśceti karmadhārayaḥ  sa yasyāsti vṛkṣaśabdasyeti pūrvavat  avṛkṣādavyava
cchinnatvād vṛkṣārthasya  tatra saṃketyamānasya śabdasyāvṛkṣepi niveśa prasaktaḥ 
vṛkṣabhedeṣviveti samudāyārtha   
tasmādevaṃbhūtād vṛkṣaśabdād vyavahāriṇāṃ puṃsāṃ vyavahārakā le tatparihāreṇā
vṛkṣaparihāreṇa niyate śākhādimati pravṛttirna syāt  kintvaviśeṣeṇa vṛkṣāvṛkṣayoḥ
pravṛttirbhavet  kimvat  vṛkṣabhedavat  na hi vṛkṣaśabdāt prakaraṇādirahitād
vṛkṣaviśeṣe khadirādau tadanyavṛkṣaparihāreṇa pravṛttirbhavati  saṃketakāle teṣāmavya
vacchedāt 
na hotyādinā vyācaṣṭe  saṃketakāla saṃketaśabdenokta  parārthavyavacchedeneti
parasmādavṛkṣād vṛkṣād vṛkṣārthasyāvyavacchedena  dvitīye tu vyākhyāne 
parasminnavṛkṣe vṛkṣaśabdasya saṃketāvyavacchedeneti vyākhyeyaṃ  niveśitāditi
saṃketitāt  tatparihāreṇāvṛkṣaparihāreṇa vṛkṣavadityasya vyākhyānaṃ śiśapādi
bhevavaditi  śiśapādaya eva bhedā iti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ vatiḥ saptamyarthe sūtre
tu vṛkṣabhedā iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ  śiśapādayo hi bhedā vṛkṣasya bhedā bhavantītyanurūpaiva
vṛttiḥ teṣu ca yathā vṛkṣaśabdānna parasparavyavacchedena pravṛttistathā sūtravibhāga
eva vyākhyātaṃ 
arthatyādinā parābhiprāyamāśaṃkate  avidhāyāniṣidhyānyaditi pratiṣedhadvayaṃ
amientas yra ak je
vṛkṣo'yamiti saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ tat pratipadyate 
vyavahāre'pi tenāyamadoṣa iti cet 
na hi vastusāmānyavādinā kiṃcid vidhīyate  śratha kiñcit puraḥsthitaṃ
vastvekaṃ pradayaṃ vṛkṣoyamiti saṃketaḥ kriyate 
tena saṃketakāle tathādṛṣṭa
mevārthaṃ tatsaṃvandhinaṃ vā vyavahārakāle'pi pratipadyata iti tulyaḥ prasaṃga syāditi
cet  na hi tulyaḥ  evaṃ tatrāpi 
taruḥ  
meveti prasaṃgo na nivattate 
ekaṃ pradayaṃ ayamapi vṛkṣo'yameva vṛkṣa iti vādyapi śrayamapīti vā
ayameveti prakāradvayena tayośca sa eva doṣaḥ  dṛṣṭa viparītasya sujñā
kecit paṭhanti saṃkete viṣayamabhighāyātonyaccāniṣidhyeti taccāyuktamiva
dṛśyate vidhipratiṣedhau muktvā śabdapravṛttyasambhavāt  ekasya hi pradarśanamabhidadhatā
vidheraṅgīkṛtaḥ  tataścāvidhāya pradarśyatipadadvayaṃ vyāhataṃ syāt  tasmādavidhāyetyatraiva
naññ draṣṭavyaḥ  avidhāya niṣidhyānyaditi pāṭhaḥ  niṣidhyānyat pūrvantadvayavacchedenā
paraṃ saṃketavi ṣayamavidhāya pratiṣedhapūrvakaṃ vidhimakṛtvā vidhimātrameva kevalaṃ
kṛtvetyarthaḥ ata  eva pradaśyakamiti vṛttāvapi na kasyacid vyavacchedena kiṃcid
vidhīyata ityanyaniṣedhapūrvakameva vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhati  kevalastu vidhiraṃgīkṛta
eva  ekamiti sāmānyaṃ  etena sāmānye saṃketakaraṇāt sarvavyaktiṣu kṛta ityā
caṣṭe 
vṛkṣoyamiti saṃketasvarūpandarśayati  yadvastu pradarśya saṃketaḥ kṛtastat pratipadyate
vyavahārepi  tena kāraṇenāyamanantarokto vastusāmānyavādino'doṣaḥ  tathā
dṛṣṭamevārthamiti sāmānyaṃ yatra saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ  tatsambandhinaṃ veti sāmānyasambandhina
māśrayaṃ  tatrāpīti vidhinā kevalenāpi saṃkete kriyamāṇe dvau vikalpa vṛkṣoyamiti
saṃketaṃ kurvāṇaḥ tarurayamapīti vidadhīta  tarurayameveti vā  ādye pakṣe tarutva
manyasyāpyaniṣiddhamiti vyavahāre niyamena pravṛttirna syāditi sa eva prasaṅgaḥ atha
tarurayameveti tadā sa evātaruravyavacchedoṅgīkṛtaḥ  tataśca saṃketakāle pratipadyamānena
kathaṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣau jñātāviti tadavasthaḥ prasaṅgaḥ  tadāha  prasaṃgo na nivarttata iti 
ekamityādinā vyācaṣṭe  ayamapi vṛkṣo'yameva vṛkṣa iti  gatimiti
prakāraṃ  tayośceti dvayorapi prakārayoḥ  na doṣa ityādi paraḥ  dṛṣṭopaṭākāro
nubhūtastadviparītasya tato vilakṣaṇasya sujñānatvāt  sāmānyacintā
natvādadoṣaḥ  ekaṃ hi kiṃcid paśyato'nyatra tadākāravivekina buddhimanubhavataḥ
yathānubhavaṃ tato'nyo vaidharmyaniścayaḥ  tad vivecane tataḥ sa śrayameva vṛkṣa iti
pradarśya vyutpāditaḥ  yatraiva taṃ na paśyati tamevāvṛkṣaṃ svayaṃ pratipadyate 
nevaṃ saṃbhavati vyavacchedavāde  ekatra dṛṣṭasya  rūpasya kvaciv ananvayāt 
dṛṣṭapratipattau anyasminna syāt tathā pratītiriti cet 
evaṃ tarhi tatrāpi tulyametad  yasmād
etadeva grahaṇakavākya mekaṃ hotyādinā vyāṃcaṣṭe  ekaṃ hi kiṃcit sāmānyaṃ
vṛkṣatvādikampaśyatonyatra tatsāmānyarahite vilakṣaṇe vastuni tadākāravivekinīṃ
yathā paridṛṣṭākāravilakṣaṇākārāmbuddhimanubhavataḥ puṃso yathānubhavantato yathā pari
dṛṣṭādanyadityevaṃrūpo vaidharmyaniścayo vailakṣaṇyaniścayaḥ 
etena vaidharmyaniścayasya svabhāva uktaḥ     
tadvivecana iti vyāpāra  pūrvadṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthavivecana pṛthagbhāvasya vyavasthā
payati  tatonyadityanenaiva tadvivecane siddhe yatpunastadvivecanagrahaṇantatspaṣṭārthaṃ 
tatraitasmin krame sati yathānubhavavaidharmyaniścayavān sa pratipattā  yaṃ śākhādi
mantamarthaṃmviśiṣṭasāmānyavantamākārāntarād vivecayati  taṃ purodhāyāyameva
vṛkṣa iti pradarśya vyutpāditaḥ saṃketaṃ grāhito  yatraiva taṃ saṃketānurūpaṃ sāmānyātmānanna
paśyati  tamevāvṛkṣaṃ svayameva śabdavyāpāramvinā pratipadyate  tadevamākārānta b
rāt svayameva vivekenāvadhāritaṃ sāmānyātmānamupādāya saṃkete kṛte sarvāsu sajātīya

kṛte dṛṣṭaviparītasya sujñānatvāt  tatonyatrāvṛkṣa iti niścayo bhavatīti na
yathoktadoṣaḥ 
anyāpohavādinopye vamiti cedāha  nedamityādi  ekatra saṃketakāle dṛṣṭa
syāsādhāraṇasya rūpasya kvacid vyaktyantare'nanvayādananugamāt  tataśca saṃketa
kāle yo vṛkṣa ityevaṃ gṛhīto bhedastasyānyatra darśanannāsti  tatra saṃketakāle dṛṣṭe
paścād dṛśyamāne ca svalakṣaṇe yad bhinnapratibhāsi darśanamutpannantena hetunā  vṛkṣā
vṛkṣayoḥ pratipattau kriyamāṇāyāṃ vyaktyantare pyanyasmin vṛkṣabhedepi na syāttathā vṛkṣa
iti pratītiḥ  tathā hi yo vṛkṣabhedaḥ saṃketakāle dṛṣṭastasmād ghaṭādayo
vilakṣaṇāstathānyopi vṛkṣabhedaḥ  tatra yathā ghaṭādiṣu vṛkṣa iti pratipattirna bhavati
tathā vṛkṣabhedepi na syāt kintvavṛkṣa ityeva pratipattirbhavedityarthaḥ 
evantahatyā cāryaḥ tatrāpīti vikalpākāropi sāmānye saṃkete kriyamāṇe

ekapratyavamarśaścejjñāna ekatra hi sthitaḥ

kuta itaretarāśrayatvaṃ 
nanu yadyapi vidhirūpeṇa vṛkṣavikalpasya pratipattistathāpyavṛkṣādivyāvṛttidvāre
ṇotpadyamānatvādavṛkṣādipratipattyapekṣatvantataśca sa evetaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ

vikalpa utpadyate na tvavṛkṣādipratipattyapekṣa iti kuta itaretarāśrayatvaṃ  tatra vṛkṣa
vikalpe pratyekaṃ śiṃśapādyabhedena vṛkṣākāro'bhinnaḥ pratibhāsate  sa ca saṃketāt pūrvaṃ
svasamvedanapratyakṣasiddha jñānarūpatvādatastatraiva śabdaḥ saṃketyate

nirastaṃ 
kasmāditaretarāśrayapratividhānantulyamityāha  yasmādityādi  sajātīya

nānye  tān svayameva vibhajya tadataddhetūṃśca pratyeti  tasya

aheturūpavikalānekarūpāniva svayam

gauriti pratīteriti  tathāpi   
teṣāmityādinā kā rikārthamāha  teṣāṃ vijātīyavastuvivekināmarthānāṃ
prakṛtyā tathābhūtavikalpakāraṇānāmanvayāditi sambandha  prakṛtyā svabhāvena na
punarekasāmānyayogāt  sarve tarhi parāmarśa kasmānna janayantītyāha  pratyayava
śāditi  anubhavajñānaṃ pratyayastaddvāreṇa teṣāṃ vikalpajananāt  tathābhūtasyaikapratya
vamarśātmakasya vikalpasya kāraṇānāmanvayāt sadbhāvād    yathaiko vṛkṣabhedaḥ
prakṛtyā tathābhūtavikalpahetubhūtastathā dvitīyādirapītyanenākāreṇānvayo na punareka
mvastu sāmānyātmakamasti  tasmādanvayāddhetorekakāryavattvenaikādhyavasāyayogyāniti
vākyaśeṣaḥ 
tadraṣṭuriti vyaktiṣvekakāryakaraṇasya draṣṭurbuddha viparivarttamānānārūḍhān 
tasmād draṣṭuriti bhavitavyaṃ  kartari ce ti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapratiṣedhāditi cenna 
śeṣaṣaṣṭhyā vivakṣitatvāt  draṣṭṛśabdasya cātṛnpratyayāntatvāt  tatra tṛnniti ṣaṣṭhī
pratiṣedhāt  tacchabdasya dvitīyāntasya sādhanaṃ kṛteti samāsaḥ  anye tu tatprayojaka
ityādinirdeśāt pratiṣedhasūtrasyānityatvaṃ jñāpayanti  evamanyeṣvapi nirdeśeṣvevaṃ
jātīyeṣvevaṃrūpāḥ parihārā vaktavyāḥ  tajjñānahetutayā tasya vikalpajñānasya
hetutayā  tadanyavyāvṛttyā cetyekākārapratyabhijñānahetubhyo ye'nye tathābhūtavi
kalpā'hetavaḥ tebhyo vyā vṛttyā ca  atayābhūtānapi na hi te vikalpārūḍhāstaddhe
tavo bahiravidyamānatvāt  ata evāheturūpavikalpatvamapyasatteṣāmavastusattvāt 
tathāṣyavasitān  tajjñānahetutayā tadanyavyāvṛttyā cāropitān  anena bhāto
hetutayā dhiyaḥ  aheturūpavikalāniveti vyākhyātaṃ 
pratipattimanusṛtya ete vṛkṣā iti svapara vikalpaṣu ekapratibhāsān ādaśya
tadvijñānahetūn bhedena pratipadyatetyabhiprāyeṇa prataddhatubhyo'bhinne niyuṅkte 
tataḥ tamadhyasya pratipadyamānā buddhiḥ vyabhicāravaśādeva ekavastugrāhiṇīva
pratibhāti  teṣāṃ bhinnānāṃ darśane'pi yasya darśanā darśanābhyāṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣavibhāgaṃ kurvīteti
avibhaktabāhyādhyātmikabhedānityanenaikarūpānityetad vyācaṣṭe  avibhakto
bāhyādhyātmikabhedo yeṣviti vigrahaḥ  dṛśyavikalpayorekīkaraṇena gṛhītānityarthaḥ 
yasmai saṃketaḥ kriyate sa pratipattā  pratipattimanusṛtya  saṃketakāle yādṛśī tasya
pratipattiḥ  aheturūpavikalā ekakāryā bhāvā ekarūpā yeṣvayaṃ vṛkṣaśabdaḥ saṃketitasta
evāmī  tasmād vṛkṣā ityevamākārā  tāmanusṛtya  tāṃ smṛtvā  vikalpa
vijñāne sthitassan  tān yathoktān bhāvān tadvijñānahetūnatadviparītebhyo bhedena 
ete vṛkṣā iti vyavahārakālepi vṛkṣaśabdaśravaṇāt kathannāma pratipadyatetyanenābhi
prāyeṇāktamataddhaṃtubhyo bhedavyavacchinne svabhāve vikalpena viṣayīkṛte niyuṅkte
saṃketasya karttā   
nanu vyāvṛttasya svalakṣaṇasya vyavahārakālenugamo nāsti  nāpi vikalpa a
pratibhāsinaḥ sāmānyākārasya svajñānābhinnatvād vikalpāntarenvayosti  nāpi
vaktṛsambandhinastasya śrotuḥ śrotṛsambandhino vā vaktuḥ pratītiranyacetodharmatvenā
tīndriyatvāt  na cāpratipanne samaṃ pratipādyapratipādakābhyāṃ saṃketaḥ sambhavatītyāha 
svaparetyādi  svasya pratipādakasya parasya ca prati pādyasya vikalpeṣvekakāryakaraṇa
lakṣaṇena bhrāntinimittenaikapratibhāsān bhāvān saṃketaviṣayānādayaṃ 
etaduktambhavati  yathaikastaimiriko dvicandrandṛṣṭvānyataimirikāyopadiśan
svadṛṣṭamevopadiśati na paradṛṣṭamapratyakṣatvāt  atha ca tasyaivambhavatyayameva mayā
parasmai pratipādita iti  paropi ca svasantānabhāvinameva dvicandrā kārampratiyan
ya eva pratipādakena mama pratipāditassa eva mayā pratipanna iti manyate  tadvat prati
pādyapratipādakayorbuddhayākārasyādhyavasitabāhyarūpasya bhedepyekatvādhyavasāyāt saṃketa
karaṇaṃ vyavahārakāle ca tasyaiva pratītirekatvādhyavasāt  tamityanyavyavacchinnaṃ
svabhāva svākāreṇābhinnamadhyasya pratipadyamānā' buddhiḥ  tasyā iti śruteḥ  eka vastu
grāhiṇīva pratibhāti 
tena yaducyate bhaṭṭena 
na cānvayavinirmuktā pravṛttiḥ śabdaliṅgayoḥ 
TV SALA DE LA SAN SINGE
a
na yujyate  tasya vyatiriktasya śākhādipratibhāsasya daṇḍavad daṇḍini agraha
ṇāt  śraparasmāt pravibhāgenāgṛhītasya anupalakṣaṇāt 
ākṛtereka dṛṣṭāyā apyanyatra draṣṭumaśakyatvāt tadatadvato vṛkṣāvṛkṣatve
vyaktirekaiva vṛkṣaḥ syāt 
rbhavatu nāma ghaṭādiśabde arthāntara vyavacchedaḥ  na hyajñeyamityādivākye tathā 
tābhyāṃ na vināpohe dhīrna cāsādhāraṇenvayaḥ 
apohaścāpyaprasiddho'vyabhicāraḥ kva kathyatāṃ 
tasminnavidyamāne ca na tayoḥ syātpramāṇate ti 
apāstaṃ  yata ekasminnanyavyāvṛtte svalakṣaṇe śabdaliṅgābhyāṃ sambandhamprati
padyamānopyanyatrāpyevaṃrūpeṣu sambandhaṃ pratipadyata evaikatvādhyavasāyāditi kutonvayara
hitatvādidoṣa iti  vastubhūtantu sāmānyamāśritya vṛkṣāvṛkṣavibhāgo na ghaṭate 
tadāha    na punarityādi  ekambastu sāmānyaṃ dṛśyamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptantatra
svalakṣaṇeṣvasti  yathā vṛkṣabhedebhyo ghaṭādayo bhinnāstathā dhavādayopi 
parasparanteṣāmbhinnānāndarśanepi yasya sāmānyasya darśanādarśanābhyāṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣavibhāgaṃ
kurvīta yatredaṃ sāmānyaṃ dṛśyate sa vṛkṣo yatra na dṛśyate so'vṛkṣa iti 
kasmānnāstītyāha  tasyetyādi  sāmānyasya vyatiriktasya śākhādiprati
bhāsād vibhāgenāgrahṇāt  na hi vṛkṣādiṣu dvau pratibhāsāvupalabhyete  ekaḥ śākhā
dyākāro'paraścāśākhādyākāraḥ  na ca śākhādyākāra evaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratibhāsata iti
śakyamvaktuntasya śākhādyākāratvāt  daṇḍava ddaṇḍinīti vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ  yathā
daṇḍini daṇḍasya bhedena grahaṇaṃ  naivaṃ sāmānyasya  aparasmācchākhādimataḥ pravibhā
b genā gṛhītasya ca sāmānyasya vyaktiṣvanupalakṣaṇāt  svarūpeṇa parasyopalambhana
mupalakṣaṇantacca svayamagṛhītasya kathambhavet  anarthāntarasāmānyavādinastvākṛtere
katra vyaktī dṛṣṭāyāḥ svalakṣaṇādavyatirekāttadvadevānyatra vyaktyantare draṣṭumaśakya
tvāt  tataśca tavatadvatoriti saṃketakālaparidṛṣṭaikavṛkṣākṛtiryasyāsti sa tadvān 
paścād vyavahārakāle dṛśyamāno vṛkṣabhedaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭavṛkṣākṛtirahito'tadvān  tayo
yathā kramaṃ vṛkṣāvṛkṣatve nyāyaprāptatve sati vyaktirekaiveti saṃketakāle dṛṣṭava vṛkṣaḥ
syānna tu vyavahārakāle dṛśyamānā  saṃketakāle dṛṣṭāyā ākṛteranyatrādarśanāt 
anyāpohe śabdārthaparairavyāpitvaṃ coditaṃ tatparijihīrṣavān pūrvapakṣadigmātra
Slokavārtika sāmānyacintā
yato na vyavacchedyate jñeyatvaṃ hi kiñcid  tato bhedaviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tasya
jñeyatvāditi cet  naiṣa doṣaḥ  evaṃ
kvacinniveśanāyārthe vinivartya kutaścana 
buddheḥ prayujyate śabdastadarthasyāvadhāraṇāt 
vyartho'nyathā prayoga syāt tajjñeyādipadeṣvapi  
vyavahāropanīteṣu vyavacchedo'sti kaścana 
ntāvat karoti  bhavatu nāmetyādi  kasmāttatrārthāntaravyavacchedo nāstītyāha 
na hyajñeyamityādi  yata ityajñeyāt  ajñeyaṃ kasmānnāstīti cedāha  tata
ityādi  ajñeyād vijñeyasya bhedena viṣayokaraṇamaṅgīkarttavyamanyavyavacchedavādinā
'nyathā kathamajñeyāt jñeyasya vyavacchedaḥ  tataścājñeyāt jñeyasya bhedena viṣayīkaraṇe
satyeva tasyājñeyābhimatasya jñeyatvāt  na hyaviṣayīkṛtād vyavacchedaḥ śakyo darśayituṃ 
ādiśabdāt sarvasamudāyadvayādiśabdānāṃ grahaṇaṃ 
taduktambha ṭṭo dyo ta ka rā bhyāṃ  anyāpohaśca śabdārtha ityayuktamavyāpakatvāt 
yatra dvairāśyambhavati tatretarapratiṣedhāditara pratīyate yathā gauriti pade'go pratiṣedhena
gau pratīyate 
na punaḥ sarvapada etadasti  na hyasarvannāma kiṃcidasti yatsarvaśabdena vinivatta 
atha manyase ekādyasarvaṃ tat sarvaśabdena nivarttyate  tatra svārthāpavādadoṣaprasa
ṅgāt  evaṃ hi satyekādivyudāsena pravarttamāna śabda  aṅgapratiṣedhādaṅgavyati
riktasya cāṅginonabhyupagamādanarthakaḥ syāt  evaṃ sarvasamudāyaśabdā ekadeśa
pratiṣedharūpeṇa pravarttamānā samudāyivyatiriktasamudāyānabhyupagamādanarthakāḥ prāpnu 
vanti  dvayādiśabdānāṃ ca samuccayaviṣayatvādekādipratiṣedhe pratiṣidhyamānā
nāmasamuccayatvāt  dvayādiśabdānāmanarthakatvamiti 
naiṣa doṣa ityācārya  yasmādākāṃkṣāvatī buddhi kutaścinnivartya tasyā buddheḥ
kvacidviniyate'rthe niveśanāyākā akṣāvataḥ puṃsaḥ kaścicchabdaḥ prayujyate pratipāda
yitrā  kvacinniveśanāyetyanenānvaya uktaḥ  kutaścidvinivarttyatyanena vyatirekaḥ 
kiṅkāraṇaṃ kutaścinnivayaṃ kvacinniveśyate śabda ityata āha  tadarthasyetyādi 
śabdārthasyāvadhāraṇāt  anyathā yadi tena śabdena na kaścidartho vyavacchidyeta vyarthaḥ
śabdaprayogaḥ syāt  yata evantasmājjjñeyādipadeṣvityādiśabdāt sarvaviśvādipa
śabdaṃ hi sarvaḥ anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ nātivarttate  tasya pravṛtti
nivṛttiphalatvāt  yadi śrayaṃ kasyacid kutaścid buddhi na nivarttayet
anivayaṃ ca yathā'nujñānāt sarvavyavahāreṣu na kiñcid vyavaharet vyava
hārasyāvadhāraṇa 'nāntarīyakatvāt  yathā ghaṭenodakamānaye iti  yadi ghaṭena
saha udakasya kathamapi avaśyaṃ śranayanamicchet  udakamānayatyeva vācyaṃ syāt 
na ghaṭeneti  tathā'ñjalinā'nyenāpi kathañcidānayanamabhipretaṃ syāt 
śrānayetyanākṣiptakaraṇakarmakameva vācyaṃ syāt 
a deṣu  kimviśiṣṭeṣu  vyavahāropanīteṣu  vidhipratiṣedhalakṣaṇa śābdo vyava
hārastadarthamupanīteṣu  laukikaprayogastheṣviti yāvat  teṣu vyavahārāṅgeṣu yathā
kathaṃcid vyavacchedyosti kaścit 
etaduktambhavati  yatparaśca śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti vidhāyakasyāpi vākyasya
vyavacchedaparatvād vyavacchedopi śabdārtha ucyate iti na kācit kṣatiḥ 
śabdaṃ hītyādinā vyācaṣṭe  sarvaḥ pumān laukika parīkṣa ko vā kasmānnāti
varttata ityāha  tasyetyādi  tasya śabdasya pravṛttinivṛttiphalatvāditi kutaścinni
vartya kvacit pravṛttyarthatvādityarthaḥ  itarathā śabdaprayogo viphala syāt  tadāha 
yadītyādi  ayamvaktā kasyacit pratipādyasya kutaścidanabhimatāntra nivarttayed
buddhimanivarsyābhimate ca kvacinna pravarttayet tadā yathābhūtānujñānāditi śabdaprayogāt
pūrvaṃ pratipatturyathā saṃpramugdharūporthastathābhūtasya śabdenānanujñānāt  yathākathaṃcid
yādṛśasya tādṛśasyānujñānādityarthaḥ  sarvavyavahāreṣu na kiṃcidvacanaṃ vyavahareduccā
rayet  kiṅkāraṇaṃ    śabdavyavahārasyāvadhāraṇanāntarīyakatvāt 
etadeva sādhayannāha  yathetyādi  atra hyudaqamānaye tyukte śrotuḥ karaṇa 
viśeṣe'vaśyamākāṃkṣā bhavati tatra ca niyamārthaṃ ghaṭene tyucyate  soyaṃ ghaṭo neti
śabda svārthābhidhānapurassarameva karaṇāntaravyavacchedākṣepāt phalavān bhavatyanyathā sa
tyapi ghaṭaśabdaprayoge yadi nāñjalinā tathānyenāpi karaṇenodakānayanaṃ yathākathaṃcidi
ti  alpapramāṇaṃ bahupramāṇaṃ vā jalāyanamabhipreta mityarthaḥ  udakaśabdopi karmānta 
ravyavacchedena yadi viśiṣṭe karmaṇi na pravarttakastadā tasyāpi prayoganarthaka ityāha 
tathetyādi  ānayetyeva kevalamvacanaṃ syāt    kiṃbhūtamanākṣiptakaraṇakarmakaṃ 
anākṣiptaviśeṣaṇānāśritaṃ karaṇaṃ ghaṭākhyaṃ karma codanākhyaṃ yasminnānayetyetāvati vaca
ne tattathoktaṃ  tathānayetyasmin vyāpārebhimukhībhūtaḥ pumān  ānayetyanena yadyā
nayanādanyasmād vyāpārānna vyavacchidyeta tadā'nayetyapi na vācyaṃ syāt  sāmānyacintā
evaṃ pranayanaṃ anyad vā anuṣṭhānānanuṣṭhānaṃ kiñcid yadyabhimataṃ syāt 
tadā śrātyapi na brūyāt śabdārthābhāvāt  tathā jñeyādiśabdānāṃ vyavahāro
panītānāmapi kenacid vyavacchedyena  bhāvyam  ananyāśaṃkāyāṃ prayogāyogāt  
tatra hi yadeva mūḍhamaterāśaṃkāsthānaṃ tadeva nivartyam  anāśaṃkamāno vā śrotā
kimupadeśamapekṣate  abhūtaṃ ca vacanaṃ kurvāṇaḥ vaktā kathaṃ nonmattaḥ syāt 
etadevāha  evamānayanamityādi  anyadvā kiñcidanuṣṭhānamiti  ānayanā
danyat  kim  bhojanādyanuṣṭhānaṃ  ananuṣṭhānaṃ ceti vyāpārākaraṇamanānayanaṃ ca
yadyabhimataṃ syāttadā kriyāpadamānayetyapi na brūyāt  nayanamanyadveti kvacit pustake
pāṭhaḥ sa ttvattva yuktaḥ  ānayanaśabdasya prakrāntatvāt  tasmād vyavahāro
panītānāṃ ghaṭādiśabdānāmasti vyavacchedyo yathā teṣāntathā vyavahāropanītānāṃ
jñeyādiśabdānāṃ kenacid vyavacchedyenājñeyādinā 
ananyāśaṅkakāyāmityajñeyatvāderāśaṅkā'nyāśaṅkā  tadabhāvonanyā śaṃkā
asatyāmajñeyatvādyāśaṅkāyāmityarthaḥ  tathā hyanityādi rūpeṇājñeyaḥ śabda ityā gob
śaṃkāyāmidaṃ prayajyate'nityādinākāreṇa jñeya iti  tatrānityādyākāreṇa yadajñe
yatvamāśaṃkitaṃ tadeva vyavacchidyate  evaṃ jñeyāssarvapadārthāssarva jña jñānasyetyatrāpi
sarvajña jñānāpekṣayā yadajñeyatvamāśaṃkitantadeva vyavacchedyaṃ  tathā kaścidāha  niru
pākhyānāmabhāvāttatra jñānasya vṛttirnāsti tasmādajñeyāsta iti  atrāpyajñeyatva
māropitantadeva vyavacchedyaṃ  sarvābhāvī na bhavatītyevamabhāvasyāpi viṣayīkaraṇāt 
evamanyatrāpi jñeyaśabdaprayoge vācyaṃ  tathā prameyaśabde  tathā kṣaṇikāssarve saṃskārā
ityatrāpi sarvaṃsya dīpādereva kṣaṇikatvaṃ kaiścit kalpitanna sarvasya    tadvayavacchedena
sarvasaṃskārāṇāmanityatvaṃ  evaṃ kaścidāgataḥ kimvā sarva evetyāśaṅakāyāṃ sarvo
grāma āgataḥ  iti kasyacideva yadāgamanamāśaṃkitantadeva vyavacchedyaṃ  tathā samudāyā
lambanāḥ pañca vijñānakāyā iti caikadeśālambanā ityekadeśālambanatvaṃ niṣidhyate 
evamanyeṣvapi dvayādiśabdeṣu vyavahāropanīteṣu prakaraṇavaśād yathāyogaṃ vyavacchedo
vaktavyaḥ 
ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ  na vastubhūtaṃ pratiyoginambhinna buddhigrāhyaṃ rāśidvaye
'vasthāpyā'nyāpohaḥ śabdena codyata ityucyate  kintu yaḥ śrotrā tathābhūtepyatathābhūta
ākāra āropyate sopi vyavacchedya eva śabdeneti 
etadeva sphuṭayannāha  tatra hotyādi  yadeva mūḍhamateḥ pratipādyasyāśaṃkāsthāna
māśaṃkāviṣayaḥ  tadeva jñeyādiśabdānāṃ nivat  śrotrā naiva kaścidāśakita
iti cedāha  anāśaṅkaṅmāno vetyādi  yadyasau na kiñcidāśakate yathābhūta
tatsaṃskārāyaiva śabdānāṃ kṛtasaṃketatvāta  jñeyādiśabdāścāvyavahārānupanītā na
kiñcid  vākyagatasya tadarthapratipādakatvāt  kva tatprayoga iti cet prayoga
viṣayacintāyāṃ pranyāpoha ityucyateḥ 
 anirdiṣṭaprayogamityādijñeyaśabdasya
kortha iti praśnasya na kaścidarthaḥ  tataḥ kvacidapi na pratipattaḥ  tathā
niścayavān tadā parasmād vaktuḥ kimupadeśamapekṣate  naivetyabhiprāya  ākāṃkṣāpa
nayanaṃ śrotṛsaṃskārastad yatra vacane nāsti tadā śrotṛsaṃskāra tathābhūtaṃ ca vacanaṃ
kurvāṇo vaktā kathaṃ nonmataḥ syāt  tasmād vaktā śroturākāṃkṣāvata saskāra
mevāghitsamānaḥ śabdaṃ prayuṃkte  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ    tatsaṃskārāyaiva śrotṛsaṃskārāyaiva
śabdānāṃ kṛtasaṃketatvāt 
bhavatu nāma vākyasthānāṃ vyavahārārthamupanītānāṃ jñeyādiśabdānāṃ yathoktaṃ
vyavacchedyaṃ ye tvavyavahāropanītā kevalā eva jñeyādiśabdāsteṣu kathaṃ  na hi
tatra pratipatturāśaṅkāsthānamastītyata āha  avyavahāropanītāścetyādi  vā
kyeṣvanantarbhūto vācakaḥ śabdo nāstītyarthaḥ  yato vaktā phalārthī prathamantāva
dimamarthaṃmviśiṣṭakriyāsambaddhamanena śabdenāsmai pratipādayāmītyabhiprāyeṇa deva
datta gāmānayetyevaṃ prayuṃkte  tena kriyānvitānāmeva padārthānāmabhidhānaṃ  natva
a bhihitānāmpadārthānāmpaścādanvayaḥ  gāmityādau karmādivibhakteranutpādapra'saṃ

pratipādakatvāditi bhāvaḥ

'vyayībhāvaḥ  tataśca saptamyāstṛtīyā saptamyorbahula mityambhāvaḥ   upāttaprayo
gābhāve sati vākyenupanītasya kevalasya jñeyaśabdasya kortha iti praśna ityarthaḥ 
ghaṭādiśabdānāmapi na kiṃcid  prakaraṇe śravaṇādeva yāpi pratipattiḥ sā'pari
samāptatadaryā dṛṣṭaprayogaviṣayānusāreṇa sākāṃkṣatvāt  tadarthaviplavaḥ ghaṭādi

tvamiti   atra ca yadi karmmadhārayasamāsastasya svapadārthavṛttitvātkathantena
praśnakriyāviśeṣiteti vaktavyaṃ 
athānidiṣṭaḥ prayogo yasmin jñeyaśabda iti bahuvrīhistadāpi śabdo viśeṣito
na kriyā  yadā tvevamvigraho'nirdiṣṭaḥ prayogo yasmin praśna iti tadā bhavati
kriyāviśeṣāt tadāpi praśnaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyāt saptamyeva yuktā nirdiṣṭa
prayoge praśna iti  kiṅkāraṇaṃ kevalasya jñeyaśabdasyārtho neti cedāha  tata iti
 tato jñeyaśabdāt kvacid  api na vastupratipatteḥ  vidhipratiṣedhaphale vyavahāre
ca kevalasya jñeyaśabdasya prayogābhāvāt kutorthapratipattiḥ  yadādiśabdo'nityādi
rūpeṇa kiṃ jñeyo bhavatyathājñeya ityevaṃ prakrānte jñeya iti kevalaḥ prayujyate  tadāpi
yārthapratiṣpattiḥ sā prakṛtaṃ śabdādapadamapekṣya bhavantī vākyādeva jāyate  padāntara
sahitasya padasya vākyatvāt  tasmānnāsti padāntaranirapekṣāt padārthapratipattiḥ 
yathā jñeyādipadānāṃ kevalānāṃ na kiṃcidvācyaṃ tathā ghaṭādiśabdānāmapi kevalānāṃ 
nanu ca kiṃ ghaṭenodakamānayāmyathāñjalineti prastāve  ghaṭeneti prayuṃkte

kārā pratipattirutpadyata eveti kathamucyate kevalācchabdāt na pratipattirityāha

sākāṃkṣatvādupaplavamānaṃ rūpatvenāsamāptārthā viplavabhrāntireva  etatkathayati

sādṛśyenopahṛtabuddheḥ kevalaśabdaśravaṇādarthapratipattyabhimāna iti  yathā dṛṣṭaprayo
gānusāreṇa kevalaghaṭā dipadaśravaṇādarthapratipattiviplavastādṛśo jñeyādiśabdeṣvapi 
yathādarśanaṃ  yathāprayogopalambhaṃ  yāvatsu vākyeṣu jñeyaśabdaḥ prayujyamāno dṛṣṭa
stadanusāreṇa kevalajñeyaśabdaśravaṇādastyevārthapratipattiviplavaḥ  anena sarvathā ghaṭā

śabdaprayoga kutaścit nivartya kutracit niveśanāt arthavattā tatsāphalyāt 
niveśanaṃ ca yo yasmād bhidyate vinivartya tam 
tadbhede bhidyamānānāṃ samānākārabhāsini 
sa cāyamanyavyāvṛtyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ  
tiriktasya cāṅginonabhyupagamādanarthakaḥ syāditi 
tadayuktaṃ  yatonya evaikādibuddhiviṣayābhāvā anye ca samudāyādibuddhiviṣayāḥ
pratibhāsante ye ca viśiṣṭāvasthā samudāyādibuddhiviṣayāsta' evāṅgina ucya
ntenyasyāṅgino niṣedhāt  yādṛgbhūtāśca te pareṇa samudāyādidharmārambhakā
iṣyante tādṛgbhūtā evāsmābhiḥ samudāyabuddhijanakatvena tadālambanā iṣyante virodhā
bhāvāt  tena sarvasamudāyadvitvādiśabdānā mekādiniṣedho ghaṭata eva 
tasmādityādi  yataḥ sarvaṃ vākyaṃ sāvadhāraṇamvākyasthānāmeva padānā martha
vattā  tasmāt sarvaśabdaprayoga ityupasaṃhāraḥ  tatsāphalyāt tasya śabdaprayogasya
sāphalyāt  evaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ yathoktavidhinā'nyāpohe vācye
yaduktambha'ṭṭo dyo ta ka rābhyāṃ 
anyāpohaśca kimvācyaḥ kimvā'vācyoyamiṣyate 
vācyopi vidhirūpeṇa yadi vānyaniṣedhataḥ 
vidhyātmanāsya vācyatve tyājyamekāntadarśanaṃ 
sarvatrānyaniṣedhoyaṃ śabdārtha iti vaṇṇitaṃ 
anapohavyudāsena yadyapohobhidhīyate 
tatra tatraivamicchāyāmanavasthā bhavettava 
athāpyavācya evāyamanyāpohastvayeṣyate 
tenānyāpohakṛcchabda iti bādhyeta te vacaḥ 
yasmād yeṣveva śabdeṣu naña yogasteṣu kevalaḥ 
bhavedanyanivṛttyaṃśassvātmaivānyatra gamyata iti 
tadayuktaṃ  vidheḥ śabdārthasyārthādanyaniṣedhasyābhyupagamāt 
yadi tarhi vidhireva śabdārthorthādanyaniṣedhaḥ  kathantahyācārya diū nā ge na
śabdorthāntaravyāvṛttiviśiṣṭāneva bhāvānāhe tyādyuktaṃ   
na virudhyata ityata āha  niveśanaṃ cetyādi  anena caitaddarśayati  saṃke
tepi tāvad vidhirūpeṇa śabdaḥ pravarttate kiṃ punarvyavahāra iti  yo vṛkṣārtho yasmā
Slokavārtika sāmānyacintā
kaścid bhāga iti proktaṃ rūpaṃ nāsyā'pi kiñcana 
tadgatāveva śabdebhyo gamyate'nyanivarttanam 
na tatra gamyate kaścit viśiṣṭaḥ kenacit paraḥ 
davṛkṣād ghaṭādebhidyate vinivayata sa vṛkṣantyaktvetyartha  niveśanaṃ saṃketakaraṇaṃ
vakṣaśabdasya draṣṭavyaṃ  tamvinivṛttyetyanenāvṛkṣe vṛkṣaśabdo na saṃketyata ityuktambha
vati  kva punastanniveśanamityāha  bhede bhidyamānānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ yastadbhedastasmā
davṛkṣād bhedaḥ  avṛkṣād bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ  yathaiva hyeko vṛkṣaviśeṣasta smād vṛkṣād
bhinnastathā sarve vṛkṣabhedāḥ 
tatasteṣvasau tadbhedo vikalpabuddhayā sarveṣvekatvenāropyata iti samānākāra
bhāsī bhavati  tasmin samānākārabhāsini tadbhede bhinnasvabhāve niveśanaṃ śabdasya 
sa cāyamiti caśabdovadhāraṇārthaḥ  sa evāyamvikalpapratibhāsyākārī bāhyā
bhinnaḥ 
yadvā sa eva tadbhedo'vṛkṣād bhinnasvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ prokta ācārya diṅa nāgena 
kathaṃ prokta ityāha  anyavyāvṛttyā gamyate tasya vastunaḥ kaścid bhāga ityanena 
asya cārthamvṛttau vyaktīkariṣyāmaḥ 
nanvanyavyāvṛttyā viśiṣṭo vastubhāga paramārthata eva kasmānna gṛhyata ityāha 
rūpaṃ svabhāvo nāsyāpi bhedasya kiñcana nivṛttirūpasya bhedasyāsattvāt  vikalpa
pratibhāsinaśca buddhivibhramāt 
yadi bhedasya na rūpaṃ kiñcana kathantarhi śabdonyavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭāneva bhāvānā
hetyucyata ityata āha  tadgutāvityādi  tasya yathoktasya bhedasya vijātīya
vyāvṛttasya svabhāvasya vidhirūpeṇa gatāveva śabdebhyo gamyatenyanivarttanaṃ    
tathā hi vṛkṣa ityukte'rthādavṛkṣanivarttanaṃ pratīyate  etāvanmātreṇa cānyavyāvṛ
ttiviśiṣṭatvamuktaṃ  na tu paramārthato viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ  tadāha  netyādi 
tatretyanyāpohe śabdārthe ācārya granthe vā  kaścit para ityanyasmād vyāvṛttorthaḥ 
kenacidanyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇena viśiṣṭo na gamyata iti 
tena yaducyate bhaṭṭena 
na cāsādhāraṇamvastu gamyate'pohavattayā 
kathaṃ vā parikalpyeta sambandho vastvavastunoḥ 
svarūpasattvamātreṇa na syāt kiñcidviśeṣaṇaṃ

vastuno bhāga kaścid gamyata iti śabdorthāntaranivṛttiviśiṣṭāneva

uktaḥ  ata eva śabde tadanyavyāvṛttiḥ svārthābhidhānaṃ ca na vyāpāradvayam 
svārthasyābhidhānādeva tadanyavyāvṛttigatiḥ svārthasya bhedarūpatvāt  na hyanva
yo'vyāvṛttimato nāpyananvayino vyāvṛttiḥ  ekānvayasya parihāryābhāve tathaika b
anyavyāvṛttigatiḥ sā vyatirekagatiḥ  evamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdorthavān
bhavati  tenānvayavyatirekacodanayānvayasya sākṣādarthāttu vyatirekasya codanā
draṣṭavyā  tayā codanayā vyavahārāṅgatāṃ śabdānāṃ darśayannācārya diṅa nā ga āha
tadvayāvṛttyā gamyate vastubhāga iti  tathā tadviśiṣṭo vetyāha  vyāvṛttiśabdena
vyatireka uktaḥ  vastubhāgaśabdenānvayaḥ  anenaitadapi vyākhyātaṃ śabdāntarāpohaṃ
kurvantī śrutiḥ svārthamabhidhatta ityarthaḥ  tatra yosāvekagato bhedo vikalpabuddhipratibhāsī
vyākhyātaḥ sa eva svārthastatrārthāntaravyāvṛttirarthāntarāpohaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhalakṣaṇastaṃ
kurvatītyarthād gamayantītyarthaḥ 
yadi cānyanivṛttipurassaraiva vṛkṣādiśabdapravṛtti stadānvayavyatirekacodanayetyā
divyākhyānaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt 
tasmādvidhireva śabdārthaḥ 
yata evaikabhedābhidhāne'rthādanyavyāvṛttigatirata evetyādi  svārthasya bhedarūpa 
tvāditi  yo vṛkṣaśabdasyārtha śākhādimadākāra  vikalpapratibhāsī sa bhedarūpaḥ 
bhinnasvabhāvo'bhedākāravyāvṛttatvāt svayaṃ  aḍho bhedarūpasya svārthasyābhidhānā
bevārthādanyavyāvṛtti gatirevaṃ hyavṛkṣād bhedarūpasyaiva vṛkṣārthasya gatirbhavet 
yadyarthāt tatra vṛkṣanivṛttirbhavatīti  tasmāt svārthābhidhānameva śabdasya
vyāpāronyavyāvarttanantvarthāditi na śabdasya vyāpāradvayaṃ 
nanu vidhāyakena vākyenānvayamātrampratipādyate nānyasya vidhānaṃ pratiṣedho vā 
niṣedhakenāpi niṣedhamātrameva kevalaṃ pratīyate nānyasya vidhānaṃ pratiṣedho vetyata āha 
na hyanvaya ityādi  pratiniyatasyārthasya vidhānamanvayo yathā vṛkṣaṃcchindhīti 
tatrāvṛkṣasyārthānnivṛttirvyatirekaḥ  sa yatra na vidyate sovyatireka evaṃ bhūtonvayo
na me sti  kintu sarva eva sa vyatirekaḥ 
tena yaducyate bhaṭṭo dyotakarābhyāṃ   
vidhirūpaśca śabdārtho yena nābhyupagamyate 
na bhaved vyatirekopi tasya tatpūrvako hyasāviti
Slokavārtika
parihārasyāpi
kvacit sthityabhāve niṣphalacodanatvāt 
sa cāyaṃ bhedo'rūpaḥ  rūpavatvena kevalaṃ darśanaṃ buddhiviplavaḥ 
nirastamiṣṭatvāt  ananvayo vānvayarahito vā vyatireko na hīti sambandhaḥ 
tatra viśeṣasya pratiṣedho vyatirekaḥ  tatrārthāccheṣagatiranvayaḥ  ekānvaya ityādi
naitadeva samarthyate  ekānvayasyetyekasya vidhānasya parihāryābhāve vyavacchedyābhāve
niṣphalacodanatvāt 
yadi vṛkṣañchindhītyukterthādavṛkṣasya na tatra vyavacchedastadā vṛkṣaśabdaprayogo
a niṣphala syāt  yadvā kimvṛkṣañchinami utānyamiti śroturjijñāsāyāṃ satyāṃ
vṛkṣañchindhītyuktenyaniṣedhaḥ pratīyata evānyathā parihāryābhāve niṣphalamabhidhānaṃ
syāt  tathā yadāpyākāṃkṣārahitaḥ śrotā vṛkṣañchindhīti śabdena codyate tadāpi vṛkṣa
eva pravarttate nānyatra  vaktā hi vṛkṣa evāyaṃ pravarttate nānyatretyanenābhiprāyeṇa
śabdaṃ prayukte  vivakṣānugamanaṃ ca dhvaneḥ  tasmānnāsti vyatirekarahitonvayastathaṃka
parihārasyetyekapratiṣedhasya pratiṣedhasyaivaikasyetyarthaḥ  kvaciditi pratiṣedhena viṣayīkṛte
vastuni sthityabhāve niṣphalacodanatvāt  tathā hi surāviṣayasya pānasya pratiṣedhe 
yadi surāyā anyatrāpi pānasya nāvasthānaṃ syāt  tadā sarvasmin viṣaye niṣiddhasya
pānasya viśeṣe pratiṣedhonarthakaḥ  tatra surā  peyeti' surāpānamātrasya pratiṣedhe cari
tārthatvād vākyasya yadyapyudakādipānaṃ śabdena na vidhīyate  tathāpi surāyā anyatra
pānasyāvasthānanna nivāryata ityarthādanvayagatiranyathā surāgrahaṇamanarthakaṃ syāt  yadvā
kimudakādivat surā pātavyā kimvā neti praśne surā na pātavyetyukte suraiveti
pratīternodakādipānavidhānaṃ prakṛtaniṣedhyate  tena sarvatra vidhi pratiṣedharūpa
syaiva śabdārthatvaṃ 
katarhi vidhipratiṣedhaparyudāsavākyānāmbhedaḥ  mahānbhedaḥ  vidhāyakaṃ hi
vākyavidhi prādhānyenābhidhāyānyaniṣedhakamarthāt  niṣedhakaṃ ca niṣedhaṃ prādhānye 
nābhidhāyārthādanyavidhānamāha  paryudāsapratipādakantu vākyaṃ pratiṣedhapūrvakamanyavidhānaṃ
prādhānyenāhetyastyeva viśeṣa iti 
nanu yadyanyanivṛttirarthāt pratīyate saiva tarhi pāramārthikī bhāvānāmasti
yayā viśiṣṭā gṛhyanta ityevaṃ kasmānneṣyate  kiṃ punarevantadgatestadupādhitvāt
tadviśiṣṭo gata iti vyākhyāyata ityata āha  sa cāyamityādi    yo bhedo
vyāvṛttilakṣaṇa ācārya diṅa nāgena viśeṣaṇatvaṃnābhimataḥ sa cāyamarūpo niḥsva sāmānyacintā
tenaivāparamārthosāvanyathā na hi vastunaḥ 
vyāvṛttirvastu bhavati bhedosyāsmāditīraṇāt 
rūpaṃ hi paramārthaḥ sa bhedo yadi rūpaṃ syāt tadrūpaṃ pratadrūpaṃ vā  tādrūpya
nānyastato bhidyate  na ca tasya rūpaṃ anyasya syāt 
bhāvaḥ  nāsya vyatiriktamavyatiriktamvā rūpamastīti kṛtvā  kathantarhi bhāvānāṃ
vijātīyād bheda iti pratītiriti cedāha  rūpavattvena bhāvasambandhitvena tasya
bhedasya kevalandarśanampratītiviplavo bhrāntiḥ  kevalamiti tathābhūtabāhyanira
pekṣaṃ    kā rikā yā mapyevaṃ vyākhyānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ 
nanu yadi rūpavattvena darśanaṃ kathaṃ buddhiviplava ityata āha  tenavetyādi 
rūpavatvena bhāvasambandhitvena yaddarśanambhedasya tenaivāparamārtho na vastubhūto
'sattvāt  asāviti bhedaḥ prasajyarūpaḥ  anyathetyevamaniṣyamāṇe  na hi vastunaḥ
svalakṣaṇasya sambandhinī vyāvṛttirvastu bhavati  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ    bhedosyāsmādi
toraṇāt 
etaduktambhavati  yadi hi sā vastubhūtā syāt tadā vṛkṣebhyo'vṛkṣavyāvṛttira
bhinnā bhinnā vā syāt  yadyabhinnā  asmādavṛkṣād vṛkṣasya bheda iti vyatireka  b
pratītirna syāt  palāśāccaikasmādavṛkṣavyāvṛtterabhinnatvāt  dhavādīnāmavṛkṣa
vyāvṛttirna syāt  palāśavat tatsvabhāvāyā vyāvṛttesteṣvananugamāt  atha
palāśād bhinnā sā  tatrāpyavṛkṣavyāvṛtteḥ sakāśāt palāśasya vyāvṛttiḥ syādavṛkṣa
vyāvṛtteśca vyāvarttamānasya palāśasyāvṛkṣarūpatā syādavṛkṣavat  tataścāsmāda
vṛkṣādasya vṛkṣasya bheda iti pratītirna syādiṣyate ca  tasmāttadvyāvṛttirna vastu 
bhedosyāsmāditīraṇāduccāraṇādityarthaḥ  upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat pratīterapi grahaṇaṃ 
rūpaṃ hotyādinā vyācaṣṭe  hi yasmāt  rūpaṃ kimucyate paramārthaḥ  vastu
svabhāvaḥ  bhedonyavyāvṛttiyaṃdi rūpaṃ syād yadi svabhāvo bhavet  tadityavṛkṣād
vyāvṛttirūpaṃ  tadrūpamiti yattadvayāvṛttaṃ palāśasvalakṣaṇaṃ tadātmakaṃ  atadrūpaṃ veti
tatonyadityarthaḥ  vastunastattvānyattvānatikramādityarthaḥ 
tādūpya ityādinā prathamapakṣe doṣamāha  tādrūpye palāśādanyattve yayā vyāvṛttyā
sāmānyabhūtayā sarve vṛkṣabhedāḥ vyāvṛttā dṛṣṭāstasyāstādūpye palāśādananyatvebhyupa
gamyamāne tadeva palāśasvalakṣaṇameva vyāvṛttiriti kṛtvā palāśa evāvṛkṣād bhinnaḥ
prāpnoti nānyo dhavādiḥ  tata ityavṛkṣād bhidyeta  kikāraṇamityāha  na hī
tyādi  avṛkṣāddhi vyāvṛttiḥ palāśasyaiva rūpaṃ  na ca tasya rūpa manyasya dhavādeḥ
na tadeva bhedasya rūpaṃ cet  anyadeva rūpaṃ syāt  tataśca bhāvastasmād
vyāvartteta  tataḥ tasya bhedo na syāt  yo yadbhedāda vyāvarttate tat tadeva bhava
toti sosya bheda iti ca na syāt  na hyanyonyasya bhedo bhavati sambandhī 
sati vā sambandhitve kāryakāraṇabhāvāt tajjanitaṃ rūpaṃ bheda iti śraviśeṣāt
svakāraṇānāṃ kāryāṇi sarvāṇi vyāvṛttayaḥ syuḥ  bhedasyārthāntaratve ca tato'pyasya
bhedostīti bhedopādhitvāt dravyāntaravat na bhedaḥ syāt 
syāt 
na tadevetyādinā dvitīyapakṣopanyāsaḥ  na tadeva palāśasvalakṣaṇameva tasya
bhedasya rūpaṃ    rūpaṃ ca svabhāvaścāsau bheda iṣyate  tatonyadeva palāśād vyāvṛtti
rūpaṃ syāt  yadvā rūpaṃ cānyadeva bhedasya syāt  tataścānyattvāt kāraṇāt 
bhāvaḥ palāśātmakastasmādavṛkṣavyāvṛttirūpād vyāvartteta  tataḥ kāraṇāt 
ūṣmādityavṛkṣāt tasya palāśasya bheda iti na syāt  yasmād yat khalu vastu 
yato bhedo yadbhedastasmād vyāvarttate  tattadeva bhavati  avṛkṣavyāvṛtterbhavati 
avṛkṣavyāvṛtteravṛkṣanivṛttirūpāyā nivarttamānampalāśasvalakṣaṇamavṛkṣamiva syādavṛkṣa
vat  mā vā bhūd vṛkṣāvṛkṣayorekatvantathāpi sosya bheda iti ca na syāt 
yadi cāyamavṛkṣād bhedaḥ palāśādanyaḥ syāttadayama vṛkṣād bhedosya palāśasya
sambandhīti na syāt  na hotyādyasyeva samarthanaṃ  anyaḥ svatantronyasya sambandhī
bhedo dharmarūpo bhavati  sati veti sambandhitvebhyupagamyamāne vā  sambandha kārya
kāraṇabhāvoṅgīkarttavyaḥ  bhinnayoḥ kāryakāraṇamantareṇa sambandhāyogāt  tatra
vyāvṛttimān kāraṇaṃ vyāvṛttiḥ kāryaṃ  iti heto rūpaṃ vastvantarameva tajjanitantena
vyāvṛttimatā svalakṣaṇena janitaṃ bheda iti  pādā   padā rthāntarasya nāma kṛta
ntasmāt kāryatvenābhimatād bhedākhyāt padārthād
aviśeṣādanyatrāpi kāraṇānāṃ yāni
kāryāṇi tāni sarvāṇi vyāvṛttayo bhedāḥ syuḥ  na caivaṃ  tadānyatrāpi bhedābhimate
bheda iti vyapadeśo mā bhūt 
atha kāryaṃ bheda iti nocyate kintu bhedaḥ kārya ityucyate  tadāpyāha  arthānta
ratve ca bhedasyābhyupagamyamāne  tatopi vyāvṛttimatopyasya bhedasya bhedosti 
anyathā bhedasyārthāntaratvameva na syāt  tataśca palāśasyāvṛkṣād yo bhedastasya
bhedasya palāśād bheda iti kṛtvā sa bhedo bhedopādhiḥ sa palāśād bhedaḥ 
upādhi viśeṣaṇaṃ yasya bhedasya sa bhedopādhistadbhāvastattvantasmādasāvavṛkṣād
bhedaḥ palāśasya na bhedaḥ syāt  dravyāntaravat  yathā hi dravyāntaraṃ ghaṭādika sāmānyacintā
na hi bhedopādhivadeva bhedaḥ śrayamata iti viśeṣanirdeśāt  tataścopā
dhyabhāve bhedasyaivābhāvaḥ syāt  tato nānyattvam  nāpyanyathā'bhāvāt bhāve
mapyaghaṭāpekṣayā yo bhedastadupādhitvānna palāśasya bhedastadvat  svatantratvādityabhi
prāyaḥ 
nanu yadi nāma bhedopādhirbhedastathāpi kimiti palāśasya bhedo na bhavatītyata
āha  na hītyādi  ayamata iti viśeṣanirdeśāt  ayamavṛkṣād bhedaḥ  ata itya
vṛkṣāt  asyetyetadapekṣaṇīyaṃ  asya  palāśasyāyaṃ bhedo'smādavṛkṣādityevaṃ viśe
ṣanirdeśāt pāratantryeṇa nirdeśāt palāśasya sambandhī bhedo dharmaḥ sidhyati  pāra
tantryeṇa ca nirdeśo bhedasyābhede sati sidhyati bhedāntarapratikṣepeṇa  na tvarthāntaratve
bhedasya  arthāntaratve hi bhedopādhitvād ghaṭavanna palāśasya bhedaḥ syāt  tataścāsmā
dasya bheda iti viśeṣanirdeśo na syāt  tadevaṃ vyatirekapakṣe'vṛkṣād bhedasyāpi
palāśād yo bhedaḥ sopi rūpavāniti tasyāpi svāśrayād bhedena bhavitavyaṃ  tathā
ca sarvabhedānāṃ bhinnasvabhāvatayā bhedopādhitvena svayanna rūpabhedateti na kaścid bhedaḥ
syāt 
etadevāha  tataścetyādi  upādhyabhāva iti vyāvṛttilakṣaṇasya dharmabhūtasyo
pādherabhāve sarvasya svabhāvāntaratvena dharmitvād bhedasyai vābhāvaḥ syāt tasya dharmi
rūpatvāt 
yopi manyate  yadi rūpavatī vyāvṛttiḥ syāt syāt tattvānyatvapakṣabhāvī
doṣo yāvatā nīrūpā sāsti tayā ca bhāvā viśiṣṭā gṛhyanta iti 
tadayuktaṃ 
tadgatāveva śabdebhyo gamyate'nyanivarttanaṃ 
na tatra gamyate kaścidviśiṣṭaḥ kenacitpara    pra vā 
iti granthavirodhāt  nīrūpasya cāstitvavirodhācchaśaviṣāṇavat  nīrūpatvā 
deva ca na tasyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ grāhakaṃ nāpyanumānaṃ  sambandhābhāvāt 
nāpi niyatarūpānyathānupapattyā tatkalpanā sambandhābhāvādeva  svahetubhya eva
ca niyatarūpāṇāmutpannatvāditi sarvabhāvā svabhāvena vyāvṛttibhāgina' 
ityatrāntare'bhihitatvāt 
nāpi ca sāipratipannā viśeṣaṇambhavitumarhati  na hi daṇḍāpratītau daṇḍīti pratī
tirbhavati  nāpi sā kvacidāśritā nīrūpatvāt  na cāsambaddhamviśeṣaṇambhavati 
nāpyanyanivṛttigrahaṇapurassaraṃ vṛkṣādiṣu vṛkṣaśabda pravarttate'pratītirityuktatvāt 
nivṛttenarūpatayā'pratipannatvena saṃketasyāpravṛtteśca  kathaṃ śabdaviṣayatvantasmā
paramārthaḥ  kathantahi abhinnasya vastunaḥ śabdena codane tasyaivānyato bhedāt
vyarthāni na syuriti cet  naiṣa doṣaḥ  yasmāt
ekārthaśleṣaviccheda eko vyāpriyate dhvaniḥ 
liṅgaṃ vā tatra vicchinnaṃ vāhuyaṃ vastu na kiñcana 
yasyābhidhānato vastusāmarthyādakhile gatiḥ 
danubhavadvāreṇa vṛkṣo'yaṃ nāvṛkṣa ityevaṃ niścaya utpadyate  tenānyanivṛttiḥ pratiṣedha
sb vikalpena kalpitā  yathāsaṃketaṃ ca vṛkṣādau śabda pravarttamānorthādanyanivṛttimākṣi
ti  anyanivṛttivikalpamākṣipatītyarthaḥ  tenānyanivṛttyā viśiṣṭo  vastubhāgo
gamyata ityucyata iti 
yadi vyāvṛttayaḥ sāmānyabhūtā bahirvastutvena neṣyante  nāpi paraparikalpitaṃ
sāmānyamevaṃ sati bāhyamvastveva vācyamāpatitaṃ  tatra ca doṣa ityāha  kathantīti 
abhinnasya niraṃśasya vastunaḥ śabdena codane upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat liṃgena pratipādane 
tasyaivābhinnasya vastuna ekasmād bhinnasya punaranyatopi bhedāt  tathā hi yena
svabhāvena na śabdo'kṛtakād bhinnastenaiva mūrttānityatvācca  tasyānaṃśatvāt  anaṃśasya
ca vastunaḥ kṛtakaśabdenaikasyākṛtakād bhedasya bhinnasya svabhāvasya codane  tathā
liṃgena pratipādane sarva dagatessarvebhyo bhinnasya svabhāvasya pratipatteḥ  tatrānaṃśe
vastuni kathaṃ śabdapramāṇāntarāṇi vyarthāni na syuḥ  ekena śabdena codane śabdāntarāṇāṃ
vaiyarthyaṃ syāt  ekena liṅgena pratipādane pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ vaiyarthyaṃ syāt 
yasmādityādinā pariharati  tasmād yo yena dharmeṇa viśeṣaḥ saṃpratīyata
 ityādinā prāgevedaṃ codyamparihṛtamadhikavidhānārthantu punarupanyāsaḥ 
artheṣvākārāntarasamāropotheṃślaṣaḥ  sa ca pratipattibhedenānekaḥ  tatreti buddhi
pratibhāsini dharmiṇi bāhyabhinnatayā'khyeyāste  bāhyatayādhyastasyaiva buddhayākārasya
śabdavācyatvāt na punarbāhyambuddhayākāro vā kevala śabdavācyaḥ svalakṣaṇatvāt 
tatra dharmiṇi vidhirūpatayā svārthapratipattidvāreṇaikārthaleṣa vicchede'panayana eko
dhvanirvyāpriyate    
liṅgaṃ caikārthaśleṣavicchede vyāpriyate  tatra svārthābhidhānadvāreṇa samāropa
vyavacchede śabdapramāṇāntarāṇāṃ sāphalyamiti yāvat  na punarjñānād vyatirikta
mbāhyamvastu svalakṣaṇaṃ  svalakṣaṇād vā vyatiriktambāhyamvastu sāmānyalakṣaṇa
svācyaṃ kiñcanāsti  yasya vastuno'bhidhānato'khile vastusvabhāve gatirbhavet  sāmānyacintā
kurvannānāphala śabda ekādhāro bhavatyataḥ 
yathā bāhyāntarbhedasaṃsṛṣṭayā buddhayā svasyaiva kriyāyogyamadhyavasāya
śabdārtha upayujyataṃ iti pūrvoktavat  taistaṃbhrāntikāraṇaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭarūpa iva
pratibhāsamāne yathāsaṃketa vyavacchedārthaṃ tatraiva te vyāpriyante  na hyekasādhyamapi
vyavacchedamanyaḥ karoti saṃketapratiniyamāt  naiva vicchinnaṃ kiñcid vastu
prakṣipyate  yasyābhidhānāt vastubalena sarvathā gatiḥ syāt śabdānāṃ  buddhi
viṣayatvāt 
tatra ca śravastuni vastusāmarthyābhāvāt  tathābhūtenāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ samyag
vastusāmarthyād vastuvaśāt  yataśca śabda svābhidhānadvāreṇa vyavacchedaṃ karoti
tataḥ kāraṇāt taṃ taṃ vyavacchedaṃ kurvannānāphalaḥ śabdo bhavatyekādhāraśca  kathaṃ 
arthakriyāyogyamadhyavasāya  anarthakriyākāriṇāpi svābhāsamarthakriyākāritvena
svalakṣaṇarūpattvenādhyasyetyarthaḥ  tatraiveti buddhipratibhāse bāhya tayādhyaste  kiṃbhūte  a
taistaṃrbhrāntikāraṇaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭarūpa iva bhāti

kiṃ sāmānyena kṛtaṃ syāt  atha sāmānyena dvitīyā sthitiḥ kriyate  sā āśrayeṇa

svaviṣaya
vijñānajanana sāmathryena tatra hi paramapekṣeteti avaśyaṃ tata ātma
pratilambhaḥ na cāyamātmapratilambhaḥ sāmānyasya kutaścit saṃbhavati  tasmāt
tat kuto'pi na vyaṅgyam  naiva sāmānya vyaktiyogyatā prāptamiti 
atha sāmānyamasti svāśrayasamavetaṃ tadā svāśrayasamavāyāpekṣaḥ tadātmanyanyatra
vā vijñānaheturiti uktam tatra janyajanakayo  āśraya śrayilakṣaṇasamaveto'yaṃ
kaḥ svayamavāyāpekṣo vijñānahetuḥ tena janyasya eva syāt taddheto bhāvasya
prāgbhāvāt paścācca tato bhāvāt  nittyaṃ tadbhāvasadbhāva iti prāgapi
samayāyāt vijñānodayaprasaṃgāt 
na hi vyaktiḥ sāmānyasya saṃskārāt vyañjikā  kintahi  tagrāhiṇa' a
yathābhāvameva pravarttanta ityādinā  bhāvābhāvānavidhānācca sāmarthyantra prati a

sāmānyamapi svākārajñānajananāśrayamapekṣata iti vyaṅgya miṣṭantatastenāśrayādupa
lambhayogya ātmā labdhavyaḥ  na cāyanātmapratilambhaḥ sāmānyasya kutaścit
sambhavati  nityatvenābhyupagatatvāt  taditi sāmānyaṃ 
naivetyādi paraḥ  svāśrayasamavāyavyakti brūma iti sambandhaḥ  svāśrayasamavāyaḥ
kathaṃ vyaktiriti cedāha  svāśrayetyādi  taditi sāmānyaṃ  anyatreti svāśraye 
uktamityā cā ryaḥ  tadevedamanupakārakasyāśrayatvaṃ na sambhāvayāma ityādi

śrayasamavāyāt prāgbhāvāt  svāśrayasamavāye sati paścācca tataḥ svāśrayasamavāyād
vijñānahetoḥ svabhāvasya bhāvāt  nityaṃ sāmānyasya vijñānajananasvabhāvatvādasiddha
metaditi cedāha  nityamityādi  tatsvabhāvasadbhāva iti vijñānajananasvabhāve

pramāṇavārttikasvavṛttiṭīkā

spaṣṭāspaṣṭaviśeṣaṇāt tadakāriṇaścātatsaṃskārakatvāt  naivaṃ vyakteryathā
hīndriyasya saṃskāraḥ kaścit tadbhāvābhāvakālayoḥ pratipattāvaviśeṣāt 
viṣayasaṃskāro hi indriyāviśeṣe'pi tadviśeṣādhānādupakārī syāt na
vyajñjikā sāmānyasya  yena tayā janyaṃ syāt sāmānyaṃ  kintarhi tadgrāhiṇa iti
sāmānyagrāhiṇaḥ saṃskārād vyañjaketi prakṛtaṃ

Ślokavārtika
mātragato vā ākāśādivat sarvatra bhāvakalpanā syāt 
na yāti na ca tatrāsīdasti paścāt
tatra yadi svāśrayamātragatakāle pakṣayorghaṭādiśanyayoḥ ghaṭāderutpāde kathaṃ
bhinnadeśadravyavattinaḥ sāmānyasya teṣu sambhavaḥ  svataḥ pūrvadravyāt utpadyamānaṃ dravye

na ca paryanuyogosti vastuśakteḥ kadācana 
vahitirnā  nā  kāśaṃ kotra paryanuyujyatā miti

pramāṇavārttikasvavṛttiṭīkā 
bonyābhyāṃ tatsambandhāt ālokarajjuvaṃśavat  na ca sāvayavatvamantareṇa

virodhād prayuktametat

sāvayavatvādanyenāvayavena ghaṭena sambadhyate  anyena ghaṭādibhiḥ  evaṃ rajjuvaṃśa
daṇḍādāvapi svasambandhibhiḥ 
na hotyādyasyaiva samarthanaṃ  atha sāvayavatvena sāmānyamanekavṛttīṣyeta  tathāpi
kathamekamanekatra vartteta  yasmādekadeśā sāmānyasya varttanta iti  ye ca tadaika
deśā sāmānyasya pratyekampiṇḍeṣu varttante  te kiṃ sāmānyātmakā uta neti   
yadi sāmānyātmakā ekamekatra varttata iti prāptaṃ  na caikamekatra varttamānaṃ sāmānya
miti yuktamvaktuṃ  atha na sāmānyātmakāste  kathaṃ sāmānyamanekatra varttata ityu
cyate  ekadeśeṣu ca sāmānyasya yadyekadeśāntareṇa vṛttistadānavasthā syāt  na ca
sāvayavatvamanta reṇaikasyānekatra vṛttiryuktā  athānavayavaṃ pratipiṇḍaṃ parisamāptyā
piṇḍavadasādhāraṇatvānna sāmānyambhavitumarhati  kiṃ kāraṇantasyānavayavasya sāmānya
syaikena dravyeṇa sambandho ya ātmā  tadvayatirekeṇa dvitīyātmābhāvāt  ekātmanaśca
tasya sāmānyasya tatpradeśavattasambandharūpatvāt  utpitsughaṭadeśāt  pūrvadeśarvātta
yad ghaṭadravya tatsambandhirūpatvāt  nāsti bhinnadeśena yugapadyogaḥ  anyathetyutpitsu
deśadravyasambandharūpatve tatsambadhāyogāt  tena pūrvadravyeṇa sambandhāyogāt  tasmāde
kavyaktiniyatātmanaḥ sāmānyasya nāsti tasminneva kāle bhinnadeśena dravyeṇa sambandhaḥ 
sambandhe vā pūrvavyaktiniyataikātmakatvena sāmānyasya pūrvavyaktau sthitistasminneva
kāle bhinnadeśavyaktisambandhenāsthitiretaccaviruddhamityāha  ekasyādheyasyetyādi 
tatra sthānamiti pūrvavyaktau  tadaiva tasminneva kāle vyaktyantare tvayābhyapagamāt 
pūrvavyaktityāgamantareṇaikasya cānyatrānvayāyogāt  tatra pūrvasyāṃ vyaktau  tenaiva
pūrvavyaktiniyatenātmanā  tasya sāmānyasyāsthānamityayuktametat  kiṅkāraṇaṃ 
tatsthitetyādi  tasyāmeva vyaktau sthitāsthitātmanoḥ svabhāvayorekasya sāmānyasya
yugapad virodhāt 
 sāmānyacintā
sarvatra sarvadā sarvākāreṇa sthitātmaneti cet tatsvabhāvadarśanāśrayapratyayaḥ
nanu yathaikatyāgenāparatra vṛttirevamaparāparāvayavairbahuṣu ca vṛttirdṛṣṭatvāditi
dvividhābhyupagamyate  tathā sāmānyaṃ yadā yenaiva rūpeṇaikatra vṛttantadaiva tenaiva rūpeṇānyatra
varttate dṛṣṭatvāditi sāpi tṛtīyā vṛttiḥ  kinnābhyupagamyate  taduktambha ṭṭena 
na hi dvaividhyameveti vṛtterasti niyāmakaṃ 
trividhāpi hi dṛṣṭatvāt sambhaved dvividhā yatheti  
u dyo ta ka ro pyāha na gotvamavayavī na ca samudāyastasmānna tatra kṛtsnaika
deśaśabdau staḥ  na cet tatraitau śabdau staḥ tasmād gotvaṃ kiṃ kṛtsnamvarttate utaikadeśe
neti na yuktaḥ praśnaḥ  kathantarhi gotvaṃ goṣu varttate  āśrayāśrayibhāvena kaḥ
punarāśrayāśrayibhāvaḥ  samavāyaḥ  tatra vṛttimad gotvaṃ  vattiḥ samavāya iha
pratyayahetutvāttena sarvatra pūrvadravya utpitsudravye ca samavāya eva vṛttirataḥ kathamucyate 
sthitāsthitātmanorekatra virodhādayuktametaditi 
etadevāha  sarvatretyādi  sarvatra pūrvavyaktāvutpitsudravye ca  sarvadevotyatsu
dravyotpādepi yadā varttate tadāpi dravyanna jahāti  tena sthitāsthitātmanornaikatra
virodho sthitātmano'bhāvāditi  tadayuktaṃ  na hyekasamavetatvamevānyavyaktisama
vetatvamanyasyāstatra pratibhāsanaprasaṅgāt    tasmādekasamavetatvānyasamavetatvayoḥ
parasparaṃ bheda eva  taccābhinnaṃ sāmānyādekasamavetatvādananugamavadanyatra sāmānyasyā
pyananugamaprasaṅgaḥ  yadvaikavyaktikālādisambandhena jñānajananaśaktiryāsāmanyasya  na
sā'nyavyaktyādisambandhatvena  tenaikasyāṃ vyaktī sāmānyasya jñānajananaśaktira
nyasyāṃ jñānajananaśaktivirodhinī  śaktiśca śaktimato'bhinnā  śaktilakṣaṇa
tvācca vastunaḥ  tena yadvastvekantadekavṛttyeveti vyāptisiddhiḥ  vastu caikaṃ sāmānyaṃ
yadi kathamanyatrāpi vartteta  tathābhūta saya pratibhāsāditi cet    na  pratibhāso
hyapratibhāsasya bādhako nāvastunastasyāpi pratibhāsanāt  asya tu vastupratibhāso
bādhako na cānugataṃ vastvastītyuktaṃ  ata eva na pratijñāyāḥ pratyakṣabādhā  sāmānya
jñānasya pratyakṣatvābhāsā    cca 
nanu yāvadasyāprāmāṇyaṃ na tāvadanumānasya pravṛttiryāvacca nānumānasya pravṛtti
stāvannāsya pratyakṣābhāsatetyanyonyāśrayatvaṃ syāditi cet  na  yatonumānaṃ prati
bhāsamānasya vastutvasandehamātreṇaiva pravarttate  nāpyasyāprāmāṇyanimittamanumānampra
Ślokavārtika
b
sarvatra sarvākāraḥ syāt  tathā ca sati gavyavyaśva iti pratyaya syāt  ave
sthitātmanodravyasambandhāt tatsvabhāvapratipattyā ca tathā niścayād tasyaikasyā
kārāntarābhāvāt 
tasmād anavayavaṃ anekadeśe yugapannādhīyate 
pūrvamādhāraṃ hitvā'pi bhinnadeśasthānamityapi nābhimataḥ 
anyatra varttamānasya tatā'nyasthānajanmani 
varttatepi tu svasādhyapratibaddhaliṅganimittam  ataḥ sāmānyajñānasya bādhakantasmā
nnāsti paramārthata ekamvastvekadā'nekavṛttiḥ  vṛttau tu tatsthitāsthitātmanovirodha
eva  ā cā rya stvabhyupagamyāpi doṣamāha  tatsvabhāvetyādi 
svabhāvasya darśanamāśrayo yasya pratyayasya sa sarvatra bhinnajātīyepi dravye sarvākāra
syāt  tathā ca sati gāmavyaśva ityādi  kiṅkāraṇam  ityāha  aśve
Ia sthita ātmā yasya dravyatvasyeti vigrahaḥ  gamakatvād vyadhikaraṇasyāpi bahuvrīhiḥ' 
aśve sthita iti vā sādhanaṃ kṛteti samāsaḥ  paścādātmaśabdena dvipado bahubrīhiḥ 
tatsvabhāvapratipattyā cāravasthitasvabhāvadravyatvapratipattyāṃ ca tathā niścayād
gaudravyamiti niścayāt 
syādetat  nāśvasamavetadravyatvapratipattyā dravyamiti pratītiḥ  ki
ntarhi  dravyatvamātrapratipattyetyata āha  tasya cetyādi  tasya cāśve dravyatvasyai
ka' syādṛṣṭasyāpratipannasyāśvasamavetatvavyatirekeṇākārāntarasyāśvāsa sa mavetatva
lakṣaṇasyābhāvāt  tasmādaśvasamavetenaiva dravyatvena viśiṣṭāṃ gāṃ dravyamiti pratipadya
mānośva iti pratīyāt  yasya tvaśvavyatiriktameva dravyatvasāmānyantena ca viśi
ṣṭamasau gāṃ pratipadyamāno niyamenāśva iti pratīyāt 
tasmādityupasaṃhāraḥ  anavaya'vaṃ sāmānyamanekadeśe'neko deśo'syeti tasmin
ghaṭādau yugapannādhīyate  nādheyatāṃ pratipadyate  iyatā ca na cāṃśavadityetad
vyākhyātaṃ 
jahāti pūrvannādhāramityetat pūrvetyādinā vyācaṣṭe  sa ceti pūrvādhāratyāgaḥ
sāmānyasya nābhimataḥ    
anyatreti pūrvavyaktau varttamānasya sāmānyasya svasmāt pūrvādhāradeśād acala
tastataḥ pūrvādhāradeśādanyatra sthāne janma yasya dravyasya tasmin vṛttirityatiyukti
svasmādacalataḥ sthānāvṛttirityatiyuktimat 
yatrāsau vartate bhāvastena saṃbadhyate'pi ca 
taddeśinañtra vyāpnoti kimapyetanmādbhutam 
yaḥ sarvatragatasāmānyavādī tasyāpi 
iti saṃgrahaślokau 
vyaktau vaikatra sā vktacā'bhedāt sarvatragā yadi  
jātirdṛśyeta sarvvatra
na jāte kadācidabhivyaktiriti niṣiddhametat  tasmāt anapekṣitaparo a
paskārā nityaṃ vā śyeta kadācid prakṛtā vā tatsvabhāvāvasthānātū anya
svabhāvasya kṛtaścidapyanutpādāt 
C
madityupahasati  
pūrvavyaktideśādavicaladapi sāmānyantatonyadeśandravyaṃ vyāpnotīti cedāha 
yatretyādi  yatra deśe'sau paścātkālabhāvī bhāvo varttate  tena deśena sāmānyaṃ na
sambadhyate svavyaktisarvaṃgatatvābhyupagamāt  yatra deśe sāmānyaṃ na varttate taddeśinaṃ ca
paścāt kāla bhāvinambhāvaṃ vyāpnotīti nyāyātikrāntatvāt kimapyetanmahādbhuta
miti prakārāntareṇopahasati  na hi yo yatra deśe na varttate sa taddeśaṃ vyāpnotīti
nyāyānusāriṇā śakyamavasātuṃ   
sarvagatatvakalpanāmapi nirācikīrṣannāha  yasyetyādi  tasyāpi sarvagata
sāmānyavādinaḥ sarvatragā yadi jātistadaikatra śāvaleyādau yā tasyāvyaktirabhi
vyaktistaṇyā karaṇabhūtayā  sā jātissarvatra vyaktiśūnyepi deśe vijātīya
vyaktibhede ca vyaktaiva prakāśitaivābhedādekatvāt sarvatra vyaktiśūnyepi deśe dṛśyeta 
etaduktambhavati  yadyapi vyaktiśūnye pradeśe vijātīyavyaktau ca svavyaktervya
ñjikāyā abhāvastathāpi svavyaktyabhivyaktenaiva rūpeṇa tatrāvasthānājjāterupalambhaḥ
syānno cet svabhāvanānātvaṃ prāpnotītyekarūpā ceṣyata iti bhāvaḥ  na jātenityāyā
anādheyātiśayatvena kadācidabhivyaktiriti niṣidvametat  vṛttirādheyatā vyakti
riti tasminna yujyata  ityatrāntare  yata evantasmāt sā jātinitya
manapekṣitaparopaskārānādheyātiśayā  evambhūtā yadi svabhāvena svavijñānajanana
yogyā  tadā nityandṛśyeta vyakteḥ prāk paścācca  atha na yogyā tadā kadācid b
daśyeta  kiṃ kāraṇaṃ  tasmina vijñānajananayogyasvabhāvai tadviparīte cāvasthānāt 
sarvakālamekarūpatvādityarthaḥ  asamarthā vyaktyasannidhāne tatsannidhāne tu samarthā bhavati 
i
abhyupagamyāpi vyāpinyapi ekatra vyaktā bhedābhāvāt vyaktaiva sarvaśreti
vyaktiśanyeṣvapi deśeṣu na dṛśyeta 
na ca sā jātyapekṣiṇī 
vyañjakā pratipattau hi na vyaṃgye saṃpratīyate 
viparyayaḥ punaḥ kasmādiṣṭaḥ sāmānyatadvatoḥ 
yo hi svāśrayendriyasaṃyogāpekṣaṃ sāmānyaṃ āśrayaśūnyeṣu pradeśeṣu naśyata ti
prativakti tasyāpi svāśrayendriyasaṃyoga upakāraka iti tatastaddarśī yathāsthitāṃ
tato na nityandarśanamadarśanamvā jāterityata āha  svabhāve tyādi  nityatvenānā
dheyātiśayatvāditi bhāvaḥ   
yadi jāternāsti vyakti starika vyaktyaivaikatra sā vyaktetyāyucyata ityata
āha  abhyupagamyāpītyādi  vyāpinyapi jāti  ekatrāśraye vyaktā bhedābhāvā
dekatvājjātervyaktaiva prakāśitaiva sarvatra vyaktiśūnye deśe vijātīye ca vyaktibhede 
vyaktiśūnyeṣvapītyapi śabdād vijātīyepi vyaktibhede  api ca na ca sā jāti
rvyaktyapekṣiṇī  vyañjikā vyaktinnapekṣyeta  vyakterjātivyañjakatvā' bhāvā
diti bhāvaḥ  yadi hi vyañjikā vyaktimapekṣeta  tadā vyañjakāpratipattau na
vyaṅgyasya pratītiḥ syānna hi pradīpādyapratītau ghaṭādeḥ pratītirbhavati  tathehāpi
vyaktyapratītau na jātipratīti syāt  sāmānyatadvatostu vyaṅagyavyañjakayovipa
ryayaḥ punaḥ kasmādiṣṭaḥ  tathā hi nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇāviśeṣye buddhirvarttata iti niya
māt   prāgeva sāmānyagrahaṇamiṣṭantaddvāreṇa tu vyakteḥ  tato vyañjikāyā
vyaktergrahaṇamantareṇāpi vyaṅagyābhimatasya sāmānyasya pratipattiriṣṭeti viparyayaḥ 
yo hītyādinā vyācaṣṭe  svāśrayo yatra samavetaṃ sāmānyaṃ  sāmānyagrāhaka
mindriyaṃ ca tayossaṃyogastadapekṣā pratītiryasya sāmānyasya tattathoktaṃ  āśrayaśūnyāḥ
pradeśā vijātīya vyaktyadhyāsitā vyaktiśūnyāśca  teṣu na dṛśyate  yathokta
saṃyogābhāvāt tasyāpyevaṃ vādinaḥ  kvacid vyaktidarśane satyastyevāśrayendriya
saṃyogo jāteḥ sarvatra sthitāyā upakāraka iti  tata āśrayendriyasaṃyogāddhetostadarśī
kvacid vyaktibhede jātidarśī yathāsthitāṃ sarvadeśavyāpinīñjātimpaśyet 
yatraiva vyañjikā vyaktistatraiva jāte svarūpaṃ dṛśyaṃ nānyatreti cedāha  na hītyādi 
tasyāmiti jātau  kvacid vyaktau dṛśyamānāyāntadīyāmiti sāmānyasambandhi 
ekasya dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavirodhāt  evantāvad vyakteyaṃñjikātvamabhyupagamya ca śabdo
pāttortho vyākhyātaḥ  sāmānyacintā
paśyet  na hi tasyāṃ dṛśyamānāyāṃ śradṛṣṭā sā evaṃ yuktā sāmānyasya vyakti 
yaṅgyatvāt  vyañjakaviprayukteṣu deśeṣu na dṛṣṭetyapi nirākṛtaṃ tatra tathābhūtasya
vyaṃgyavyañjakabhāvasyābhāvāt  svayaṃ pratītya parapratyāyanahetuhi pradīpādiprakāśakaḥ
svarūpaśūnye deśe vyaṃgyo na svayaṃ darśakaḥ naivaṃ vyaktirapi sāmānyasya viparyayāt 
kathaṃ hi sā sāmānsya vyañjikā  syāt tatpratipattidvāreṇa dṛśyā ca syāt 
adhunā na sā vyaktyapekṣiṇītyādi vyākhyātumāha  vyaktivyaṅgyatvādityādi 
tasya ca mithyātvamanantaroktenaiva pratipāditaṃ  na hyekasya daṣṭādṛṣṭamastyato'
pūrvapakṣa evāyaṃ kevalandoṣāntarābhidhānārthaṃ gajanimīlanaṃ kṛtvopanyastaṃ  tathābhūtasyeti
nyāyyasya  tatreti jātitadvati  nyāyyasya vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvasyābhāvāt 
kiṅkāraṇaṃ  svetyādi  hi yasmāt  svarūpaśūnye deśe pradīpādirahite deśe
svavyaṅagyaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ  naivaṃ yathoktena nyāyena vyaktirvyañjikā sāmānyasya  a
kiṅṅkāraṇam  viparyayāt  yasmādagṛhītvāpi vyaktiṃ sāmānyamādau gṛhyata
itīṣyate pareṇa  sāmānyagrahaṇadvāreṇaiva vyaktergrahaṇābhyupagamādataśca vyañjakā
pratipattyāpi vyaṅgyasya grahaṇāt  vyañjakadharmātikramo vyakteḥ 
etadevāha  kathaṃ hītyādi  seti vyakti sāmānyasya vyañjikā ca syā
diti sambandhaḥ  tatpratipattidvāreṇeti sāmānyapratipattidvāreṇa  sā vyaktirdṛśyā
syāditi viruddhametat  evamiti sāmānyadarśanabalena  vyakterdarśanebhyupagamyamāne 
vyaṅggyā sā vyakti prasajyate sāmānyañcetyadhyāhāraḥ  pradīpena ghaṭavaditi 
tṛtīyeti yogavibhāgāt samāsaḥ  supsupeti vā samāsaḥ  yathā pradīpena ghaṭo
vyaṅgyastadvatsā mānyena vyaktirvyaṅgyā prāpterthaḥ  tatpratipattimantareṇa sāmānya
pratipattimvinā vyakteradṛśyarūpatvāt  anye tvāhuḥ  vyaṅagyā ca saivaṃ prasajyata
ityatra caśabdena sāmānyavyañjakamityetadupāttaṃ  tataḥ pradīpaghaṭābhyāṃ tulyamiti
dvandvādeva vatirdraṣṭavyaḥ  pūrvanipātalakṣaṇasya vyabhicāritvād ghaṭaśabdasyāpūrvanipātaḥ 
pradīpavata sāmānya vyañjakaṃ  ghaṭavacca vyaktirvyaṅgyā  prasajyata iti vākyārtha
iti  aneneti sāmānyavādinā  sāmānyamvinā kimasambhavatkāryamabhisamīkṣya 
evamityuktavidhinā bahvāyāsaḥ  aśakyasādhanatayā bahuduḥkhahetuḥ  
parasparetyādi paraḥ  bhedādvilakṣaṇatvāddhetorvyatirekiṇīṣvananvayinīṣu  śranva
yina ekākārasya pratyayasya pratyayagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇamevaṃ śabdasya  sāmānyamanta
reṇāyogāt  sāmānyavāda āśrita iti sambandhaḥ 
kathamityācā ryaḥ  ye pācakādiśabdā na kriyānimittānicchanti tān pratye
C
pramāṇavāttikasva vṛttiṭīkā 
evaṃ pradīpena ghaṭavat vyaṅgya prasajyate  kenacit prakāreṇa evaṃ pratītimantrareṇādṛśya
b rūpatvāt  anya cca anena kimayuktamabhisamīkṣya evaṃ bahvāyāsa āśritaḥ sāmānya
vādinā paraspara bhedāt  vyaktivyatirekiṇīṣu anvayinaḥ pratyayasyāyogāt 
kathaṃ 
pācakādiṣvabhinnena vinā pyarthena vācakaḥ 
nahi pācakavācakādīnāmananvayināmapi pacanapācaketi śabdapratyayānuvṛtti
rasti  teṣu abhinnamanyadekaṃ nāstīti yairbhedehi tathā pratoyeran  karmasvāditi
cet atha pratyayādeva so'pi pratyayaḥ varam  anyena yā karmaṇā kiṃ kṛtaḥ  bhedo hi
taduktaṃ  abhinnena sāmānyākhyenārthena vinā pācakādiṣu kathamekaḥ śabdo vācakaḥ 
vācakagrahaṇena pratyayonvayī gṛhīta eva tena vinā śabdasyāpravṛtteḥ  ata eva
vṛttau śabdapratyayānuvṛttirastītyāha 
udyotaka reṇāpi gavādiṣvanuvṛttipratyayaḥ piṇḍādivyatiriktanimittād
bhavati viśeṣapratyayānāmanākasmikatvānnīlādipratyayavat  yattannimittantatsāmānya
miti sāmānyasiddhau pramāṇe kṛte svayamevāśaṃkitam 
atha manyase yathā pācakādiśabdā anuvṛttāśca bhavanti na ca pācakatvannāma
sāmānyamasti  yadi syāt  bhāvotpattikāla evābhivyaktaṃ syāt tathā gavā
diṣvanuvṛttipratyayā iti  na  hetvarthāparijñānāt  viśeṣapratyayānāmanā
kasmikatvādityasya hetoḥ piṇḍapratyayavyatiriktasya pratyayasya nimittāntarādutpāda
b ityayamarthaḥ na punaḥ sarvānuvṛttipratyaya sāmānyādeva bhavatīti  evañca sati
pacanakriyāyā yatpradhānaṃ sādhanantatpācakaśabdenocyate  tacca prādhānyaṃ pācakānta
reṣvapyastīti na doṣa iti vadatā pācakatvādisāmānyamvinā pācakādiśabdānāṃ
vṛttiriṣṭaivo dyo ta ka re ṇetyanenābhiprāyeṇā cā rye ṇāpyuktaṃ kathamityādi 
na ca pacanakriyāyāṃ prādhānyanimittāyāṃ pācakādiśabdapravṛttiryuktā  ta
nimittatve hi pradhānaṃ pradhānamityanugāmī śabda syānna pācaka iti  ata
evāha  na hotyādi  teṣviti pācakādiṣu  anyaditi dravyād vyatiriktaṃ

dravyasya kriyākṛtebhyupagamyamāne'tiśayādhāyakasya karmaṇaḥ kṣaṇikatvāta tasyāpyupa
kāryasya dravyasya svabhāvabhūtenānyenātiśayenotpattavyaṃ 
yadi kriyākṛto'tiśayo na svabhāvabhūto dravyasya tadarthāntarasya karaṇād dravyaṃ
naivopakṛtaṃ syāt tasmād yathākriyākṣaṇaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ svabhāvabhūtasyānyānyasyāti
śayotpattestadapi dravyaṃ devadattādi kṣaṇikaṃ syāt  tata iti kṣaṇikatvāt svo
tpattisthānavināśinaḥ svasminnevotpattideśe vināśinaḥ puṃsaḥ kṛtaḥ pākalakṣaṇā
kriyā  yadapekṣantat kriyāsāpekṣaṃ pācakādidravyasāmānyasya vyañjakaṃ syāta 
nanu ca prathamādikriyākṣaṇadvāreṇa dravyasya' kṣaṇikatvaṃ kriyā'bhāve ca kathaṃ kṣaṇi
katvamiti cet  na  yataḥ kriyāsambandhotpannānāṃ kṣaṇānāmanyasyāḥ kriyāyā
ssāmānyābhivyañjikāyā abhāvādityarthaḥ 
tasmāt sthitametad yathā vastubhūtā jātirnāstīti  
kathantarhotyādi paraḥ 
yathetyādi siddhānta vā dī yathā pācakādiṣu pācakatvādisāmānyannāsti tathā
tat teṣviti na vā cetaḥ yathā teṣvapīti yathā teṣu na vṛttiriti parīkṣitam 
kintarhi te animitte na syātām  nānimitte śratha kimiti cet bāhyatattvaṃ
nimittena  yathāsvaṃ yo yo vāsanāprabodhāt vikalpotpattiḥ tataḥ śabdā bhavanti 
yathāsvaṃ darśana 
na punavakalpābhidhānayorvastusattāśraya ityuktaprāyametat 
vāsanāvaśāt virodhirūpasamāveśena parāparadarśane'pi tadanvayidarśanāt  na ca tatra
tannivandhanasvabhāvaḥ kvacidapyasti  parasparavirodhinorekatra sthityasambhavāt 
aniyamena syād  tadanimittaṃ bhavaddhi kvacid bhavet kvacicca na bhavediti
na niśceyam 
a prasādhitamatha ca tatra pravarttate anvayinau jñānaśabdau  tathānyatrāpyantareṇa sāmānyantau
bhivaṣyataḥ 
tadvadityādi paraḥ  teṣviti pācakādiṣu sāmānyamvinā kathamanvayinorjñāna
śabdayorvṛttiriti tatonvayajñānaśabdavṛtteḥ pācakādiṣvapi pācakatvādisāmānya
mastīti cintitametadanantaraṃ  tathā teṣu pācakatvādi sāmānyaṃ sa na sambhavatīti 
yadyanvayi rūpannāsti tatkimidānīmanimitte te śabdajñāne syātāṃ  netyādi
siddhānta vā dī  astyeva tayonimittaṃ yat pareṇeṣyate tasya pratikṣepaḥ  tadevāha 
kintaharhotyādi  vastubhūtaṃ sāmānyambāhyatatvaṃ nimitte te na bhavataḥ  kintahi
tayornimittamityata āha  yathāsvamityādi  yo ya ātmīyo vāsanāprabodhasta
smādanvayino vikalpasyotpattiḥ  tato vikalpotpatteḥ sakāśād yathāvikalpaṃ
śabdā bhavanti  na punavakalpābhidhānayorvastusattā  anvayipadārthasattāsamāśraya
ityuktaprāyametata  avaśyaṃ caitadeṣṭavyaṃ  tathā hi yathāsvaṃ samavāyavāsanāvaśāt
siddhāntāśrayeṇa jñānavāsanānurodhād virodhirūpasamāveśena parasparaviruddharūpādhyā
ropeṇa pradhāna kāryamī śva ra kāryamahetukaṃ samvṛttimātraṃ jagadityevaṃ sarvabhedeṣvanva
yinostayo riti jñānābhidhānayoḥ  aparāparadarśanepīti parasparabhinnānāmarthānā
ndarśanepi na ca tatreti pradhānādikāryatvena parasparaviruddhena rūpeṇa kalpiteṣvartheṣu 
tannibandhanaḥ śabdajñānayonibandhanaḥ  kasmānnāstītyāha  parasparavirodhinorityādi 
aniyamenetyādi paraḥ  sarvaṃ sarvatrānvayi jñānamabhidhānaṃ ca syāt 
etadeva sādhayannāha   na hyanimittamityādi 
nanu yathāsvaṃ vāsanāprabodhād vikalpotpatterityādinā tayoranimittatvaṃ pratiṣi
ddhamityanavakāśameva codyaṃ  evammanyate  āntarameva nimittantayoriṣyate tasya ca
nimittasya kenacidāsattiviprakarṣābhāvāt  sarvatra sarvavikalpahetutvaṃ syāditi  sāmānyacintā
na hyānimittaṃ tad  vāsanā viśeṣa nimittatvāt tathābhūtaṃ vāhyaṃ na prakāśi
tamapotyuktam  na cāsati tasminna bhavitavyam  suptatai mirikādyupalabdheṣu artheṣu
graṃthavaropitarūpaviśeṣe tathā vikalpasyotpatteḥ  na ca te tadutpattyā b
isatsu sarvatra sarvākārā bhavanti  vibhāgenaiva tathaivopalabdhānāṃ vikalpanāt 
ekabhāvenātra svabhāvenāpi ekajñānakāyaṃ kvacid bhāva eva bhedāditi saṃkṣepaḥ 
śranyacca
tulye bhede yayā jāti pratyāsattyā prasarpati 
kacinnānyatra saivāstu śabdajñānanibandhanam 
iti saṃgrahaślokaḥ 
na hyanimitte bhavadityatra bāhyanimittābhāvādanimittamiti draṣṭavyaṃ 
nānimitte iti siddhānta vā dī  aviśiṣṭanimitte  na bhavata ityarthaḥ 
ata evāha  vāsanāviśeṣanimittatvāditi  yathābhūtadarśanadvārāyātā vāsanā
sā tatraivādhyavasitatadbhāvamvikalpaṃ janayati  na sarvatreti samudāyārthaḥ  tathābhū
tamityanvayi rūpaṃ  na cāsati tasminnanvayini bāhye nimitte vikalpena na bhavita
vyambhavitavyameva 
tadeva suptetyādinā sādhayati  suptaśca taimirikaśca tābhyāmupalabdheṣvartheṣu
gavādiṣu keśamakṣikādiṣu ca yathākramaṃ  abhāveṣu śaśaviṣāṇādiṣu  samavāyavāsanā 
yathā svaṃ siddhāntaṃ saṃketavāsanā tadbalenāropitarūpaviśeṣe pradhānakāryādiṣu 
tathā vikalpotpatteranvayino vikalpasyotpatteḥ  na hyeteṣu yathokteṣu bāhyamanvayi b
rūpamasti  svapnatimiropalabdhānāmevāsattvāt  teṣāṃ cāsattvaṃ tṛtīye paricchede
 pratipādayiṣyate  siddhāntasamāropitasya tu parasparavirodhinoryuga
padekatretyādinā pratipāditamevāsattvaṃ  na ca te vikalpā svapnādyupalabdheṣvasatsu
vastubhūtānvayirūpamantareṇāpyutpadyaṃta iti sarvatrārthā sarvākārā bhavantyapi tu
pratiniyatā eva  niyamahetuṃ cāha  vibhāgenaivetyādi  tathaivopalabdhānāmiti
vibhāgenopalabdhānāṃ  vibhāgenaiva vikalpanāt  suptatimirāvasthāyāntāvad
bhrāntajñānārūḍhānāmarthānāṃ vibhāgenopalambha  siddhāntāropitānāmapi yathāsvaṃ
siddhāntaśravaṇakāle  śaśaviṣāṇamityādiṣvapi  śaśaviṣāṇaṃ bandhyāsuta iti
vyavahāravyutpattikāle'nāditvād vyavahāravāsanāyāḥ  uktaṃ cātretyādi 
ekapratyamaśarthajñānādyekārthasādhana  ityatra 
api ca yathā dhavakhadirādayaḥ parasparabhinnāstathā gavādayaḥ  tatra tulye bhede
kha sāṃkhyamatanirāsaḥ
na nivṛttiṃ vihāyāsti yadi bhāvānvayo'paraḥ 
ekasya kāryamanyasya na syāda tyantabhedataḥ 
yadyete bhāvā nivṛttyanyānvayisvabhāvena kenacit śūnyāḥ bahano bhāvā eka
kāryatāyāṃ na syuḥ  yo hi tajjananasvabhāvaḥ na hi so'nyasya  yo'sti na sa
janakaḥ vyatirekasya niḥsvabhāvatvāt  yajjanakaṃ tad vastu tajjanakasyānyatrā
kasmād vṛkṣatvaṃ dhavādiṣveva varttate na gavādiṣviti pṛṣṭena pareṇaitadeva vaktavyaṃ
bhāvaśaktireva sā dhavādīnāṃ yena ta eva vṛkṣatvaṃ prati pratyāsannā na gavādaya iti 
tadā tulye bhedye yathā pratyāsatyā bhāvaśaktilakṣaṇayā jātiḥ kvacit
svāśrayābhimate'rtharāśau  prasappati  vyāpya varttate  saiva bhāvaśaktiranvayiśabda
jñānanibandhanamastu  kiṃ sāmānyena kalpitena 
tena yaducyate 
viṣayeṇa hi buddhīnāṃ vinā notpattiriṣyate 
viśeṣādanyadicchanti sāmānyantena tad dhruvaṃ 
tā hi tena vinotpannā mithyā syuviṣayāvṛte 
na tvanyena vinā vṛttissāmānyasyeha duṣyatīti 
tadapāstaṃ  na hi yathā sāmānyamantareṇa keṣucit sāmānyavṛttiriṣyate 
tathā sāmānyamvinā sāmānyabuddhiriṣyatāmiti parobhyupagamaṃ kāryate  yena tā
hi tena vinotpannā mithyā syuriti parasyottaraṃ syāt  kevalaṃ yathā parasya
sāmānyamantareṇa keṣucita padārthaṣu yayā pratyāsatyā sāmānyavṛttiḥ saiva
bhrāntānvayijñānaśabdanimittamastu kiṃ sāmānyenetyayamarthotra vivakṣita iti na
kaściddoṣaḥ 
tasmāt sthitametadvyāvṛtterevaikatvādhyavasāyād bhāveṣvanvayo nānyasyeti 
atra sāṃkhyaḥ prāha  na nivṛttimityādi  bhāvānvayo bhāvānāmekarūpatvaṃ 
apara iti vastubhūtaḥ  tadekasya bījasya yatkāryantadanyasya pṛthivyāderna syāt 
kasmāt  tayorbījapṛthivyoratyantabhedataḥ  
yadyeta ityādinā vyācaṣṭe  eṣāmiti bhāvānāṃ yathā bījādekādīnāmekamaṃ
kurākhyaṃ kāryaṃ  yo hotyādinā tadeva sādhayati  yo hi tasya bījasyāṃkurajanana
bhāvāt anyena na syādutpannam
yadi tajjanakasvabhāvo yaḥ sa evānyasyāpi syāt tena svabhāvena tatra
tatosbhinnaḥ syādityasti svabhāvānvayaḥ 
yadyekātmatayā'neka  kāryasyaikasya kārakaḥ 
pisostīti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ 
yadyaneka ekasvabhāvatvāt ekasya kārakaḥ teṣāmabhinna svabhāvaḥ sa hi
ekasannidhāne'pyasti hetvavaikalyāt' eko'pi janakaḥ syāt 
nāpaityabhinaṃ tad rūpaṃ viśeṣāḥ khalvapāyinaḥ 
nahi tasyābhinnasvabhāvasya arthāntare'pi viśeṣo'sti  viśeṣe satyabheda
a
svabhāvo na hi sonyasya pṛthivyāderasti ' yosti buddhyāropito vyāvṛttilakṣaṇo na a
sa janakaḥ  kasmād  vyatirekasyānyavyāvṛttilakṣaṇasya niḥsvabhāvatvāt  tasmād
bījasvalakṣaṇameva janakaṃ yacca janakarūpantadeva vastu  tajjanakaṃ cetyaṅkurajanakaṃ
svalakṣaṇaṃ  aparatreti pṛthivyādau  aparaṃ pṛthivyādikamaṃkuraṃ janayet  sa hītyādi 
hi śabda evakārārthaḥ  tasyeti bījasya  anyasya pṛthivyādeḥ  sa pṛthivyādiste
nāṃkurajananena bījasvabhāvena tato bījādabhinnaḥ syāt  ityastisvabhāvānvayaḥ 
tena kecit svabhāvabhedepi prakṛtyaikakāryakāriṇa indriyādivadityayuktamuktamiti 
yadītyādinā siddhānta vā dī  ātmaikatrāpīti  kāraṇakalāpasya yenā
bhinnenātmanā janakatvamiṣyate  sa ātmā teṣāṃ kāraṇā nāmmadhye ekatrāpi kāraṇe
stīti  tenaikena kāryaṃ kṛtamiti kṛtvā vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ 
nanu vyāvṛttivādinopyantyāvasthāyāṃ sarveṣāṃ janakatvāt kāraṇāntaravaiyathyaṃ 
naitadasti  samuditānāmeva teṣāntādṛśaṃ sāmarthya kṣaṇikānāṃ  hetupratyayā
yattasannidhitvāt  parasya tu nityavādinaḥ sadā tad rūpamastīti bhavetkāraṇāntarā
ṇāmānarthakyaṃ  ata evoktamekatrāpi sostīti kāraṇāntaravikalāvasthāyāma
pītyarthaḥ 
yadītyādinā vyācaṣṭe  anekaḥ padārtho yadyekasvabhāvatvādekasya kāryasya kārakaḥ
janakaḥ sa teṣāṃ kāraṇābhimatānāmabhinno janaka svabhāva ekakāraṇasannidhānepya
sti  tataśca sarvasyāmavasthāyāmavaikalyāt kāraṇasya yatra tatrāvasthitireko pi
janaka syāt   
etadeva draḍhayannāha  yasmādityādi  ekasminnapi bījādau sannihite nāpa
tyabhinnaṃ tatkāryajananaṃ sāmānyarūpaṃ  viśeṣā vyaktibhedā apāyinaḥ  na hi tasyā
hāneḥ  sa hi tatrāpyastīti naikasya sthitāvapi tasyāpāyo'sti  ye viśeṣā
avasthābhedāsteṣāṃ sahasthitiniyamābhāvāt syādapāyaḥ 
na ca te janakā iṣṭāḥ  sahakāriṇāṃ hi ekasvabhāvatayā janakatvābhyupagamāt 
tasmād janakasya sthānāt asthāyino'janakatvāt ekasthitāvapi kāryotpattiḥ
syāt na ca bhavati  tataḥ
ekāpāye phalābhāvād viśeṣebhyastadudbhavaḥ 
aneka sahakārisādhāraṇaṃ kārya ekaviśeṣāpāye'pi na syād sarvaviśeṣā pāye
'pi syāt  nanvakhile'pyabhinna rūpe na bhavati  kāryaṃ hi kutaścid bhāvadharmī
na syāt ya bhavati tattasya vaikalyāt  na cābhinnasya ekasya sthitāvapi vaikalya
masti  avikale tasmin abhavat tasyājanakatāṃ sūcayati 
bhinnasya kāryajananasvabhāvasya bījādarthāntarepi pṛthivyādau viśeṣosti  kiṅkāraṇam
 viśeṣe satyabhedahāneḥ  sa hyabhinno janakābhimataḥ svabhāvastatrāpi bījepi
kevalestīti naikasya sthitāvapi tasyetyabhinnasya rūpasya janakābhimatasyāpāyo
vināśosti  traiguṇyasya sarvātmanā sarvatra sarvadā sattvāt  ye viśeṣā avasthā
bhedāsteṣāṃ sahasthitiniyamābhāvāt syādapāya 
etaccābhyupagamyoktaṃ anyathā nityādavasthāntaravyatiriktānāṃ viśeṣā
ṇāmapi kathamapāyaḥ  na ca te janakā iti viśeṣāḥ kasmānneṣṭā ityāha  saha
kāriṇāmityādi  tasmādekasminnapi bījādau sthite janakasyātmanaḥ sthānāt 
asthāyina iti viśeṣasya  eka sthitāvapīti bījāderanyatamasya sthitāvapi kāryo
tpattiḥ syāt  na ca bhavati kāryotpattiḥ  tataḥ sāmānyasthitepi sahakāriṇāmma
b dhye ekasya viśeṣasyāpā 'ye  phalābhāvād viśeṣebhyastadudbhavaḥ kāryodbhavaḥ 
na sāmānyāt  tatkāryamaṅkurādikaṃ  kiṃ bhūtaṃ  aneka mityādi  anekasya saha
kāriṇaḥ sādhāraṇaṃ  anekasahakārijanyamityartha  eka viśeṣāpāyepīti sahakā
riṇāmanyatamabhedāpāyepi  anena vyatirekamāha 
punarityādinānvayaṃ  tasmād viśeṣeṣvevānvayavyatireko kāryasya na tu
sāmānye  tadāha  nanvavikala iti  ekaviśeṣasthitāvavikalepyabhinne
rūpe tatkāryanna bhavati  kāryaṃ hītyādinaitadeva vibhajate  kutaścid bhāva utpāda
sa eva dharmaḥ  sa yasyāsti tat tadbhāvadharma  kadācit yatra bhavati tattasya jana
kasya vaikalyānna cābhimnasya rūpasya janakābhimatasya sahakāriṇāṃ madhye  ekasya
sthitāvapi vaikalpamasti  avikale tasmin sāmānyarūpe kāryamabhavata tasya sāmā sāmānyacintā
yatsākalyavaikalyābhyāṃ tata eva kāryasyotpattiḥ tasmin sati bhavato niyamaḥ
syāt  tadanyasmādutpattikalpanāyāṃ hi atiprasaṅgāt  tasmād viśeṣā eva
janakā na sāmānyam  tatasta evaṃ vastu 
sa pāramārthiko bhāvo ya evārthakriyākṣamaḥ 
idameva hi vastvavastulakṣaṇaṃ artha kriyāyogyatā'yogyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ  ob
arthakriyāsamartho yogyo'rthaḥ 
saca nānveti yo'nveti na tasmāt kāryasaṃbhavaḥ 
tasmād sarva sāmānya prakriyāyogyatvāt na vastviti vastu viśeṣa
eva tata eva taniṣpatteḥ 
svabhāvānanvayāt tarhi ekasya janakaṃ rūpaṃ tadanyasya nāstīti prajanakaḥ syāt 
nyasyājanakātmatāṃ sacayati    
nanu na sāmānyameva janakamiṣyate yenāyandoṣaḥ syādapi tu anekātmatayā
janaka ityuktamityatrāha  yatsākalyetyādi  yeṣāṃ ca viśeṣāṇāṃ sākalyavakalyā
bhyāṃ kāryambhāvābhāvavat  tata eva viśeṣebhyaḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ  tasmin satīti
hetubhāvayogye viśeṣe sati bhavataḥ kāryasya  tadanyasmā diti  viśeṣādanyasmāt
sāmānyādatiprasaṃgāt sarvaḥ sarvasya kāraṇaṃ syāt  yata evaṃ tasmād viśeṣā eva
janakāḥ  na sāmānyaṃ janakaṃ  tato'janakatvāt ta eva viśeṣā vastu  paramārtha
santa ityarthaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ    yasmāt pāramārthiko bhāvaḥ paramārthasannityarthaḥ 
sa evārthakriyākṣamaḥ 
idameva hotyādinā vyācaṣṭe  arthakriyāyogyatā vastuno lakṣaṇaṃ  ayogyatā
tvavastuno lakṣaṇaṃ  vakṣyāma iti sambandhaḥ 
arthakriyākṣamaṃ yattadatra paramārthasadi     tyādinā  sarvārthakriyāyogyortho
viśeṣātmako nānveti  viśeṣasya vyaktyantarānanuyāyitvāt  yonveti
sāmānyātmā  tasmāt sāmānyātmano na kāryasya sambhavaḥ 
tasmādityādinopasaṃhāraḥ  anarthakriyāyogyatvādityarthakriyāyāmayogyatvā
dityartha  tata eveti viśeṣādeva taniṣpatterarthakriyāyā niṣpatteḥ 
tadevamparaiḥ kalpitasyājanakatvaṃ pratipāditaṃ    
adhunā yatpareṇoktaṃekasya kāryamanyasya na syādatyantabhedata iti tatpari
tadeva codyamāvarttayati svabhāvānanvayāttarhītyādinā 
jvarādiśamane kaścit saha pratyekameva vā  
a
janakatve bhedā viśeṣāt sarvo janaka syāt 
naitadasti 
tenātmanā hi bhede'pi hetuḥ kaścinna cāparaḥ  
svabhāvo'yaṃ ekajanakātmano bhidyamānāḥ sarve samaṃ janakā na vā kaścijjanaka
iti  yathā teṣu na viśeṣabhāvaḥ tato bhedāviśeṣe'pi kutaścidātmātiśayāt
kaścijjanako nāparaḥ sa hi tasya svabhāvo nāparasya 
na hi vastusvabhāveṣu kimagnirdahatyuṣṇo vā nodakamiti paryanuyogamarhati
svabhāvāyo'yamiti yataḥ iti tanmātraṃ syāt  nirhetukatve'napekṣiṇo'niyamenāti
prasaṅgāt  tasmāt svabhāvo'sya svahetorityucyate  tasyāpi tajjananātmatā
ityādinā prāgapyetat parihṛtantathāpyadhikavidhānārthaḥ punarupanyāsaḥ 
ekasya vījāderyajjanakaṃ rūpantadanyasya pṛthivyādernāstīti kṛtvā'nyaḥ sahakārī
ajanakaḥ syāt  janakasvabhāvād bhinnasvabhāvasya janakatve cābhyupagamyamāne
bhedāviśeṣāt sarvo yavabījādirapi śālyakurasya janakaḥ syāt

b dharmaṇi sādhyadharmasyāyogavyavacchedena sāmānyasyāgnimātrasya sādhanāt  nāstyanvaya
doṣaḥ  nāpi siddhasādhyatā pradeśāyogavyavacchedasyāsiddhatvāt  pradhānādike dharmiṇya

dike dharmaṇi  kasmāt    pradhānādiśabdavācyasyaivārthasya traiguṇyādilakṣaṇa

dhātavyaḥ  abhihitaḥ pramāṇena niścetavyaḥ  tasmājjñeyatvādibhiḥ sopi siddha

nityādiguṇopetaḥ  pradhānantāvatsiddhambhavatyanye ca dharmā anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ setsyaṃte
iti cedāha  tathāpi jñeyatvādinā ki siddhaṃ syāt  naivābhimatasya pradhā
nasya svalakṣaṇasya siddhi syāt  asya śabdārtharūpatvāt  agnyanumānepi tarhya
gnimātraṃ siddhamityasādhyaṃ syādityāha  anyatra tu tadevāgnisāmānyaniyatā
dhāramasiddhantatra deśe na siddhamiti sādhyate 
nanu tatrāpi tadayogavirahiṇeti tena pradeśenāyogastadayogastena virahaḥ
pradeśena yoga ityarthaḥ  sosti yasya sāmānyasya tattathoktaṃ  tenānvayo na siddhaḥ 
netyādinā pariharati  na vai kaścinyāyajñaḥ tathābhūtena pradeśasambandhinā
'gnisāmānyena vyāptiṃ karoti  tasmāt paraṃ prativādinaṃ pratipādayatā dhūmo
gnināntarīyakognyavinābhāvī darśanīyaḥ  yatra dhūmastatrāgnirityevaṃ  sa dhūma
statheti sarvopasaṃhāravyāptipradarśanenāgnimātreṇa vyāptaḥ siddho yatraiva pradeśe śabdacintā

tadanirdeśe ca kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭe'nvayaḥ  tad śrayaṃ agnyavinābhāvitayā siddhaḥ  arthāt
agnireva pradeśenāyogaṃ vyavacchinatti  tasmāt sa eva tathā sādhya ucyata iti 
na punastathopanyāsapūrvako'nvayaḥ  sādhyokterihānaṅgatvāt  tatparvagāmini

niścitāvyabhicāraṃ ca liṃgaṃ tatra prasiddhimat
tena vyāpakadharmeṇa dharmiṇaṃ gamayiṣya 
dharmiṇi svayaṃ svena rūpeṇa dṛśyate tatraivāgnibuddhiñjanayati  tatraitasyāṃ sāmarthyā
danumeyapratītau sādhyanirdeśena na kiñcit prayojanantena vināpi sādhyasiddheḥ
etadevāha  tatretyādi  tatra sādhyadharmiṇi liṅgasya darśanāt sambandhākhyānamātrā
cceṣṭasya sādhyasya siddheḥ  yataśca na sādhyasya dharmadhamisamudāyasya nirdeśastadā

vyatirekamukheṇa   na  vā yadi niścīyate  na virodhavyabhicārau  na viruddhatva
sanai kāntikatvamvā  iti hetornāyaṃ prasaṃgosiddhi  ddha viruddhānaikāntikalakṣaṇaḥ 
aniścitāyāntu sādhyadharmeṇa liṅgasyāvyāptau  dharmasamāśraye vā pakṣadharmatve
vāsniścite sati tatsvabhāvatayā niścitatrairūpyasvabhāvatayā yo gamako'bhimato
heturna sa kaścid gamakaḥ  ata eva kāraṇāt svadharmeṇa svena sādhyarūpeṇa vyāptaḥ
sādhyadharmiṇi siddho niścito hetusvabhāvo vācyaḥ 
etadeva draḍhayannāha  na hotyādi  prakāśatayā prabhāsvaratayā ghaṭādīnaprakāśayan
yadā kadācid ghaṭādyudarāntarvartī bhavati tadā tadrūpāpratipattau prabhāsvaratā pratipattau
satyāṃ svāmarthakriyāṃ ghaṭādiprakāśanalakṣaṇāṃ na hi karoti 
gamakasvarūpamabhidhāyādhunā gamyasvarūpamāha  vyāpakastasyeti  yosau gamako
vyāpyaḥ svabhāvastasya vyāpakaḥ svabhāvaḥ niścito gamyaḥ 
taddharmetyādinā vyāṃcaṣṭe  dharmiṇo dharmo gamya    kīdṛśastasya gamakatve
nābhimatasya vyāpakatvena niścitaḥ  kathaṃ punarvyāpakatvena niścita ityāha 
taddharmaniścayādeva vyāpyadharmaniścayādeva 
iyatā gamya gamakayoḥ svarūpandarśitaṃ 
nivarttyanivarttakayorapi svarūpamāha  tasyetyādi  ayamiti vyāpako dharmaḥ
svayaṃ nivṛttau satyāṃ tasya vyāpyasya nivarttakaḥ 
tasyetyādinā vyācaṣṭe  ayaṃ vyāpako dharmaḥ svayanivarttamānastasya vyāpyasya
nivarttaka iti sambandha  kiṅkāraṇaṃ  yasmādevaṃ hyasyāyaṃ sādhyo dharmo vyāpakaḥ

uktaṃ veditavyam 
dvividho hi prayogaḥ sādharmyavāneva vaidharmyavān ca  yadanye anvayī vyati
rekī cetyāhuḥ  nānayoḥ anyatra saṃyogabhedāt arthataḥ kaścid api bhedaḥ  sādha
yeṇāpi prayoge'rthād vaidhato gatiḥ  asati tasmin sādhyahetvo ranvayā
bhāvāt  evaṃ sādharmyavato'tvayagatiḥ syāt  tasmiścāsati sādhyābhāvaścet

 nirhetukavināśa
anityatve yathā kāryamakārya vā'vināśini
